GRI/2026/1488
Reminder regarding further action on the explanation sought from the developer
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Sandeep Surve05/01/202605/01/20260
We the undersigned are members of Siddhivinayak Dwarkamai Cooperative Housing Society Proposed On behalf of our society we refer to our complaint submitted to the SRA and through the Aaple Sarkar grievance portal We have received communication dated 19 December 2025 stating that an explanation has been sought from the developer M s Raj Sneha Developers and Engineers Private Limited regarding the issues raised by usHowever till date we have not received any written information about whether the developer has submitted the explanation nor have we been informed about the action taken or proposed to be taken by your office after receiving the explanationAs this matter is directly related to the rights of the slum dwellers transparency in the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme and compliance with SRA circulars Delay in taking further action is causing confusion and concern among the residents We therefore respectfully request you to inform usWhether the explanation from the developer has been received What action has been taken or will be taken by the SRA on the said explanationThe present status of our complaints the issue is urgent and sensitive we request an early written response from your office
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
नियमानुसार कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1767603029329_2356_Aaple%20Sarker%20reply%2019%20December%202025_compressed.pdf

GRI/2026/1487
Encroachment of Balwadi premises by NGO Alert Citizen Trust at Ashirwad SRA CHS society CTS No 755 Mulund West Mumbai 400080
Competent Authority -8Francis Fredericks05/01/202605/01/20260
Dear Respected Sir I am Anthony Fredericks age 79 years residing in Room no 1006 residing in Room No 1006 Ashirwad SRA CHS society CTS No 755 Mulund West Mumbai 400080 writing this message from my Son loginThis is to inform you that NGO named Alert Citizen Trust has illegally using Balwadi of Ashirwad SRA CHS society CTS No 755 Mulund West Mumbai 400080 as NGO Also using the Balwadi address as NGO address on Google search which is misleading information This is an encroachment of place by NGO This NGO is run by Legal Advisor Mr Ajit JobanputraHe has provided false commitment that he is using the NGO for benefit of society However the benefit has not been given to society member The NGO has not got any permission from Women and Child Development Department He is using the same Balwadi without permissionIt is humble request to you please issue a evacuation notice to NGO so that Women and Child Development Department can use the premises I have already did a compliant to Women and Child Development Department Attaching1Builder allotment letter- which does not show Allotment to NGO2NGO using Balwadi address on Google search- misleading information
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
नियमानुसार कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल

GRI/2025/1468
Application for offenses under Section 147 read with Section 146 of the Maharashtra Co-operative Societies Act 1960 Society Name Anand SRA Co-operative Housing Society Limited
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Dinesh Tiwari29/12/202529/12/20250
Since 2012 no constitutional management committee has been established in the society Management committee meetings MCM special general meetings SGM and annual general meetings AGM have never been held in the society Financial statements annual reports audit reports and independent auditor reports have never been presented before the general body nor have they been discussed or approved Since 2013 these three individuals have without any legal authority or mandate from the general body falsely represented themselves as the sole committee
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
आपल्या तक्रारीतील मुद्याबाबत कलम 146 व 147 बाबत कार्यवाही करण्याचे अधिकार या विभागास नाही. त्याबाबत मा. सहनिबंधक, सहकारी संस्था मुंबई यांचेकडे दाद मागणे उचित होईल.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1767034311773_7348_%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B7%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9F%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%20%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%20%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A5%E0%A4%BE%20%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%A7%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%AE%20%E0%A5%A7%E0%A5%AF%E0%A5%AC%E0%A5%A6%20%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A4%20%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%AE%20%E0%A5%A7%E0%A5%AA%E0%A5%AC%20%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%B9%20%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%AE%20%E0%A5%A7%E0%A5%AA%E0%A5%AD%20%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%9A%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%BE%20%E0%A4%97%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A0%E0%A5%80%20%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9C..pdf

GRI/2025/1467
Follow up on complaint no 133213481349
Hon. Secretary (SEC)
SANDESH SUBHASH SAPKAL
29/12/202529/12/20250
Respected Sir I am writing this email regarding the replies received from the Co operative Department in reference to our earlier complaints No1349 and 1332The department has informed us that our society is registered before 2015 therefore they cannot issue our allotment letter However this justification is factually inconsistent because more than 70 members from our own society have already received their allotment letters after fulfilling unofficial financial demands We have consciously chosen to follow only the legal and transparent process without engaging in any unethical payments Due to thiswe are being denied the same document which other eligible members have already been issued This discriminatory treatment has caused deep mental stress to my family and society membersFor your reference I am attaching a copy of the allotment letter issued to other society members who were granted approval despite being part of the same pre 2015 society proving that the rule is being applied selectivelySir we respectfully request your intervention to ensure 1Equal and fair treatment for all eligible members including us2Issuance of our allotment letter through proper legal procedure without bias3An inquiry into why compliant members are being rejected while others are approvedWe trust your office will uphold the integrity and transparency expected from a Grade A government body and provide justice to members who follow the lawWe hope for a positive resolution and would be grateful for your support
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
सदर प्रकरणी नियमानुसार उचित कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1767027066191_3123_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-12-29%20at%209.49.11%20PM.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1767027073675_2303_Adobe%20Scan%2014%20Nov%202024%20(1).pdf
15
GRI/2025/1466
Follow up on complaint no 133213481349
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
SANDESH SUBHASH SAPKAL
29/12/202529/12/20250
Respected Sir I am writing this email regarding the replies received from the Co operative Department in reference to our earlier complaints No 1349 and 1332 The department has informed us that our society is registered before 2015 therefore they cannot issue our allotment letter However this justification is factually inconsistent because more than 70 of members from our own society have already received their allotment letters after fulfilling unofficial financial demands We have consciously chosen to follow only the legal and transparent process without engaging in any unethical payments Due to this we are being denied the same document which other eligible members have already been issued This discriminatory treatment has caused deep mental stress to my family and society members For your reference I am attaching a copy of the allotment letter issued to other society members who were granted approval despite being part of the same pre-2015 society proving that the rule is being applied selectively Sir we respectfully request your intervention to ensure Equal and fair treatment for all eligible members including us Issuance of our allotment letter through the proper legal procedure without bias An inquiry into why compliant members are being rejected while others are approved We trust your office will uphold the integrity and transparency expected from a Grade A government body and provide justice to members who follow the law We hope for a positive resolution and would be grateful for your support
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
सदर प्रकरणी नियमानुसार उचित कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1767026169343_6599_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-12-29%20at%209.49.11%20PM.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1767026592476_4421_Adobe%20Scan%2014%20Nov%202024%20(1).pdf

GRI/2025/1462
Request for Purchaser Verification and current status update- Jai Ambe Chs, Anand nagar, Oshiwara 400102
Executive Engineers-2 (EE-2)
-29/12/202529/12/20250
I am writing to request
1. Verify and confirm our details as a purchaser in the above scheme, based on the enclosed agreement documents; and
2. Provide an update on the present status / progress of the project, and kindly inform whether any verification or documentation process is presently being undertaken for purchasers.

This request is only for the purpose of understanding the current position of the project and ensuring that our records are appropriately reflected with the Authority.

Sandeep Yadav
S/o/ Shyamdhari Yadav
email- sandeep.sy123@gmail.com
Executive Engineers-2 (EE-2)
Resolved
As there are three schemes named Jai Ambe in KW ward ,you are requested to submit CTS nos and village for resolving the grievance.

GRI/2025/1461
Fraud Played by MS Jangid Homes PvtLtd with SRA
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Chandrakant Lad27/12/202527/12/20250
I am writing to formally inform you that the scheme submitted by MS Jangid Home Private Limited regarding on 5th December 2025 in respect of area admeasuring about 670 ssqmtrCTS No 49-pt of village Majas Part 1 Taluka Andheri at Bandrekarwadi Jogeshwari East Mumbai400060 is a fraud played upon SRA has the said land already acquired by MMRDA for Metro 6 It is important to note that the PAP units associated with this scheme have already been allotted to eligible tenants by MMRDA I have attached the relevant documentation ie Annexure 2 issued by MMRDA for your referenceFurthermore MMRDA has already issued an NOC to Vijay Nagar Rahiwasi Vikas Samiti SRA CHS Prop which is also included in the attached documentsIt is imperative to understand that the scheme submitted by MS Jangid Home Private Limited is illegal and said land has already been acquired by MMRDA for Metro Line 6 Therefore we at Vijay Nagar Rahiwasi Vikas Samiti SRA CHS Prop respectfully request you immediately reject applications and refrain from granting approval to the aforementioned scheme
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
Noted. Necessary action as per policy of SRA will be taken on the basis of relevant and appropriate papers please.
-

GRI/2025/1456
Strict Action against Corrupt Tehsildar Suresh Kashid and Audumber Shamrao Patil and Megha
Deputy CollectorAmar Valia27/12/202527/12/20250
This is to let you know Annexture 1 Non resident and 146 Resident was belong to my grand parents after there death it was belong to there 4 childrens Vidhya Bhogle Kavita jagtap Dinesh Valia and Ganesh Valia Ganesh Valia was my father and my father was mentally ill announced my thane hospital i even have mental certificate to proof after my fathers death above 3 sibling of my father gave bribe to Tahsildar officers Suresh Kashid and Audumber Shamrao Patil and Megha PA of Vaishali Lambhate Collector and this Tahsildar removed my father name from property But Vaishali Lambhate Collector added my fathers name back now Suresh and Audumber and not providing me order certificate need need to take action from such corrupted Tahsildar Vaishali Lambhate madam is very helpful and kind person I have attached Ganesh Valia mental certificate and Order copy of annexure 1 and 146 I am attaching documents for references
Deputy CollectorResolved
प्राधिकरणाकडील परिपत्रक १५२ नुसार सर्व वारस नोंद घेण्यात आलेली आहे. सदर आदेशाची प्रत या कार्यालयात उपस्थित राहून प्राप्त करून घ्यावी

GRI/2025/1453
No Fire Safety in Sangharsh Nagar
Town PlannnerRakesh Sabui26/12/202526/12/20250
Dear Sir or Madam Being a resident of SRA I am aware that Slum Rehabilitation will not have facilities like other Buildings but at least we should have fire safety There are 20 clusters each having almost 10 wings or more In Sangharsh Nagar there is almost 200 buildings But none of the building has any water hydrant system I can understand the drinkable water itself is given for 15 mins then how hydrant can be maintained But atleast consider there are narrow entries in each cluster the compounds are used for parking gas lines given to each house so in case of fire it would be first of all challenging for fire tender to enter a cluster My request is already the entries should be made broader some sort of hydrant system or easiest the firecracker burning inside cluster should be not allowed It causes heavy pollution and increases the risk of fire heavily Please consider this many lives on stake One single incident will be enough to cause a massacre Firecracker are busted for all small reason and any time No one takes any action
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
ResolvedNoted-

Francis Fredericks22/12/202522/12/20250

GRI/2025/1427
Non receipt of RENT since 2019 till date from DARSHAN SKY HIGH CONSTRUCTIONS LLP under SRA scheme
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Nitin Halwai21/12/202521/12/20250
RERA Registration No P51900056427 Project AddressKeshavrao Borker MargChaskar ChawlDhaku Prabhuchi WadiByculla East Mumbai 400033 CTS No 714 Annexure II No 8252024 Under the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme SRA we vacated our residential premises at Byculla on 02 December 2019 based on the written assurance and agreement provided by the developer or builder that monthly rent would be paid regularly until possession of the permanent rehabilitation premises is handed over to us However it is extremely distressing to inform you that from 02 December 2019 till date for more than six years we have not received a single rupee towards rent from the builder Whenever we approached the builder for clarification and payment he has bluntly refused and stated that he will not pay rent and that we may do whatever we want This behaviour is unethical illegal and against the terms and conditions of the SRA agreement and RERA provisions We are senior citizens and are suffering from serious health issues including diabetes and high blood pressure Despite our vulnerable condition the builder continues to harass us mentally and financially by deliberately withholding the rent amount causing severe hardship and stress We therefore humbly request your good office to take the following actions 1Direct the builder to submit bank statements or rent credit proof from 02 December 2019 till date as per the agreement 2Verify that no rent has been credited to our account during this entire period 3Immediately instruct the builder to release the pending rent arrears along with applicable interest 4Fix accountability of the concerned SRA official as no monitoring or verification has been done to check whether displaced tenants are actually receiving rent 5Take strict action against the builder under applicable SRA and RERA rules for violation of agreement terms and harassment of senior citizens We are enclosing a copy of the agreement for your reference and verification We sincerely request your urgent intervention and justice in this matter as the delay has already caused us immense financial loss and mental agony Thanking you in anticipation Name Munnilal Halwai 81694390969773525642
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
आपल्या तक्रारीमध्ये थकीत भाडयाचा मुद्दा दिसून येतो तथापि त्याचा सविस्तर तपशिल नमुद केलेला नाही. आपण प्राधिकरणाकडील sra.gov.in या संकेत स्थळावर थकीत भाडयाबाबत कागदपत्राच्या पुर्ततेसह अर्ज करू शकता त्यानंतर कार्यवाही करणे सोईचे होईल.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1766330008621_1651_DocScanner%2021%20Dec%202025%208-35%E2%80%AFpm.pdf

As per file No SRAENG555HWSTGLLOI the land belongs to state government and slum is declared as per SRA planning authority and the committe known as Sai niwas chsl proposed in the proposal Now the slum declared property is constructed ground plus two upper floors on commercial basis and the structure is assessed reassessed by BMC in year 2013 on the name of lauvish construction So kindly demolish the illegal ground plus two illegal structure at the site constructed on govt land without any permission from planning authority Now there are no other rehab component as per LOI condition The luvish construction has purchased all the rehab component and constructed illegal showroom of ground plus two upper floors at the site

GRI/2025/1419
Issuance of Transfer Letter by the Registrar of the SRA Co-operative Housing Society REF No SRAARESOW20252931 dt 24 112025
Assistant Registrar (City)
sampat20/12/202520/12/20250
My clients have duly complied with all the prescribed requirements for transfer of the subject room pursuant to a duly registered Gift Deed executed by the father in favour of the son including payment of the requisite SRA charges and fees It is noted that despite submission of the complete proposal more than 15 days ago the requisite Transfer Letter has not yet been issued or uploaded The same may kindly be looked into and the Transfer Letter issued and uploaded at your convenience
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
हस्तांतरणाची धारीका मा. सहाय्यक निबंधक यांच्या मान्यतेसाठी मसुदा ठेवण्यात आलेला आहे. कागदपत्राच्या पडताळणी अंती मसुदयावर स्वाक्षरी झाल्या अंति कारवाई करण्याता येईल.

GRI/2025/1398
Original Grievance GRI2025442 has been incorrectly closed by SRA Deputy Collector West
Competent Authority -3Parvati Bidve Sellars18/12/202518/12/20250
Above grievance first registered on 07072025 but before this I was trying to get FIR registered for fraud via Vakola Police Station Santa Cruz East but their DCP insists that SRA register the fraud first Two criminals have fraudulently applied for Government subsidized housing under the SRA schemes attached ANNEXURE II attached and marked in green with the intention to sell them at a profit as soon as they are under construction The first criminal is MALTI KACHARU BIDAVE who was already in possession of an SRA property in her name at GURU KRUPA SOCIETY before she applied for this second property at SAI SHRADA SOCIETY which she does not even own The second criminal is NANDA RAYMOND PALMER who is her daughter who also applied for a property in SAI SHARADA SOCIETY at the same time as her mother in 2011 but who had been in the USA from 2000 - 2018 Neither of these people even own property in the society that they have applied for housing in so the question is how did they both get onto the ANNEXURE II list The answers are contained in the recordings that I have of a conversation between them both and two other parties where they discuss this fraud along with other frauds that have been redacted from the attached transcript The two criminals admit to committing the fraud and to bribing an SRA officer or officers stating the amount paid to date They have also sold the SRA property on the open market during the 5 year lock in period without permission in writing from the SRA This property was belonging to RATHORE MALTI KACHARU BIDAVEs mother who unfortunately died just before she was due to take physical possession so the two criminals sold the property to an SRA employee who is still resident at her property in GURU KRUPA SOCIETY and also the reason why the ANNEXURE II for this property is still registered in her name As I understand things the SRA has a responsibility under the law of India to confirm these allegations as fact to support the police investigation by supplying material evidence physically confirming the current occupiers of these properties and to report these frauds to the police so that they can register an FIR and conduct a thorough investigation Urgency in processing this allegation is now required as NANDA RAYMOND PALMER has just obtained a visa to leave the country from 20 December 2025 in a second attempt to escape justice
Competent Authority -3Resolved
Please visit Competent Authority-3, SRA office along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/1370
Terrible planning around Parel area
Town PlannnerDr Komal Sangoi12/12/202512/12/20250
Absolute disregard for planning There are 6-7 high rises coming up near crescent bay Parel with utilisation of open spaces that were meant for public use There are no proper roads leading upto these buildings with illegal parking on bith sides of a narrow lane This could be a disaster waiting to happen with zero accessibility for any emergency help like fire brigade to reach on time No construction norms are followed Bad air quality yet total apathy from the government
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
All permissions are issued as per DCPR-2034

GRI/2025/1361
Unplanned SRA development in JerBaiWadia road impacting life
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
asmita mittal11/12/202511/12/20250
I am a resident of Crescent Bay Parel When I bought a 2BHK flat in 2017 I was made to understand that the SRA will be systematically developing the area including budgeting for open spaces for the residents of the area CS No 440 645646 647 648 649 650 and 651 was shown to us in the plans as not being included in the development area and instead I was made to believe that a park would come up there Fast forward 8 years the area is reeling under the population pressure while the infrastructure hasnt come up Insufficient parking allocated for existing SRA buildings traffic from residents of Ruparel buildings and Crescent Bay has led to traffic jams on Bhoiwada junction and Jer Bai Wadia road On top of that SRA has now approved multiple high rise towers in the area all with 50 floors with no consideration to the current pain points of residents which will be exacerbated with all the proposed development without infrastructure Of the greatest pain to me is 64 floor tower that has been approved under Sobha Inizio Specifically it is 1 being set up in aforementioned tract of land which was to be developed in a community park 2 not replacing any slums which are actually on other side of the road and 3 being built at stones throw away from Crescent Bay houses The open area on Sobhas ground floor is 6 meter only much below the segregation requirements for high rises attached So the residents of atleast 300 houses Crescent Bay will be constrained for ventilation for houses which we paid premium money for This apathy of SRA apalls me to no end Are we made to suffer on our quality of life because we are law abiding tax paying citizens and thus are of no care to SRA In what world making people who invested their hard earned money in what was supposed to be dream house okay Please note that these are residential towers and not commercial buildings which rely on AC and artificial lighting I urge you to take cognizance of this and please revisit the SRA development plan for Jer Bai Wadia road At the outset please a spread high rise towers to other areas and put a stay on Sobha Inizio urgently b keep atleast 20m open space on each side of the building as originally envisaged in DCPR as attached for both safety and convenience of residents c evaluate other areas like Wadala to relocate slum residents
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
Say letter issued to developer
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765457684562_2078_Screenshot_2025-12-11-18-24-28-21_40deb401b9ffe8e1df2f1cc5ba480b12.jpg

GRI/2025/1359
Complaint Against Illigal Construction and Usasge of the Common Area for personal belongings
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Sandeep Ishwar Pote10/12/202510/12/20250
I am a permanent resident of the above address and I respectfully bring to your notice that the common areas of our building and nearby buildings under Nav Maharashtra Co Operative Housing Society are being blocked due to various household goods kept in corridors staircases and passages In certain locations small unauthorised extensions or structures are also visible These conditions are creating a serious risk to the safety of all residents and may severely obstruct movement and evacuation during any fire or medical emergency The presence of furniture flammable material and other items in the common passage is restricting fire exits and emergency access Children senior citizens and persons with health concerns face great difficulty in moving through these blocked areas The fire safety system including alarms pumps and hydrants requires immediate inspection to confirm whether they are working in accordance with required safety norms Some portions of the common area appear to be altered without approval Any change in a common area requires proper permission from competent authority Use or construction without authorisation raises serious issues related to building safety compliance and structural risk Therefore there is a need for detailed inspection in accordance with municipal rules planning regulations and fire safety requirements It is understood that the building has received an occupation certificate Though no developer or supervising authority is currently involved on site it is important that the concerned departments review compliance update records and ensure that the safety of residents is fully protected In view of these concerns I request the following administrative action in the interest of public safety Joint inspection by BMC SRA Fire Brigade Police Department and the Housing Society at the earliest Immediate removal of all obstructions from passages corridors and staircases through lawful direction A fire safety audit by the Mumbai Fire Brigade and written communication of the findings to the residents Clarification to the residents and the society regarding the current status and compliance relating to the occupation certificate Administrative action under applicable laws if any violation is found that affects resident safety
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
Say letter issued to developer
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765387549665_3640_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-11-20%20at%2011.41.16.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765387560671_1459_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-11-20%20at%2011.41.15.jpeg

GRI/2025/1349
Regarding Severe Delay and Negligence in Issuing Allotment Letter
Hon. Secretary (SEC)
SANDESH SUBHASH SAPKAL
09/12/202509/12/20250
To The Hon Secretary SEC Slum Redevelopment Authority Respected Sir I am writing to bring to your notice the extremely disappointing and discouraging experience I have faced with your Cooperative Department regarding the issuance of my allotment letter I have visited the department 5 6 times since last November submitted every required document well within time and followed the complete procedure diligently However in spite of this I still have not received my legally entitled allotment letter At the same time several individuals are openly obtaining their allotments by paying bribes of 40000 45000 As a Grade A Class-1 officer myself this situation has been deeply distressing People in my society have started questioning my integrity and even asking my parents whether their son is truly a Class 1 officer This has caused immense emotional stress and disappointment Sir your organisation recently won the Scotch Award yet my personal experience with the Cooperative Department has completely shaken my faith in the institution Due to this continued negligence I have lost confidence in the system and have already started preparing for the RBI examination with the intention of soon leaving state service I request your urgent intervention in this matter I am attaching all the required documents with this email for your immediate reference and necessary action Thank you
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
सदरचे वाटप संस्थास्तरावर झालेले असल्याने आपणांस वाटपपत्र देता येणार नाही.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765264273013_3216_Adobe%20Scan%2014%20Nov%202024%20(1).pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765264297529_1278_IMG_6677.JPG,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765264319128_1072_Adobe%20Scan%2018%20Feb%202025.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765264324793_5711_Adobe%20Scan%209%20Jul%202025.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1765264332224_7818_IMG_6678.JPG

illegal renting of an SRA flat situated at flat no 708 of rekha gedam at Jeevan Jyot Chs YCS school utkarsh nagar bhandup west 400078 SRA flats are provided to eligible residents with the intent of rehabilitation not for commercial gain or subletting purposes This practice not only undermines the integrity of the SRA scheme but also deprives legitimate beneficiaries of their rightful housing That it is further noted that her son Mr Shailesh Gedam is residing in the same SRA building and is equally complicit in this illegal act by willful ignorance of the law and deliberate non compliance with the rules It is therefore requested that your office may kindly take cognisance of this violation and initiate appropriate proceedings against the concerned allottees in accordance with law I humbly request your office to kindly initiate a spot inspection of the premises to verify the facts and take immediate and appropriate action against the concerned allottees for indulging in fraudulent and unlawful activities

GRI/2025/1338
Urgent Request for Safe Access and Site Inspection Jivdanimata and Sai Shraddha SRA Project
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Nagesh Sawant05/12/202505/12/20250
The project is Jivdanimata Sahakari Griha Nirmana Sanstha and Sai Shraddha Sahakari Griha Nirmana Sanstha and the developer is TOBUSOL MANAGEMENT SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED Due to partial demolition the main access pathway has been damaged and residents are forced to walk through debris which is unsafe The developer is preparing to install fencing at the construction site but no alternative safe passage has been provided This situation will create serious difficulties for senior citizens women children and patients Excavation work is being carried out without any safety arrangements and some partially demolished houses are still occupied which has made the pathway narrow Large dump trucks are moving continuously which has increased the risk of accidents The internal committee members who represent the residents are not paying attention to these serious issues and therefore residents are not getting any support or guidance Our expectations are as follows A joint site inspection should be carried out in the presence of SRA BMC and Police All work that blocks or restricts the access path must be stopped until a safe alternative passage is made available A proper safe and walkable temporary route should be constructed for residents The developer must be instructed to immediately implement safety measures such as barricades warning signs and lighting All debris and waste on the access path should be removed and the passage should be kept clean A written assurance should be taken from the developer that residents will not be obstructed from accessing their homes
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
Noted. Developer has informed the grievances and appropriate action will be taken by developer

GRI/2025/1318
Complaint Regarding False Allotment List Submitted by Builder and Request for Immediate Verification
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Savitri Shyamdhar Dubey
27/11/2025459979
I Shesh Bhrigu Nath Mishra - Son of Late Mr Bhrigu Nath M Mishra - also known as BM Mishra an eligible Beneficiary of the SRA Scheme of Irani Wadi Rehab Building No 1 IRANIWADI - CTS no 102 - 1 to 81 of village pahadi Goregaon East Taluka Borivali Mumbai - Slum Rehabilitation Scheme Iraniwadi SRA CHS LTD UNDER of Reg 33 -10 and 30 of DCPR 2034 would like to bring to your immediate attention several serious irregularities committed by the developer while submitting documents for obtaining the part Occupation certificate - Part OC It has come to our notice that the builder has submitted a false and manipulated allotment list to the SRA On verification we found that the Flat shown as allotted to us in Rehab Building no 1 - C Wing - Flat no 526 - annexure no 503 in the submitted documents have already been sold to third parties instead of being given to the actual eligible beneficiaries further we found that half of the current occupants in the rehab building no 1 are not the rightful beneficiaries and the allotment claims made by the builder are completely misleading when we questioned the builder issue a letter stating that our names were Mistakenly included in the allotment list and assured that the details would be re-verified and tenement would be allotted in the new building However this explanation is not acceptable as such errors directly affect our rehabilitation rights and indicate deliberate misrepresentation we also fail to understand how SRA officials conducted the survey and approved such a false allotment list despite the discrepancies being clearly visible on ground Furthermore the construction on site is not as per SRA approved plans and several illegal occupations - structural changes and unauthorized activities are currently ongoing inside the rehab building no 1 in view of the above we humbly request you to Initiate an immediate inquiry in to the false allotment list submitted by the builder for obtaining the part OC Verify the actual eligibility and rightful allotments of all tenements in the building Remove our names from the false allotment list that has been wrongly submitted without our consent Alternatively grant us rightful possession of the flats falsely sown in our name until the verification process is completed Take strict action against the developer for misrepresentation and violation of SRA Rules we trust that the SRA will safeguard the rights of genuine beneficiaries and ensure transparent and lawful implementation of the rehabilitation Scheme we request an urgent intervention to prevent further injustice Rightful Beneficiary of the SRA scheme of Irani Wadi
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
सदर प्रकरणी नियमानुसार उचित कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1764244383198_8254_complete%20503.pdf

Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Savitri Shyamdhar Dubey
27/11/20254599810
I Savitri S Dubey an eligible Beneficiary of the SRA Scheme of Irani wadi Rehab Building no Irani wadi CTS no 102 1 to 81 of village Pahadi Goregaon East Taluka Borivali Mumbai - SLUM rehabilitation scheme -Iraniwadi SRA CHS LTD Under Reg 33 10-30 of DCPR 2034 would like to bring to your immediate attention several serious irregularities committed by the developer while submitting documents for obtaining the part Occupation certificate - Part OC It has come to our notice that the builder has submitted a false and manipulated allotment list to SRA On verification we found that the flats shown as allotted to us in Rehab Building no 1 - D wing- Flat no 335 - annexure no 501 in the submitted documents have already been sold to third parties instead of being given to the actual eligible beneficiaries we also came to know almost half of the current occupants in the Rehab building no 1 are not the rightful beneficiaries and the allotments claims made by the builder are completely misleading when we questioned the Builder he issue a letter stating that our names were mistakenly included in the allotment list and assured that the details would be re-verified and tenement would be allotted in the new building However this explanation is not acceptable as such ERROR directly affect our rehabilitation rights and indicate deliberate misrepresentation we also fail to understand how SRA Officials conducted the survey and approved such a false allotment list despite the discrepancies being clearly visible on ground Furthermore the construction on site is not as per SRA approved plans and several illegal occupations - structural changes and unauthorized activities are currently on going inside the Rehab Building no 1 in view of the above we humbly request you to - Initiate an immediate inquiry into the false allotment list submitted by the builder for obtaining the part OC Verify the actual eligibility and rightful allotments of the tenements in the building Remove our names from false allotment list that has been wrongly submitted without our consent Alternatively grant us rightful possession of the flats falsely shown in our name until the verification process is completed Take strict action against the developer for misrepresentation and violation of SRA rules we trust that SRA will safeguard the rights of the genuine beneficiaries and ensure transparent and lawful implementation of the rehabilitation scheme we request an urgent intervention to prevent further injustice Rest complete details mention in attachment
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)

GRI/2025/1272
Complaint Regarding Disqualification of Society Secretary Acting Without Membership
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Nithin Shinde17/11/2025459879
This is to bring to your notice that Mr Laxman D Katkar who previously held the position of Secretary of our society has sold his flatshare certificate and therefore ceased to be a member of the society Despite this he continues to function as Secretary As per the Maharashtra Co-operative Societies Act 1960 and associated rules a non-member cannot hold any office-bearer position in a co-operative housing society I request you to Verify the membership status of Mr Katkar Disqualify him from the post of Secretary if found no longer eligible and Initiate steps to conduct a lawful election for the vacant post Kindly take appropriate action as per the provisions of the Act
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
महाराष्ट्र सहकारी संस्था अधिनियम 1960 नुसार योग्य ती कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल्.

AdminSurekha Satish Shirode13/11/2025459839

Competent Authority -6Resolved
आपल्या तक्रारीच्या अनुषंगाने आपणास कळविण्यात येते की, आपल्या तक्रार अर्जात आपणास आवश्यक असलेल्या माहितीचा बोध होत नाही. तरी आपणास आवश्यक असलेल्या माहितीसह व आवश्यक त्या कागदपत्रासह सक्षम प्राधिकारी-6, झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण,बृहन्मुंबई, अनंत काणेकर मार्ग, स्टेशन जवळ, वांद्रे (पूर्व), मुंबई-4000 051 या कार्यालयाकडे अर्ज सादर केल्यास या कार्यालयास पूढील कार्यवाही करणे शक्य होईल.

155
GRI/2025/1261
Objection to Neel Gagan SRA Scheme and Request for Immediate Action on CTS No 1845 Pt Shraddhanand Road Vile Parle East Mumbai 400057
Town PlannnerJaywant Ganesh Redkar13/11/2025459839
Respected Sir We the undersigned are the structure owners IMLA Malak of the property bearing CTS No 1845 Pt admeasuring 255 sq meters located at Shraddhanand Road Vile Parle East Mumbai 400057 falling under K East Ward Our ownership and possession of the said property since 1981 are duly reflected and updated in the Property Card records However we wish to bring to your attention that our plot has been wrongly declared as a slum area without our consent or any prior intimation Further an SRA scheme has been applied on our plot by nearby hutment residents without our knowledge consent or participation It is further noted that the Neel Gagan SRA Scheme has received LOI approval and that the rehabilitation component is reportedly completed however our eligible PAP Project Affected Person structures have not been provided any rehabilitation benefitsShockingly under the same road widening public project the BMC Planning Authority demolished our structures and allotted PAP tenements at Anik Gaon Mahul Chembur which is contrary to due process and in violation of the PAP Rehabilitation Circulars and Guidelines We therefore request your urgent intervention in this matter as this appears to be a clear case of land encroachment and misuse under the SRA scheme carried out without granting due benefits to the legal landholders and eligible PAP hutments Accordingly1 We strongly object to the ongoing Neel Gagan SRA Scheme being implemented on CTS No 1845 Pt 2 We request you to immediately stop hold or cancel the development of the said scheme until this issue is thoroughly investigated 3 We further request that rehabilitation and or monetary benefits due to us as per SRA and PAP regulations be duly extended Lastly please find attached herewith a copy of the legal notice and property card dated 2nd December 2024 already submitted to your office in connection with this objection We seek your kind attention and prompt action in this matter
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
The complaint is forwarded to Developer / Architect for his say / explanation regarding the issue mentioned in the complaint letter
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1763032983099_7629_Notice%20to%20RG%20corporation%20developers%20(5).pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1763033004662_9003_CTS%20MAp.pdf
156

GRI/2025/1248
Regarding obtaining details of the action taken on the letter sent to the Senior Police Inspector Kurla Police Station in connection with Kurla Mahananda Nagar Co-operative Housing Society Ltd CR No 1092014 under Sections 465 468 471 34 of the Indian Penal Code
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Shailesh Patil11/11/20254598210
With reference to the above subject this is to bring to your notice that our office had earlier requested information regarding the letterhead dated 10 January 2011 related to Kurla Mahananda Nagar Co-operative Housing Society Limited The document is recorded under File Number SRA ENG 1226 L MHL LOI Bundle Number 02 Page Number 971 The purpose of seeking this information was to verify the authenticity of the said letterhead and to determine the role and relevance of the document in connection with the housing society matter under the above mentioned Crime Register Number The requested information relates to identifying the person who submitted the letterhead the date on which it was received by your office and the entry or acknowledgment details made at the time of its submission Additionally we sought clarification regarding whether this document was used in any further decision making or administrative activity This information is crucial to determine if forged documents were used for obtaining any undue benefit or for misleading any government authority Till date no action taken report or any detailed communication has been received from your office regarding the status of our request Since the matter involves allegations under sections relating to forgery fabrication of documents and the use of such documents for personal or unlawful gains timely and accurate information is necessary for establishing the facts and ensuring a transparent investigation We therefore request your office to kindly provide the following Details of the action taken by your office on our earlier communication Whether an inquiry has been conducted to verify from whom and when the said letterhead dated 10 January 2011 was received If the inquiry has been completed kindly furnish a copy of the report or the findings to our office If the inquiry is still in progress kindly provide the current status report including the stage of inquiry and expected date of completion Please note that this information is required for maintaining accurate official records and is essential for further administrative procedures and legal actions including submissions under the Right to Information Act if required Timely availability of this data will help in advancing the matter without unnecessary delays We request that the above information be provided within 7 days from the receipt of this communication Your cooperation in the matter will be appreciated
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
अभिलेख कक्षाच्या तपासणी केल्यानंतर कळविण्यात येईल.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1762863284729_7865_Adobe%20Scan%2008%20Nov%202025.pdf

This complaint is against granting a partial occupancy certificate to the developer for the sales units without taking into account the actual situation created due to the negligence of your departmental officers and their collusion with the developer
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Pradip Laxman Singh10/11/20254598110
Please note that due to the negligence of your departmental officers and their collusion with the developer a partial occupancy certificate was issued to the developer of Sai Durga Society in Santacruz West without verifying the actual situation This is despite the fact that the said developer failed to pay the partial occupancy fees for the previous rehabilitation building and the cheques issued by him have bounced The officers are concealing the true situation from you and helping the developer Therefore on November 9 2025 a survey was conducted by vigilant members of the society the details of which are being presented to you We also have video footage of this survey which suggests that your departmental officers have accepted bribes from the developer to facilitate this outcome An investigation into this matter is necessary
Executive Engineers-2 (EE-2)

GRI/2025/1238
Buildings - Unauthorized alterationrenovation of building Ashirwad SRA CHS society CTS No 755 Mulund West Mumbai 400080
Executive Engineers-5 (EE-5)
Francis Fredericks09/11/20254598010
Dear Respected Sir The Ashirwad SRA CHS society CTS No 755 Mulund West Mumbai 400080 Society committee has done the alteration which has weakened the structure of the building As per the SRA plan there was no entrance of the building it was a welfare office which was assigned to the building committee The society committee has broken the welfare office and made an entrance which has weakened the structure of the building Which can result in major disaster for society members I have included the disaster Management department so that future disasters can be avoided Please do a structure audit and the SRA department will never provide such kind of structure changes in the building Please set an example so that in future no society committee will play with the lives of the society members I am attaching the video of entrance and Allotment letters of rooms Please take strict action
Executive Engineers-4 (EE-4)
ResolvedLetter sent to society-

our absence a complainant filed a complaint with the SRA Subsequently an SRA Officer visited my premises for verification At that time the officer met my friend mother who had come to clean the house Based on this visit the officer prepared an incorrect report falsely stating that an unauthorized or illegal person was residing in my flat I wish to clarify that from the date of allotment till today I have been residing in my allotted flat and no unauthorized person has ever occupied it Therefore the report prepared by the SRA Officer is completely wrong and misleading On 23rd March 2024 I tickets as proof of my visit to my native place during that period I have already submitted an affidavit during the hearing but despite this your office has passed an order against me If my written clarification and evidence including the railway tickets are not accepted then kindly inform me how I can further clarify my position The railway tickets are sufficient proof of my travel My friendcaretaker also appeared during the hearing and produced his Aadhaar card but the department did not take his signature or consider his statement Hence I humbly request you to rectify the GRI/2025/1199
Complaint Against Assistant Engineer Jaitapkar and Sub Engineer Dinesh Bhonsle for Non Implementation of MRTP Act Section 53 1 Notice Dated 07 02 2025 Regarding Unauthorized Construction at CTS No 838 B 838 B 1 to 90 840 841 pt 841 1 to 53 and 58 to 63 Village Malad P North Ward Malad West Mumbai Reference 1 Complaint letter dated 16 09 2025 Dispatch No 82350 addressed to CEO SRA 2 Reminder letter dated 09 10 2025 Dispatch No 87579 regarding the same matter
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Afzal Shaikh01/11/2025459708
Respected Sir I Afzal Shaikh President of Satyagraha Samajik Vikas Seva Sanstha NGO bring to your attention the continued inaction and deliberate non enforcement of the valid statutory notice issued under Section 53 1 of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act 1966 dated 07 February 2025 Notice No SRA ED OW 2024 PN W 5699 Despite issuance of this notice no action has been taken by Assistant Engineer Jaitapkar and Sub Engineer Dinesh Bhonsle of SRA P North Ward against the unauthorized construction of the 31st 32nd and 33rd floors carried out by Bahubali Developers and Mundara Developers at the above property Background The SRA issued a stop work notice on 16 February 2023 directing the developer to stop construction beyond approved plans Inspection reports confirm that three illegal floors were built after the stop work order Accordingly a notice under Section 53 1 was issued on 07 February 2025 directing the developer to restore the structure within 30 days Despite the expiry of this period no demolition or prosecution has been carried out and the unauthorized floors remain in use Failure of Duty Under the MRTP Act Section 52 declares unauthorized development an offence Section 53 1 mandates demolition of illegal work after non compliance Section 53 6 allows prosecution of both the violator and negligent officers Section 152 empowers officers to enforce compliance The inaction of both officers constitutes dereliction of duty violation of the Maharashtra Civil Services Conduct Rules and abetment of illegal construction This also defies Supreme Court rulings such as Esha Ekta Apartments versus MCGM and Priyanka Estates versus State of Assam which require demolition of illegal structures Consequences 1 Legitimising illegality and financial gain to the developer 2 Loss of public trust in SRA 3 Revenue loss to the state exchequer 4 Risk to public safety due to unapproved structures Prayer for Action 1 Enforce immediate demolition under Section 53 1 and 53 6 of the MRTP Act 2 Suspend and conduct departmental inquiry against AE Jaitapkar and SE Dinesh Bhonsle 3 Initiate prosecution under Sections 52 and 53 6 of the MRTP Act and related IPC provisions 4 Blacklist the developers and cancel the licence of the project architect 5 Refer the case to the Anti Corruption Bureau and Lokayukta for independent investigation 6 Submit a compliance report within 15 days The continued negligence of these officers has damaged public trust and the credibility of the SRA Immediate and strict action is necessary to uphold the rule of law and accountability Yours faithfully Afzal Shaikh President Satyagraha Samajik Vikas Seva Sanstha NGO
Executive Engineers-5 (EE-5)
Resolved
Action under section 53(1) & 53(6) of MRTP act is already taken as per law.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761997043049_6505_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-28%20at%209.33.10%20PM%20(1).jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761997057710_3301_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-28%20at%209.33.10%20PM.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761997126315_8211_sra_cc.pdf
206
GRI/2025/1198
REQUEST REGARDING OUTSTANDING RENT PAYMENT APPLICATION SUBMITTED ONLINE GEN2025609
Assistant Registrar (Western)
SHRIKANT PUNDLIK MORYE
01/11/2025459708
I SHRIKANT PUNDLIK MORYE RESIDE SAI DURGA SRA CO OPRATIVE HOUSING SOCIETY LTD PM ROAD KHOTWADI SANTACRUZ WEST MUM 54 WISH YOU INFORM YOU THAT I HAD SUBMITTED AN APPLICATION FOR PENDING RENT PAYMENT THROUGH YOUR ONLINE SYSTEM ON 18 JUNE2025 GRI2025609 I ALSO SUBMITTED THE PHYSICAL COPY OF APPLICATION IN YOUR OFFICE 9TH DEC 2024 HOWEVER I HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY RESPONSE FROM YOUR OFFICE SO FAR MY APPROVED RENT AMOUNT OF RS 253288 IN WORD RUPEES TWO LAKH FIFTY THREE THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED EIGHTY EIGHT ONLY HAS NOT YET BEEN CREDITED THEREFOR I KINDLY REQUEST YOU TO LOOK INTO THE MATTER AND TAKE NECESSARY ACTION TO RELEASE OUTSTANDING RENT AMOUNT AT THE EARLIEST
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved

GRI/2025/1195
Complaint against Assistant Engineer D B Patil and Sub Engineer Dubley for wilful inaction and collusion regarding unauthorised construction at Parishram SRA CHS Ltd CTS No 470 pt 471 pt Kandivali West Kandivali West Mumbai
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Afzal Shaikh01/11/20254597210
Respected Sir I Mr Afzal Shaikh President of Satyagraha Samajik Vikas Seva Sanstha NGO working for transparency and civic accountability wish to report grave administrative negligence wilful inaction and suspected collusion by Assistant Engineer D B Patil and Sub Engineer Dubley of the Slum Rehabilitation Authority Their failure to act on unauthorised construction at Parishram SRA CHS Ltd CTS No 470 pt and 471 pt Kandivali West Mumbai has resulted in violation of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act 1966 particularly Sections 53 1 and 53 2 Background On 12 August 2024 the Slum Rehabilitation Authority issued a statutory notice under Section 53 1 and 53 2 to Lakadawala Developers Pvt Ltd and their architect Mr Sameer V Kulkarni for unauthorised construction Despite the 30 day compliance period no demolition or prosecution has taken place even after nine months The structure remains intact reflecting a complete breakdown of enforcement Negligence and Breach of Duty Under the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act after expiry of the notice period officers are required to demolish the unauthorised work and file FIRs under Sections 52 and 56 Both the Assistant Engineer and Sub Engineer failed to comply thereby granting undue protection to the violators This constitutes wilful dereliction of statutory duty abuse of authority and violation of the Maharashtra Civil Services Conduct RulesChronology of Delay 12 August 2024 Notice issued no follow up 22 July 2024 Regularisation rejected no demolition 2 May 2025 FIR letter sent to Kandivali Police no action October 2025 Illegal floors still standing Demand for Action I request your office to 1 Suspend and initiate departmental inquiry against Assistant Engineer D B Patil and Sub Engineer Dubley for deliberate non enforcement 2 Refer the case to the Anti Corruption Bureau or Lokayukta under the Prevention of Corruption Act 1988 3 Order immediate demolition of all unauthorised work under Section 53 2 of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act 4 Blacklist the developer and cancel the architect licence for professional misconduct 5 Recover demolition costs from the concerned parties 6 Publish the action taken report under the Right to Information Act 2005 for public transparency Yours faithfully Afzal Shaikh President Satyagraha Samajik Vikas Seva Sanstha NGO
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
Say letter issued to developer
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761995613658_1764_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-19%20at%205.14.39%20PM.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761995668374_2068_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-19%20at%205.14.38%20PM%20(1).jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761995678693_1691_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-19%20at%205.14.38%20PM.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761995685635_5886_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-19%20at%203.57.52%20PM.jpeg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761995693869_9233_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-10-19%20at%205.14.39%20PM.jpeg

GRI/2025/1190
rievance regarding professional misconduct bias and procedural violations by Mrs Sheetal Deshmukh Competent Authority during the hearing on 28102025 and subsequent days
Competent Authority -7
Saurav Ganeh Chowdhury
30/10/2025459699
I am a genuine applicant in a long-pending SRA case I wish to lodge a formal complaint against Mrs Sheetal Deshmukh Competent Authority for gross professional misconduct and bias causing me severe hardship Unfair Hearing on 28102025 Mrs Deshmukh arrived one hour late for the scheduled hearing I was forced to stand while she her staff and the builder representatives Mr Siddhesh of Skoda Construction and their advocate were seated creating an intimidating atmosphere My request for a postponement until 03112025 as my advocate was unavailable was summarily rejected My written request was refused acceptance Mrs Deshmukh spoke harshly blamed me for the case two-year delay and openly sided with the builder She coerced me to sign the Roznama and gave only four days to file a reply threatening to close my file Systematic Obstruction and Harassment 28th-30th Oct After the hearing I needed documents to prepare my reply The office staff created impossible obstacles The internal dispatch system would have taken four days to move a letter to an adjacent office deliberately frustrating my urgent deadline On 29102025 I witnessed Mr Siddhesh the builder employee casually reviewing my file with Mr Avinash Pande while I was denied the same access This is a severe breach of procedure and confidentiality I request you verify this via CCTV footage Officers Mr Avinash Pande and Dr Mrs Sarika Kadam repeatedly denied me documents claiming they needed Mrs Deshmukh permission even when she was absent It took three days of travel lost wages and immense personal effort to obtain documents that should have been provided immediately My Humble Request I am a daily wage worker and this harassment has caused me significant financial and mental distress I request you to Transfer my case from Mrs Sheetal Deshmukh jurisdiction Initiate an inquiry into the misconduct of the officials involved Grant a reasonable extension to file my reply I trust you will intervene to deliver justice
Competent Authority -7Resolved
A reply has been given to you on 30/10/2025 regarding this matter. Requested to you Please take note.

215
GRI/2025/1189
Complaint against your department regarding the eligibility consider in the name of developer Mr Irfan Latif Sheikh or a member of his family for Annexure II Sr no 105 106 and 107 of Sai Durga Cooperative Housing Society
Competent Authority -3Pradip Laxman Singh30/10/2025459699
Your department has considered the eligibility of Annexure 2 Sr no 105 106 and 107 in the name of Mr Irfan Latif Shaikh who is the developer and partner of the Sai Durga SRA CHSL Whereas developers their partners or their family members are generally not eligible for free housing under the Slum Rehabilitation Authority based on their association with the development The SRA scheme is a public welfare measure intended to provide free housing to eligible slum dwellers who meet specific criteria Developers are entitled to the incentive Floor Space Index for the free sale component as consideration for fulfilling their obligations providing free housing and transit accommodation Developers are partners in the implementation of the scheme but their role is to construct the rehabilitation buildings and then recover their costs and earn profits by selling units in the free-sale component of the project in the open market Therefore look into the matter if your department has considered the eligibility in the name of Mr Irfan Latif Shaikh or his family members kindly revoke the order passed by your department because it is loss of revenue of Government of Maharashtra
Competent Authority -3Resolved
Please visit Competent Authority -3 SRA office along with proper documents.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761828023899_6082_Coputrised%20Copy%20of%20Change%20of%20director.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761828033471_8286_Loan%20Index.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761828047198_3021_Grievances%20date%2003%20march%202024.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1761828069869_3868_Complaint%20ID%20regarding%20change%20of%20developer.pdf

GRI/2025/1157
ilegal tanent of society account and corruption in society
AdminAbhishek22/10/2025459619
Please audit the government authority to the society all agm and dision please take action on tanent are not allowed in society as per SRA act and police verification also not getting by society society committee are created monopoly and not accountable please take action
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved

GRI/2025/1146
Biomatric survey started without any builder or individual projects submission


Competent Authority -8-20/10/20254596010
Biomatric survey started without any builder or individual projects submission


Competent Authority -8Resolved
सदर बायोमेट्रीक सर्वेक्षण हे शासनाने दिलेल्या निर्देशानुसार करण्यात येत असून सदर सर्वेक्षणाचा उद्देश हा क्लस्टर क्रमांका अंतर्गत आज रोजी किती झोपडया अस्तीत्वात असून कोणती कागदपत्रे त्याच्याकडे आहेत. जेणे करून भविष्यात सदर क्लस्टर क्रमांका अंतर्गत झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन योजना प्रस्तावित झाल्यास त्याबाबतची इंत्यंभुत माहिती झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन कार्यालयास व शासनाकडे असेल. सदर सर्वेक्षणाकामी कोण्त्याही संस्था अथवा विकासक यांच्या प्रस्तावाची आवश्यकता नाही.

GRI/2025/1107
Illegal construction at Amber Empire admitted in writing by both Builder and Architect
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Prashant Shah12/10/2025459519
I have submitted several complaint letters including one dated 26 June 2025 followed by your inadequate response dated 1 August 2025 Thereafter I filed a follow-up complaint on 23 September 2025 regarding the illegal construction carried out at the SRA redevelopment project Amber Empire Shanta Durga Marg BMC Colony Chedda Nagar Chembur West Mumbai 400089 bearing CTS No 556 Part of Village Chembur It is pertinent to note that the illegal construction has been admitted in writing by both the architect and the builder however no action has been taken in the matter till date to remove illegal construction under Section 33 and 38 of SRA Act 1971 Copies of all documents are attached herewith
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
In the subject matter, a notice under Sections 53(1) and 53(2) of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966 was issued to the developer of the scheme. Further, in accordance with Section 53(6) of the said Act, the matter was reported to Tilak Nagar Police Station for taking appropriate action as per the provisions of law. The matter is presently being pursued by Tilak Nagar Police Station.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1760262711773_1736_OnlineAttachement.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1760262724337_2062_AmberLetter.jpg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1760262727986_6170_ArchitectLetter.jpg

272
GRI/2025/1104
Request for Alternate Relocation at Original Location 400086
AGRCANUP BERA11/10/20254595110
We kindly request your support for alternate relocation at our original location Ghatkopar West Mumbai 400086 under the private builder Our residential and commercial premises were affected by the AGLR Project and we seek allotment within the same locality as per the rehabilitation scheme
Executive Engineers-4 (EE-4)
Resolved
The applicant is hereby informed that for seeking alternate relocation/allotment under the rehabilitation scheme, a separate application is required to be submitted to the Estate Manager, Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA).

The application shall be accompanied by all relevant and supporting documents/file papers, as prescribed under the prevailing SRA rules and procedures.

It is further clarified that any allotment, if considered, shall be examined and decided strictly on merits and in accordance with the prevailing policy, rules, and guidelines of the Slum Rehabilitation Authority, and no assurance can be given at this stage.

Accordingly, the applicant is advised to approach the Estate Manager, SRA, and follow the due process.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1760159319499_1894_bamshori%20(1).jpeg

GRI/2025/1086
Vikasakadun Honarya Trasabaddal
Assistant Registrar (City)
Ramdas Vasant Anerao09/10/2025459489
Vikasakadun Honarya Trasabaddal
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
आपल्या अर्जातील मुद्दा क्र ३ व ६ या कार्यालयाशी निगडीत आहे. तथापि नेमक्या कोणत्या सदनिका भाड्याने दिलेल्या आहे अथवा विक्री केलेल्या आहे याची स्वतंत्र तक्रार सहकार विभागाकडे करावी.जेणे करून त्यावर कार्यवाही करणे सुलभ होईल. तसेच मुद्दा क्र ६ बाबत सहकार कायद्यातील तरतुदीनुसार संस्था नोंदणीचा प्रस्ताव आल्यास त्यावर कार्यवाही करता येईल.या व्यतरिक्त चे मुद्दे अभियांत्रिकी विभागाशी निगडीत आहे.

GRI/2025/1080
Harrasment and Fraud against Senior citizen by Golden isle society - Restructuring Registrar departments
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
humendra Gupta08/10/2025459468
I am legal owner of flat 1403 in Golden Isle society with registered agreement dated 13072005 in my name directly from builder and with my name on list of original promoter members of society during society registration I do not live in the property since it is incomplete without OC BCC no BMC water and no fire and safety compliance making it inhabitable and risk to life Society is in complete violation of byelaws and also outright indulging in misrepresentation and fraud have illegally got 101 recover order passed against Shri Kantilal Gupta my deceased father has passed away in 19062005 well before society formation in 2010 further he is not owner of property Order no 35190 dated 08082023 and recovery notice no MDCHF SRO 2163A 2024 dated 26022024It is very surprising and disturbing how Asst Registrar could be so easily mislead and such a null and void 101 proceeding could be conducted and order passed exparte against a deceased person who is not even owner of the property With great effort and pursuation have got following orders passed a Order No 28330 dated 31052024 b Order No 62706 dated 28112024 to the society for including name of Humendra Gupta in share registrar as member of the society c Order No 5314 dated 18032025 appointment of officer for enforcing society to correct records in share registrar and issuing me share certificate Kindly also refer my complaint dated 18092025 to asst registrar of the Society managing committee unnecessarily harassing me with baseless allegations even after they have issued me share certificate in my name They continue to dispute my membership and allege property is my deceased fathers and that he is member without providing any legal evidence or proof ignoring all government records and orders Kindly also refer my response to the appeal hearing notice 202536608 dated 15092025 with Joint Registrar Appeals SRA dated 19092025 for non-maintainability of the appeal What is further shocking is how the appeal could have been even admitted on such an order obtained by fraud which is against a deceased person to attach it to me with criminal intent to usurp my property As pointed out by High Court recently there needs to be a serious investigation on the processes of the Registrars office leading to such blatant violation of laws causing great grievances and harrasment to me as a senior citizen All the orders and appeals need to be immediately set aside The managing committee of society needs to be dismissed without any further delay Thanks Humendra - 9930425394
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदर प्रकरणी नियमानुसार उचित कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1759932692705_1629_assit%20reg%20complaint%20180925%20(1).pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1759932713031_5587_complaint%20police%20and%20registrar%2007102025.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1759932729333_2729_letter%20to%20jt%20registrar%20appeal%2019092025%20(1).pdf

Competent Authority -8Sangita Chandu Ugrejia07/10/2025459458

Competent Authority -8Resolved

Rating: 1/5 | Feedback: मा. अपर जिल्हाधिकारी (अति./निष्का.) पुर्व उपनगरे यांच्याकडे अपिल दाखल करण्यासाठी मा. सक्षम अधिकारी-८ यांच्या आदेशाची प्रत लागेल. मा. सक्षम अधिकारी-८ यांनी आदेश पारित केल्याशिवाय मा. अपर जिल्हाधिकारी (अति./निष्का.) पुर्व उपनगरे यांच्याकडे अपिल दाखल करता येणार नाही

Dear Sir or Madam This is with reference to the reservation under Appendix II for plots PN 161 PN 162 to PN 174 and others in Survey Nos 355 355 267 307 355 352 356 355 357 355 411 443 491 491 1 and 4 in the SJA PN 16100226 zone I would like to bring to your attention that your office issued the final Appendix II on 27 October 2022 wherein under Serial Number 226 Reference Number SJA PN 169100226 my name has been recorded as Chetan Shantilal Satiya However this is incorrect due to an apparent clerical error My correct full name is Chetna Shantilal Satiya I humbly request that the name in Appendix II be corrected to reflect my correct name For your reference I am attaching a copy of my Aadhaar Card and the relevant page of Appendix II Furthermore I had submitted a formal request for this correction on 14 September 2025 along with a physical letter at your office Despite this the issue remains unresolved Subsequently the final allotment list dated 24 September 2025 also reflects the incorrect name I sincerely request you to kindly initiate the necessary correction at the earliest to avoid any further discrepancies or complications in the allotment process Thank you for your attention to this matter Yours faithfully Chetna Shantilal Satiya

GRI/2025/1061
No action on CA 8 Letter and Repeated Requests for House Survey and Biometric under Cluster No N 063 Bhim Nagar Ghatkopar West
Competent Authority -8Hitesh Shikne05/10/2025459449
My name is Ritika Mahesh Shikne resident of V M Pawar Chawl Tathagat Gautam Buddha SRA CHS Proposed Bhim Nagar Ghatkopar West Mumbai 400086 I have submitted multiple written requests to the CA8 Department for the survey and inclusion of my house in Annexure 3 under Cluster No N063 Once I received the letter from CA8 for the survey they told me to submit it to the biometric department I submitted it and the same person Avinash Jadhav took the letter and said he would come again for the survey He came after two to three weeks checked the house and electricity bill and said he would give a report but after that he did nothing After multiple visits to the biometric department he said he needed the signature of the builder and society on a simple paper punchnama I gave him the paper with the signature of a local neighbor but he said he needed the builder signature only I met the builder and the main society promoter but they refused to sign saying they would only sign if I showed an official SRA letter with an SRA letterhead It has been more than two months since I gave them the copy of the punchnama letter but they are still refusing to sign The person Avinash Jadhav appears to be acting dishonestly and seems to have taken money from the builder to delay my case He even marked survey numbers on locked houses but skipped my open house during his visit I request you to take strict action against such corrupt behavior and remove this person from his post It has now been six months since my first submission and still there is no progress I request immediate action to conduct the pending house and biometric survey as per the CA8 letter assign a valid house number under Cluster No N063 ensure inclusion of my name in the appropriate annexure and provide a clear timeline for completion This delay is causing severe hardship to my family and shows administrative negligence Please treat this as an urgent grievance Contact number 7021035078 Address V M Pawar Chawl Bhim Nagar Ghatkopar West Mumbai 400086
Competent Authority -8Resolved
सदर प्रकरणामध्ये प्रमुख भुमापक यांचा आपल्या झोपडीचा स्थळपहाणी अहवाल प्राप्त झाल्यानंतर या कार्यालयामार्फत पुढील योग्य ती कार्यवाही करण्यात येते. सदर अहवाल या कर्यालयास अघाप प्राप्त झालेला नाही.

306
GRI/2025/1055
आपल्या मा. कार्यालयामार्फत झेनिथ सहकारी गृहनिर्माण सोसायटी लि. यांना निर्देश द्यावेत की त्यांनी वरील सभेचे ऑडिओ/व्हिडिओ रेकॉर्डिंगची प्रत मला त्वरीत उपलब्ध करून द्यावी.
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Mehul M Haria 03/10/2025459429
प्रति,

मा. सहाय्यक निबंधक,

सहकारी संस्था,

एस.आर.ए., बांद्रा – ४०००५१



विषय: झेनिथ सहकारी गृहनिर्माण सोसायटी लि. यांच्या ८व्या वार्षिक सर्वसाधारण सभेच्या ऑडिओ/व्हिडिओ रेकॉर्डिंगची प्रत उपलब्ध करून देण्याबाबत विनंती.



महोदय,



मी, मेहुल हरिया, सदस्य – झेनिथ सहकारी गृहनिर्माण सोसायटी लि., फ्लॅट नं. A-902, झेनिथ, पी.के. रोड, मुंबई – ४०००८०, यामार्फत पुढीलप्रमाणे सादर करीत आहे –



दिनांक २८ सप्टेंबर २०२५ रोजी सोसायटीची ८वी वार्षिक सर्वसाधारण सभा घेण्यात आली.
सदर सभेच्या ऑडिओ/व्हिडिओ रेकॉर्डिंगची प्रत देण्याबाबत मी सोसायटीकडे विनंती केली होती.
परंतु, आजअखेर सोसायटीने मला ती प्रत उपलब्ध करून दिलेली नाही.
मा. सहकारी न्यायालय, मुंबई यांचा दिनांक २२ मार्च २०२१ रोजीचा निर्णय –
Sqn Ldr (Dr.) संजय आर. सीनव्हल (निवृत्त) विरुद्ध जलवायु विहार सेक्टर ‘A’ सीएचएस लि., पवई, मुंबई-४०००७६ या प्रकरणात असे ठरविण्यात आले आहे की सर्व सभासदांना सर्वसाधारण सभेचे ऑडिओ/व्हिडिओ रेकॉर्डिंग मिळण्याचा अधिकार आहे.
त्या अनुषंगाने, मला देखील दिनांक २८ सप्टेंबर २०२५ रोजी झालेल्या ८व्या वार्षिक सर्वसाधारण सभेचे ऑडिओ/व्हिडिओ रेकॉर्डिंग मिळण्याचा कायदेशीर हक्क आहे.




प्रार्थना:

आपल्या मा. कार्यालयामार्फत झेनिथ सहकारी गृहनिर्माण सोसायटी लि. यांना निर्देश द्यावेत की त्यांनी वरील सभेचे ऑडिओ/व्हिडिओ रेकॉर्डिंगची प्रत मला त्वरीत उपलब्ध करून द्यावी.



आपला नम्र,

मेहुल हरिया

सदस्य – झेनिथ सीएचएस लि.

फ्लॅट नं. A-902, झेनिथ, पी.के. रोड, मुंबई – ४०००८०
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
याबाबत संस्थेस सुचना देण्यात आलेल्या आहेत.
-

Complaint regarding forged documents submitted to SRA authority
Dy.Collector (Eastern)Ashti Prabhakar daple02/10/2025459419
I Smt Pratibha Prabhakar Daple hereby file a complaint that Smt Vijaya Sahebrao Patil has submitted fake documents to the SRA Authority to obtain a SRA house In this case she has submitted her School leaving Certificate and other documents in the hiring process held on 09th May 2023 and is presenting herself as the real sister of Shriram Thorat However in her school leaving certificate she has shown her name as Vijaya Kadtoji Thorat Based on these documents she has misled the SRA Authority I have filed a case against her and her sister Shubhangi Meghsham Patil at Andheri police station on 01 May 2025 FIR No 1097-Gen-2025 and as per the investigation conducted by Investigation Officer PO Jaysingh Patil in fact Vijaya Sahebrao Patil real name in school certificate is Vijaya Sahebrao Nahate In Zilla Parisjad Primary School Nahate in Akot Dist Akola in the school registeration no 561 her name is clearly mentioned as Vijaya Sahebrao Nahate She has deliberately cheated the government by creating a fake documents She has created fake school leaving certificate by the name Vijaya Kadtoji Thorat so that she can show her a real sister of Shriram Kadtoji Thorat Therefore you are requested to take immediate inquiry into the matter and take appropriate action against Vijaya Sahebrao Patil

Assistant Registrar (Western)
Surendra N Mayekar02/10/20254594210
I Ahmed Bahadurmiya Shaikh am the legal heir of Late Shri Bahadurmiya A Shaikh the original Annexure 2 allottee of Flat Number 702 Seventh Floor Shreeram SRA Cooperative Housing Society Yeshwantnagar Teen Dongri Pahadi Goregaon West Mumbai My father passed away on 13 December 2019 and since then the said flat has been illegally occupied by Ms Nujhat Haruun Shaikh who has no legal right to the premises She was only permitted temporary stay on sympathy grounds but later conspired with society members and others to create forged papers and even transferred the electricity account in her own name although my father was paralysed and incapable of signing any documents The society also acted illegally by issuing her a share certificate and NOC in violation of the ten year lock in period and SRA Circular 152 which mandates that the rights of a deceased allottee must only pass to the legal heirs I have been complaining to SRA for many years with proof but no effective action has been taken and meanwhile I am deprived of my only rightful home and have recently undergone angioplasty making my hardship worse Therefore I humbly request your office to immediately exercise powers under Section 3E of the Slum Act to evict the illegal occupant and hand over possession of Flat Number 702 to me as the sole legal heir of Late Shri Bahadurmiya A Shaikh
Assistant Registrar (Western)
