GRI/2025/898
Request for certified copies of SRA Circulars / Orders regarding Annexure-II entitlements under SRA Scheme.
Public Relations Department (PRO)
PRAKASH MANITAR14/09/2025459228
Subject: Request for certified copies of SRA Circulars / Orders regarding Annexure-II entitlements under SRA Scheme.
Respected Sir,
I, MOHAMMED UMAR SUNASARA
B206 AZIM NAGAR PATEL CHWL JOGESHWARI WEAST RAILWAY STATION 400102, wish to seek information under the RTI Act, 2005.
As per SRA Scheme, Annexure-II beneficiaries are entitled to permanent alternate accommodation / commercial premises free of cost. However, certain developers are demanding money for the area mentioned in Annexure-II, which is against the rules.
Therefore, kindly provide me certified copies of the following:

1. All circulars and orders issued by SRA which clarify that the area mentioned in Annexure-II (residential / commercial) has to be allotted free of cost to the listed beneficiary.
2. Any orders / guidelines which state that payment cannot be charged from beneficiaries for the Annexure-II entitlement in SRA Schemes.
3. Copies of Government Resolutions / Notifications (if any) confirming entitlement of Annexure-II beneficiaries as free of cost.
I am ready to pay the nominal photocopying / certification charges as prescribed.
Kindly provide the above information within the period prescribed under the RTI Act.
Thanking you,
Yours faithfully,
MOHAMMED UMAR SUNASARA
Mobile No: 9821271556
Date: 13/09/2025
Place: Mumbai
Deputy CollectorResolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/891
Subject: Strong objection to proposal submitted by M/s Meru Realty LLP on CTS Plot Nos. 127 & 128 & 128 (1-24) situated at H.P.K. Marg, Match Factory Lane, Kurla (W), Mumbai – 400070, (L Ward).
CTSOPrashant kakade12/09/20254592210

GRI/2025/889
Urgent Representation Regarding Electricity Bill unpaid by the Developer/Builder.
Dy.Collector (City)Kunal Sukhdev Ghode11/09/20254592110
Respected Sir,
We, the residents of PTC Building No. 2, Sairaj Gudiya Pada CHS, sincerely thank the Slum Rehabilitation Authority for providing us with good quality flats under the rehabilitation scheme for the residents displaced due to the road widening project at Valnai, Mith Chowki and Shankar Lane, Malad (Borivali Taluka).
While we are grateful for the quality of construction and safety of the locality, we regret to inform you of a grave and urgent issue concerning electricity supply in our building:
1. Our Builder/Developer, M/s. Transcon Sheth Creators Pvt. Ltd., has not paid the Tata Power electricity bill no.98875200695 & 98875200696 for the period 21.07.2025 to 20.08.2025, amounting to Rs. 2,43,110/- & Rs.1,58,582/-. A copy of the bill is enclosed herewith.
2. On 21st August 2025, Tata Power personnel visited the premises and disconnected the electricity supply due to the non-payment of the above bill. As a result, the entire building is without power supply, plunging all flats into complete darkness.
3. This disconnection has also led to shutdown of lifts, causing extreme inconvenience and serious hardship to residents, particularly senior citizens, children, and patients.
This situation is extremely unsafe and uninhabitable. We therefore request your urgent intervention with the concerned Builder/Developer and Tata Power authorities to:
• Direct the Builder/Developer to clear the pending electricity dues without delay.
We trust that you will treat this matter with utmost urgency and take necessary action to safeguard the rights and welfare of the residents.
Encl.: Copy of Tata Power Electricity Bills (21.07.2025 – 20.08.2025)
With respectful regards,
All Residents of PTC Building No. 2
Sairaj Gudiya Pada CHS, Sundar Lane
Malad (West), Mumbai – 400064
V
Dy.Collector (Western)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

आपणांस कळवु इच्चीतो कि, आपल्या विभागाने काम जलद गतीने व्हावे याकरिता ही Online प्रणाली चालु केली आहे. परंतु असे दिसून येत आहे कि या Online प्रणालीद्वारे आपणाकडे असणारी कामे हि अधिकच लेट होत आहेत तरी आपण या बाबतीत थोडासा विचार करावा हि विनंती.

GRI/2025/887
Grievance regarding addition of mother's name to Annexure 2 due to builder/society refusal to issue NOC
Assistant Registrar (City)
Sandeep Ramdhani Rajbhar
11/09/2025459209
This letter serves as a formal complaint regarding the inaction of Drishti Developers and Govind Nagar Rahivashi Seva Mandal in issuing a No Objection Certificate (NOC) for the purpose of adding my mother's name, Yashoda Ramdhani Rajbhar, to the official Annexure 2 document for our tenement.

Details of the matter:
The tenement holder is the legitimate owner of the above-mentioned property under the SRA scheme.
The mother, Yashoda Ramdhani Rajbhar, is an original occupant and legal heir. Her name should be included on Annexure 2 as per SRA guidelines for family members and original slum dwellers.
Despite repeated requests, the builder/society has unreasonably refused to provide the necessary NOC required to complete the administrative process with the office.
This refusal is creating an obstruction and is directly impacting the ability to exercise rights as a legitimate slum dweller under the Slum Act. Copies of correspondence with the builder/society are attached as proof of attempts to resolve this amicably.
Request for action:
The SRA is requested to intervene in this matter and direct Drishti Developers and/or Govind Nagar Co. Op. Society to issue the required NOC without further delay.
The office is urged to initiate the process for adding the mother's name, Yashoda Ramdhani Rajbhar, to Annexure 2.
All other required documents, such as copies of Aadhaar cards, Annexure II, and proof of residence, are ready to be submitted to facilitate a swift resolution of this grievance.
It is expected that the SRA, in its role as the governing authority, will take appropriate action to ensure the rights of slum dwellers are protected and that such unreasonable obstacles are removed.
Thank you for your time and consideration.

Yours sincerely,
Sandeep Ramdhani Rajbhar s/o Ramdhani Rajbhar
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदर तक्रारीतील मुद्दाबाबत नियमानुसार उचित कार्यवाही करण्यात येईल.

GRI/2025/883
DELAY IN TRANSFER OF RENT DEPOSITED WITH THE SRA TO THE APPLICANT'S ACCOUNT & OTHER ARREARS OF TRANSIT RENTS
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Surendra Gupta10/09/20254592010
APPLICANTS: 1) Navalben Karia and 2)Surendra Gupta.
Ref: 1) SRA/Secretary/HC Dir/ Andheri Rambaug CHS/47/2024 dated 18/10/2024.
2) SRA/CO/OW/8800/2024 dated 16.2.2024. 3) SRA/CO/OW/1516/2024 dated 12.2.2025.
There has been a long delay in transferring the transit rent payments relating to the applicants in spite of the referred orders passed in the matter. As per the letter of the developer, M/s Vijayalaxmi Builders & Contractors dated 1.8.2023/18.8.2023 to you, he had deposited the rent cheques with the authority.
1) However, Rs 5,00,000/-(Rupees Five Lakhs only) each was only credited into the accounts of Mr Kantilal Karia and Mrs Navalben Karia along with Rs 2,50,000/- (Rupees Two Lakhs fifty thousand only) into the accounts of Mr Surendra Gupta as on 4.3.2025.These rent receipts pertains to the five shops/residence of the applicants which have not been provided with the permanent alternate accommodations.The rent so deposited is from 7.4.2022 till 5.5.2024.So another 14 months has already passed by for which the rent amounting to Rs 7,00,000/-[rupees seven lacs only)(RS 10000×14×5) is not deposited nor demanded by the authority from the developer.
2) Also balance deposited amount of Rs 3,20,000/-(Rupees Three Lakhs Twenty thousand only), Rs 1,60,000/-(Rupees One Lakh Sixty thousand only) and Rs 1,60,000/-(Rupees One Lakh Sixty thousand only) pertaining to Mr Kantilal Karia, Mrs Navalben Karia and Mr Surendra Gupta respectively is left unpaid to us even after passing of considerable time period.
3) Further the transit rent for the eligible Shop no 20 that was not deposited by the developer since the beginning ,has also been ignored by this authority in spite of our reminder through our letter dated 27.1.2025 & 10.3.2025.
4) It is to be noted that shops mentioned in the Annexure II of the scheme at serial no 17,18,20,21 and 22 have been rehabilitated in the sale building with the issue of possession letter dated 4.3.2025 from the ESTATE MANAGER,SRA as shop no 1,6,7,8 and 9.However the transit rent for these shops have been deposited only till 7.8.2023 by the developer. So 19 months rent has been outstanding thereafter till the possession date. So the outstanding rent for these 5 shops amounts to Rs 9,50,000/-(Rupees Nine lacs fifty thousand only).[Rs 10,000×19×5]The authority has forgotten its own regulation that in a SRA scheme, a developer is required to pay transit rent till the tenements are provided with the new rehabilitation tenements.
5) So we request this authority to take note of the changes and non compliance of the developer in these aspects and take immediate appropriate actions at the earliest.
6) We request you to foresee the arisen accumulated transit rent [due to the obligation on the developer of continuing payment of transit rent until Permanent Accommodations are provided for the premises] to be deposited immediately by the developer with the SRA and then accordingly disbursed to us.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदरचा तक्रार अर्ज sra.gov.in या संकेतस्थळावर प्रसिध्द करण्यात यावा, आपली तक्रार निकाली काढणे सोईचे होईल.

GRI/2025/880
Complaint regarding fraudulent conveyance and illegal transfer of property – CTS No. [60,60/1 to 57) , Admeasuring area 2421.40 sq.mtr, Kondivita, Andheri (East), Mumbai
AdminRubina09/09/20254591910
To,
The Chief Executive Officer,
Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA),
Griha Nirman Bhavan,
Bandra (East), Mumbai – 400051.

CC:

The Officer-in-Charge, City Survey Office, Santacruz/Andheri

The Deputy Collector (Land Records), Mumbai Suburban District

The Senior Inspector, [Name of Police Station, Andheri/Santacruz]


Subject: Complaint regarding fraudulent conveyance and illegal transfer of property – CTS No. [60,60/1 to 57) , Admeasuring area 2421.40 sq.mtr, Kondivita, Andheri (East), Mumbai

Respected Sir,

We Rubina, Haseena & Zarina Abdul Memon, daughter of Late Abdul Latif, and a resident of Room No 220, Sect -23, Kopar Khairane, Navi Mumbai we are the one of the rightful legal heirs of the property situated at Kondivita, Andheri (East), Mumbai, bearing City Survey No. 60, 60/1 to 57 admeasuring 2421.40 sq.m (approx). We all came to know all fraud when we received Notice from City Survey office for recording our names by builder we have given objection letter. We started collecting documents from offices that time we came to know all fraud happened.

It has come to our knowledge that certain individuals, namely Mr. Nitin Khadtare (agent) and M/s Chandiwala Enterprises (builder), in collusion with others, have fraudulently executed documents such as Power of Attorney, Sale Agreement, and Deed of Conveyance in respect of the above property, without our knowledge or consent, and by using forged documents.

I bring to your attention that:

1. The said property is still recorded in the name of my late father Abdul Latif in the City Survey records.
2. No legal heirship or succession documents were ever submitted by us to authorize such transfer.
3. Despite this, the builder/agent has proceeded with fraudulent registration and development activities.
4. This constitutes a serious case of fraud, forgery, and illegal transfer under SRA and property laws.

In view of the above, I most respectfully request you to:

Cancel/hold the fraudulent conveyance and related approvals granted to the builder/agent.
Direct the City Survey Office to maintain the property in the name of Late Abdul Latif until rightful succession is established.
Initiate an inquiry into the fraudulent acts of the builder/agent and take necessary legal/administrative action.

Ensure that no further development or allotment is carried out under SRA on this land until the ownership dispute is resolved.


I request your urgent intervention to safeguard our legal rights and prevent irreparable loss to our family.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,
Rubina Abdul Meman (Cont No -8104218368)
Haseena Abdul Meman (Cont No -8369610277)
Zarina Meman (Cont No- 7021678859)
AdminResolved
Please Contact SRA office Along with Documents
-

Public Relations Department (PRO)
PRAKASH MANITAR09/09/2025459189
Ref: Amanshanti chs ltd Proposed SRA scheme on plot bearing CTS nos. 34/A, 34/1, 63, 63/1-2, 64, 64/1-2, Goregaon east Mumbai 400063

Subject: Clarification regarding acceptance of Aman Shanti CHS LTD under SRA Scheme and Proposal Number issue

Respected Sir/Madam,

I, CAFE KALPANA YASIN IBHRAHIM SUNESRA, Annexure No. 635, Aman Shanti CHS LTD, Hanuman Tekdi, Goregaon (East), Mumbai – 400063, am submitting this notice for your kind attention.
We have observed serious discrepancies regarding our society’s SRA scheme:

1. On the official SRA website and application, the name of *Aman Shanti CHS LTD* is not appearing under *Rent Option / Annexure*. This raises doubts whether our society’s name has been properly accepted in the SRA records or not.

2. The Proposal Number of our scheme is P-S/PVT/0054/20070323, wherein the Developer’s name should be *Indu Construction* and the Society’s name should be *Aman Shanti CHS LTD*.
However, when we enter this Proposal Number in the SRA application, it shows a different society name and a different developer name.

This indicates that either the Proposal Number is incorrect or there is some technical/record-related problem.

Therefore, we request you to:

Provide us written clarification whether our society’s name and developer’s name are correctly recorded under this scheme.
Rectify any errors in the records immediately, if found.
Provide the full and accurate status and details of this scheme without delay.

This notice is being sent to all concerned departments to avoid any future confusion or loss to the society members.

Your prompt action is highly expected.

Sincerely,

CAFE KALPANA YASIN IBHRAHIM SUNESRA
Annexure No. 635
Aman Shanti CHS LTD
Hanuman Tekdi, Goregaon (East), Mumbai – 400063

417
GRI/2025/876
* विषय:** SRA योजने अंतर्गत अपात्र लाभार्थ्यास पात्र घोषित केल्याबाबत तक्रार -अनेक्सचर क्र. 585, * अमन शांती SRA CHS लिमिटेड, हनुमान टेकडी, दीरवानी स्ट्रीट जवळ, गोरेगाव (पूर्व), मुंबई - 400063*
Competent Authority -6PRAKASH MANITAR09/09/2025459189
*प्रति, **

उप जिल्हाधिकारी व सक्षम प्राधिकारी-६०

झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण, प्रशासनिक इमारत, अनंत कानेकर मार्ग

वांद्रे (पूर्व), मुंबई - ४०००५१.

** विषय:** SRA योजने अंतर्गत अपात्र लाभार्थ्यास पात्र घोषित केल्याबाबत तक्रार -अनेक्सचर क्र. 585, * अमन शांती SRA CHS लिमिटेड, हनुमान टेकडी, वीरवानी स्ट्रीट जवळ, गोरेगाव (पूर्व), मुंबई - 400063*

** महोदय / महोदया, **

मी, खालील स्वाक्षरी करणारा/करणारी, आपल्या निदर्शनास एक गंभीर अनियमितता आणू इच्छितो/इच्छिते, जी SRA योजनेत लाभार्थी पात्रतेसंदर्भात आहे.

** लाभार्थ्याचे नाव:** साखरी बेन मंगलदास भानुशाली

**SRA योजनेचा अनेक्सचर क्रमांक: ** 585

** संबंधित सोसायटीचे नाव: ** * अमन शांती SRA CHS लिमिटेड *

**पत्ता:** हनुमान टेकडी, वीरवानी स्ट्रीट जवळ, गोरेगाव (पूर्व), मुंबई - 400053

वरील नमूद व्यक्तीस SRA योजनेअंतर्गत लाभार्थी म्हणून पात्र घोषित करण्यात आले आहे. तथापि, SRA च्या नियमांनुसार ती व्यक्ती ** पात्र नाही**, यासाठी कारणे खालीलप्रमाणे आहेतः

1. सदर लाभार्थीच्या नावावर ** आधीपासून एक खाजगी मालकीचा फ्लॅट / सदनिका आहे**, आणि संदर्भित संस्थांचे परिशिष्ट- २ चे अ. क्र. ५८५ च्या पात्रत्रेकरिता भरण्यात आलेला "प्रपत्र -अ स्वयंघोषणपत्र मध्ये ही सत्य लपवून चुकीचा आणि खोटी माहिती देऊन पात्रता करून घेण्यात आलेली आहे

2. सदर खाजगी फ्लॅटचे तपशील पुढीलप्रमाणेः

** फ्लॅट क्र. 102, ई-विंग, न्यू दिनडोशी संकल्प सिद्धी CHHS लिमिटेड,
न्यू म्हाडा कॉलनी, गोरेगाव (पूर्व), मुंबई - 400065**

3. लाभार्थी पात्रता ** सन 2014 मध्ये SRA च्या सचिवांद्वारे** निश्चित करण्यात आली होती, जी एकप्रकारे ** नियमभंग आहे**, कारण **SRA ने 2018 मध्ये काढलेल्या परिपत्रकानुसार, ज्या झोपड्यांची पात्रता मा. सचिव झो. पु. प्रा. यांनी ठरविले आहे ते झोपड्यांची पात्रतेची reverificatin गरजेचे आहे

ही बाब SRA योजनेचा ** दुरुपयोग** आहे आणि चुकीची माहिती देऊन योजनेंतर्गत अनधिकृत लाभ घेण्याचा प्रयत्न असल्याचे दिसते.

** म्हणून, आपणास नम्र विनंती आहे की:**

- या प्रकरणाची सखोल व निष्पक्ष चौकशी करण्यात यादी.

- अनेक्सचर क्र. 585 अंतर्गत देण्यात आलेली पात्रता ** तत्काळ रद्द** करण्यात यावी.

- संबंधित जबाबदार व्यक्तींवर ** कडक कारवाई** करण्यात यावी.

- SRA योजनेचा लाभ फक्त ** योग्य आणि पात्र लाभार्थ्यांनाच** मिळावा, याची दक्षता घेतली जावी.

संदर्भासाठी आवश्यक कागदपत्रे जोडण्यात आलेली आहेत.

आपल्या सहकार्याबद्दल आभारी आहे.

**आपला विश्वासू, **

नवीन पॅनल – अमन शांती सह. गृह संस्था मर्या. **

**हनुमान टेकडी, वीरवानी हॉटेल कल्पना, गोरेगाव (पूर्व), मुंबई - ४०००६३**
Dy.Collector (Western)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/875
Clarification regarding acceptance of Aman Shanti CHS LTD under SRA Scheme and Proposal Number issue
Assistant Registrar (Western)
PRAKASH MANITAR09/09/2025459178
Ref: Amanshanti chs ltd Proposed SRA scheme on plot bearing CTS nos. 34/A, 34/1, 63, 63/1-2, 64, 64/1-2, Goregaon east Mumbai 400063

Subject: Clarification regarding acceptance of Aman Shanti CHS LTD under SRA Scheme and Proposal Number issue

Respected Sir/Madam,

I, CAFE KALPANA YASIN IBHRAHIM SUNESRA, Annexure No. 635, Aman Shanti CHS LTD, Hanuman Tekdi, Goregaon (East), Mumbai – 400063, am submitting this notice for your kind attention.
We have observed serious discrepancies regarding our society’s SRA scheme:

1. On the official SRA website and application, the name of *Aman Shanti CHS LTD* is not appearing under *Rent Option / Annexure*. This raises doubts whether our society’s name has been properly accepted in the SRA records or not.

2. The Proposal Number of our scheme is P-S/PVT/0054/20070323, wherein the Developer’s name should be *Indu Construction* and the Society’s name should be *Aman Shanti CHS LTD*.
However, when we enter this Proposal Number in the SRA application, it shows a different society name and a different developer name.

This indicates that either the Proposal Number is incorrect or there is some technical/record-related problem.

Therefore, we request you to:

Provide us written clarification whether our society’s name and developer’s name are correctly recorded under this scheme.
Rectify any errors in the records immediately, if found.
Provide the full and accurate status and details of this scheme without delay.

This notice is being sent to all concerned departments to avoid any future confusion or loss to the society members.

Your prompt action is highly expected.

Sincerely,

CAFE KALPANA YASIN IBHRAHIM SUNESRA
Annexure No. 635
Aman Shanti CHS LTD
Hanuman Tekdi, Goregaon (East), Mumbai – 400063
📞 9821271556 / 7977717779
Email: kalpanahotelgoregaon@gmail.com
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
आपले तक्रारीच्या अनुषंगाने थकीत भाडेसंबंधित sra.gov.in या संकेतस्थळावर अमन शांती संस्थेचे नावाचा समावेश करण्यात येत आहे.

Leonard Fernandes 08/09/2025459168

420
GRI/2025/872
Request for Immediate Intervention Regarding Harassment and Misuse of Power by Mr. Prakash Mirchandani
AdminPravin Oswal08/09/20254591810
To Shri Mahendra Kalyankar ji Chief Executive Officer, SRA Slum Rehabilitation Authority, 03rd Floor, Administrative Building, Annat Kanekar Marg, Bandra East, Mumbai - 400051 Subject: Request for Immediate Intervention Regarding Harassment and Misuse of Power by Mr. Prakash Mirchandani (Flat No. 9) Namaskar Ji, On behalf of Mrs. Ria Nihalani, CTC 9619020566 resident of Flat No. 10, 10th Floor, Tulsi Apartments, Sindhi Immigrants Co-operative Housing Society Ltd., Chembur (East), Mumbai - 400071, I humbly bring to your kind attention a serious issue concerning harassment and misuse of power by Mr. Prakash Mirchandani (CTC 9320270867), owner of Flat No. 9 in our building. Mr. Mirchandani has alleged illegal encroachment by Mrs. Ria Nihalani on account of grill brackets purportedly extending into his property. However, we have already legally established that these grills lie well within the boundaries of Mrs. Nihalani’s flat and have been installed for several years with the full knowledge and acceptance of the Housing Society. Despite this, Mr. Mirchandani persists in harassing Mrs. Nihalani by raising baseless and frivolous grievances against these longstanding, permitted fixtures, which are neither illegal nor unusual. Moreover, he has repeatedly requested BMC officials to conduct inspections of Mrs. Nihalani’s flat, subjecting her and Mr. Manish Nihalani to continuous and unwarranted harassment. In addition to this, Mr. Mirchandani is reportedly exerting undue pressure on BMC officials and targeting the media by publishing advertisements in newspapers that aim to malign the reputation of Mrs. Nihalani and other residents. Furthermore, Mr. Mirchandani claims to be a Sub-Engineer with the Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA), Bandra, and appears to be misusing his official position to intimidate residents, including issuing legal notices without proper grounds, which constitutes an abuse of power. On behalf of Mrs. Ria Nihalani and other affected residents, I earnestly request your immediate intervention to halt this pattern of harassment and misuse of authority, and to ensure a peaceful and harmonious living environment for all the residents of our building. Thank you very much for your kind attention and support. Regards Pravin Oswal Chairman Vidhimanya Chamber of Commerce and Industry +91 91300 00069 chair@vidhimanya.org website www.vidhimanya.org
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
COMPLAINT PERTAIN TO BMC AS THE PLANNING AUTHORITY FOR THE SAID BUILDING IS BMC
-
421
GRI/2025/871
Request for Immediate Intervention Regarding Harassment and Misuse of Power by Mr. Prakash Mirchandani
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Pravin Oswal08/09/2025459168
To
Shri Mahendra Kalyankar ji
Chief Executive Officer, SRA Slum Rehabilitation Authority,
03rd Floor, Administrative Building, Annat Kanekar Marg,
Bandra East, Mumbai - 400051

Subject: Request for Immediate Intervention Regarding Harassment and Misuse of Power by Mr. Prakash Mirchandani (Flat No. 9)

Namaskar Ji,

On behalf of Mrs. Ria Nihalani, CTC 9619020566 resident of Flat No. 10, 10th Floor, Tulsi Apartments, Sindhi Immigrants Co-operative Housing Society Ltd., Chembur (East), Mumbai - 400071, I humbly bring to your kind attention a serious issue concerning harassment and misuse of power by Mr. Prakash Mirchandani (CTC 9320270867), owner of Flat No. 9 in our building.

Mr. Mirchandani has alleged illegal encroachment by Mrs. Ria Nihalani on account of grill brackets purportedly extending into his property. However, we have already legally established that these grills lie well within the boundaries of Mrs. Nihalani’s flat and have been installed for several years with the full knowledge and acceptance of the Housing Society.

Despite this, Mr. Mirchandani persists in harassing Mrs. Nihalani by raising baseless and frivolous grievances against these longstanding, permitted fixtures, which are neither illegal nor unusual. Moreover, he has repeatedly requested BMC officials to conduct inspections of Mrs. Nihalani’s flat, subjecting her and Mr. Manish Nihalani to continuous and unwarranted harassment.

In addition to this, Mr. Mirchandani is reportedly exerting undue pressure on BMC officials and targeting the media by publishing advertisements in newspapers that aim to malign the reputation of Mrs. Nihalani and other residents.

Furthermore, Mr. Mirchandani claims to be a Sub-Engineer with the Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA), Bandra, and appears to be misusing his official position to intimidate residents, including issuing legal notices without proper grounds, which constitutes an abuse of power.

On behalf of Mrs. Ria Nihalani and other affected residents, I earnestly request your immediate intervention to halt this pattern of harassment and misuse of authority, and to ensure a peaceful and harmonious living environment for all the residents of our building.

Thank you very much for your kind attention and support.

Regards
Pravin Oswal
Chairman
Vidhimanya Chamber of Commerce and Industry
+91 91300 00069
chair@vidhimanya.org
website
www.vidhimanya.org
AdminResolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/857
Request to freeze the disputed commercial gala/shop in redeveloped project at Kashmiri Building, Majas Road, Jogeshwari (E), CTS Nos. 60, 60/1–37, 192/74, due to illegal possession and violation of law.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Kishore S Mangle05/09/2025459149
I, the undersigned, respectfully submit this grievance on behalf of the legal heirs of Late Smt. Suvarnakanta Shantaram Mangle, the original Pagdi tenant of a shop and adjoining residential premises in Kashmiri Building, Majas Road, Prem Nagar, Jogeshwari (East), Mumbai, situated on CTS Nos. *60 (pt), 60/1–37, and 192/74 (pt), Village Majas, Taluka Andheri, Sub-District Bandra, now under redevelopment by M.K. Enterprises (M.K. Developers) under the SRA Scheme; after her demise, tenancy rights devolved on all her heirs namely Shri Kishore Shantaram Mangle, Shri Kiran Shantaram Mangle and Smt. Jyoti Pramod Kasar, but the builder has accepted only Jyoti Kasar’s name and entered into agreements with her, excluding the other heirs, and has further wrongfully taken possession of the disputed shop/gala, which originally belonged to Late Smt. Mangle, and is presently using it as his office even though the matter is sub judice before the Hon’ble Small Causes Court, Bandra, in RAD Suit No. 200160/2012; such occupation violates the principle of lis pendens under Section 52 of the Transfer of Property Act, 1882, the lock-in/capping restrictions under DCR 33(10), and amounts to fraud and cheating under Sections 415 and 420 IPC as well as criminal trespass under Sections 441–447 IPC; hence it is humbly requested that this Hon’ble Authority take immediate steps to seal the disputed shop/gala, call for verification of the tenant list and agreements submitted by the builder, and ensure that the tenancy rights of all legal heirs of Late Smt. Suvarnakanta Mangle are duly protected until the final decision of the Hon’ble Court.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1757080126914_2954_SRA%20Grievance%20Mangle%20Final%20(1).pdf
435
GRI/2025/855
Subject -DeteRmination of defaulters for not paying bmc water bills -OUTSTANDING 26 LAKHS- Notice received from the BMC Water Department, reflecting outstanding dues amounting to bills of more than 26 lakhs Names -VIJAY PANDEY- ,GANPAT UTTARWAR -ROOM NO D-6 ,UMESH DALVI -ROOM NO C-29 ,JAYANTI MAYAVANSHI PATEL ROOM NO B-8 ,KARANSINGH K SINGH-ROOM NO B-15 . NOTE - THESE ARE SOME OF THE BILLS THE AO HAS TO CONFIRM IN WHOLE
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Mohd.Nazir04/09/2025459139
To, 4 Sep 2025
1) Asst. Registrar ,SRA (ARS) ,
Smt Sandhya Bawankule,
Bandra East ,

From,
Senior Citizen Mr. Mohd. Nazir
Age: 62 years; Chawl No.B,, Room No. 12,
SukhShanti CHSL,Tunga Village, Shiv Shakti Nagar
Saki Vihar Road, Powai, Mumbai - 72.

Reference-
Refer Paripatrak dated 25/10/2011 with bearing no Ja.Kra. Visani/Mumbai/Housing/Prashasak Niyamavali/2011/7268 & subject :- Niyamavali / Prashasakiy Karmachari Aacharsanhita


ATTACHMENT -ATT1 -M NAZIR LETTER DETAILED SUBMISSISION (115 PAGES) TO ARS & OTHERS ACK.RECEIPT TAKEN ON 22 AUG 25- GEN/2025/76633
ATT2- BMC WATER BILLS-AROUND 26 LAKHS
Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th Sep 2024, issued by Housing Dept, was addressed to the Hon’ble CEO,asking for Tatkal Avhal. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830 forwarded to Asst . Registrar,SRA & others ).
Refer page no 103-104 of ATT1- for Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22.04.2025 from Deputy Secretary Sunil Tumbhare to HOn.CEO,SRA


Hon. Officer
With regards to abovesaid References, it is respectfully submitted that there has been consistent resistance, lack of governance, and non-compliance of GR ( 1 lakh BG, Indemnity bond ,not working in more than 3 society ) on the part of the Authorised Officer, Shri Ranjit Chavan. This has been well-documented through written letters and verbal complaints to the former Cooperative Officer, Shri Arvind Kamble, who himself had followed up on the matter.
The extent of such resistance is evident from the fact that certified copies were released only on 12th May 2025, despite repeated requests earlier on 15th June 2024 and 26th August 2024. Even RTI applications submitted to the Authorised Officer remained unanswered, compelling me to file a first appeal, which presently lies before your office.
During the hearing held on 8th July 2025 before the Assistant Registrar under Section 75 of the MCS Act., I, Mohd. Nazir, categorically stated that the Managing Committee has been collecting money since the days of the Original Society—Sukhshanti CHSL, registered with Konkan Bhavan, CBD Belapur in October 1996.
It is deeply disappointing to observe that despite repeated highlighting of the Developer–Managing Committee Nexus and their blatant violations of the MCS Act since 2013, the administrative responses have consistently favoured the said nexus. The Authorised Officer too appears complicit, concealing material facts from the records.
Furthermore, in Dec 2024, I submitted a written communication to the Deputy Registrar, Konkan Bhavan (L Ward) and Assistant Registrar, SRA, regarding a notice received from the BMC Water Department (Refer ATT-3).This was also informed to Shri Arvind Kamble in person.
the Returning Officer, Smt. Sujata Jagtap, has also been duly informed of these facts and has agreed to place same on record for your perusal.
PRAYERS
Ensure a necessary and lawful investigation into the fraudulent agreements and payments collected in the name of the society since 2008 and prior, up to date.


Take strict action to determine and fix liability upon the defaulters.


Direct that no further processing of society-related election matters shall take place until above investigations and determinations are duly completed, in the interest of overdue justice and transparency.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
kindly submit application under section of mcs act 154-b-29 for recovery of dues so accordingly recovery order is issued
-

GRI/2025/854
विषय : संस्थेच्या कार्यकारिणीवर कायदेशीर कारावाई करणेबाबत.
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Edna Menino Roudrigues
04/09/2025459139
संदर्भ : सुखकर्ता एस आर ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था मर्यादित, सह्याद्री नगर, क्वारी रोड, भांडुप (प ) मुंबई-७८. न. भू. क्र. २३७, हिस्सा क्र. १०५, भाग ३. महोदय/महोदया, आमच्या नगरातील मालक रहिवासी श्री. संदीप शशिकांत साळवी यांनी दिलेल्या दि. २५/०२/२०२५, २६/०३/२०२५ व २७/०५/२०२५ रोजीच्या तक्रार अर्जाच्या अनुषंगाने श्री. आनंदा पाटील सर यांची लेखा परीक्षक म्हणून दि. ०२/०४/२०२५ रोजी आपल्या विभागाने नियुक्ती केली. त्या अनुषंगाने उपरोक्त संस्थेचा लेखापरीक्षण अहवाल दि. २८ जुलै २०२५ रोजी प्राप्त झाला. श्री. साळवी यांनी वरील दिलेल्या तीन पत्राप्रमाणे संदर्भात दर्शविलेल्या संस्थेच्या कार्यकारिणीने न. भू. क्र. २३७ येथे राहात असलेल्या मालक रहिवाशांना विश्वासात न घेता भ्रष्ट पद्धतीने, मनमर्जीने केलेले कारभार करून मालक राहिवाश्यांची फसवणूक केली आहे असे सदर अहवालात प्रथम दर्शनी दिसून येत आहे तसेच स्पष्टही होत आहे. सदर संस्थेच्या कार्यकारणीने भ्रष्ट्र पद्धतीने कारभार करून विकासक आकार निर्माण प्रा. लि व आकार निर्माण प्रॉपर्टीच्या विकासक तसेच इतरांबरोबर संगनमत करून मालक रहिवाशांची फसवणूक केली आहे. तरी संबंधितांवर महाराष्ट्र सहकारी संस्था अधिनियम कायदा, १९६० कलम ७५ (१), ७५ (२अ), ७५ (२ख), ७५ (४), ७९(१), ८९, ७९(१अ)(एफ), ८०(३) आर/डब्ल्यू,१५४बी-२७, १५४ बी-८,८९,७३(१एबी), ८१/७५,१४६(पी), आणि ७३/३(१अब) व MRTP अंतर्गत कायदेशीर व कठोर कारावाई करावी.
Edna Roudrigues 9869765059
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/853
Letter No. 4 regarding corruption and fraud committed by the above-mentioned Society in violation of the MCS Act
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Edna Menino Roudrigues
04/09/2025459128
Ref. 1: क्र.तह/कुर्ला/जमीन/कलम-८०/कावी-३१/११५९/२०२२ Dated 25/11/2022.
Ref. 2: SRA/JTR/OW/2025/7543 Dated 2/4/2025
Ref. 3: S.R.A/ARES/OW/2025/11546 Cooperative Cell SRA/ Mumbai Dated 25/04/2025
Ref. 4: Correspondence dated 25.4.2025 by Shri. Sandeep Salvi to SRA, Mumbai and related departments.
Ref. 5: Correspondence dated 27.5.2025 by Shri. Sandeep Salvi to SRA, Mumbai and related departments.
Also, as per reference 1, the possession of the office of the Tehsildar and Executive Magistrate Kurla (Mulund) has been transferred to the authorized officer Shri. Despite the mandatory order to be given to Anil Shinde Certified Auditor, the concerned department of the SRA refused to take action against the culprits and the Registrar Mrs. Sandhya Bawankule Madam committed corruption and fraud by holding mutual elections and colluding. References 2,3,4 and 5. After the elections, the organization has not held all the general meetings and has not presented the accounts. Also, our member of the Sahyadri Nagar, Late Shri. Jagannath Shivram Chindarkar, Sahyadri Nagar, Quarry Road, Bhandup (W) Mumbai-78, lived in CTS No. 237, Part No. 105, Part 3. His son Kishor Jagannath Chindarkar has filed a Suit No. 1430/2017 regarding the ownership rights in the Hon'ble City Civil Court, Mumbai. His father died on 19/8/2011. Despite this, a fake signature is visible in front of his father's name on the minutes of the meeting dated 3/5/2015. Regarding this, Kishor Jagannath Chindarkar has filed a complaint with the concerned department on 30/12/2022 and 17/6/2025. An online complaint has been filed on the complaint system on our website with ID No. GRI/2025/216 on 19/6/2025. The said meeting minutes have been prepared by forging fake signatures.
After investigating the above objections, action should be taken against the concerned under Sections 75 (1), 75 (2A), 75 (2B), 75 (4), 79 (1), 89, 79 (1A)(F), 80 (3) R/W, 154B-27, 154 B-8,89,73 (1AB), 81/75,146 (P), and 73/3 (1AB) and MRTP.
Edna Roudrigues 9869765059
Dy.Collector (Eastern)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/852
Letter No. 3 regarding corruption and fraud committed by the above-mentioned Society in violation of the MCS Act
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Edna Menino Roudrigues
04/09/2025459128
Ref. 1: Sukhkarta S. R. A Co-op Housing Society Registration No. : M.U.M/S.S.G/(T.C)/12494/ Year 2014.
Ref. 2: 13.01.2015 जा. क्र. झोपुप्रा/सहनि/कार्यासन-१/टा.१/सन २०१५ सहकार कक्ष, झो.पु. प्रा, मुंबई
Ref. 3: Letter dated 20/03/2015 from Hon. Co-Registrar, Cooperative Societies, SRA, Mumbai.
Ref. 4: सह दु. नि. कुर्ला ४ दस्त क्र. करल/१८७९७/२०२१ दि. १८/१०/२०२१ dated 18/10/2021 Mortgage (Rs. 60 crores) given for mortgage of Sukhkarta Society dated 25.08.2021
Ref. 5: On 26.3.2025, Mr. Sandeep Salvi Correspondence to SRA, Brihanmumbai and the concerned department
Reference As per 1, Sukhkarta SRA Cooperative Housing Society Registration Reference: As per 2 and 3, even though M. K. More was appointed as the Administrator, the members of the above society have kept the residents in the dark without holding any meeting. Reference: 4,5 Misusing the seal and registration number of the society, they have committed fraud by mortgaged the property worth Rs. 60 crores.
Note : Since the number of reference files of the said letters is large, letter No. 4 is being given further.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/851
Letter No. 2 regarding corruption and fraud committed by the above-mentioned Society in violation of the MCS Act
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Edna Menino Roudrigues
04/09/2025459128
Ref. 1 : Sukhkarta S. R. A Cooperative Housing Society (P) Account Statement, Affidavit, Affidavit and Other Documents
Ref. 2 : Dated 13.01.2015 जा. क्र. झोपुप्रा/सहनि/कार्यासन-१/टा.१/सन २०१५ सहकार कक्ष, झो.पु.प्रा, मुंबई Ref. 3 : Dated 20/03/2015 Letter from Hon. Joint Registrar, Cooperative Societies, SRA, Mumbai.
Ref. 4 : Dated 18/2/2016. No. SRA/ENG/2540/S/PL&STG/LOI. Dated:16 January 2014
Ref. 5 : Deputy Collector's Cell उपजिल्हाधिकारी कक्ष, झोपुप्रा, मुंबई. क्र. झोपुप्रा/ उजि/ पु.ऊ/ लोक आयुक्त/ सुखकर्ता/ २०१६/५५५
Ref. 1,3 and 5 as per CTS No.237 Sukhkarta SRA Cooperative Housing Society and the developer, having 269 residents, in collusion, made 100 eligible members out of 120 members at Plot No. 237, 256, 249, 247, 1352 and obtained various permissions by showing 70% majority, LOI and IOA.
As per refs. 2,3,5, even though M. K. More was appointed as the authorized officer as the administrator and even though it was necessary to organize a meeting of Sukhkarta SRA Co-op Housing Society and pass a unanimous resolution, Rajesh Anant Bhosale, pretending to be the alleged main promoter, filed Writ Petition 723/2016 in the Hon'ble High Court, Mumbai without passing any resolution.
After investigating the above objections, action should be taken against the concerned persons under Sections 75 (1), 75 (2A), 75 (2B), 75 (4), 79 (1), 89, 79 (1A)(F), 80 (3) R/W, 154B-27, 154B-8,89,73 (1AB), 81/75,146(P), and 73/3(1AB) and MRTP of the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies Act, 1960.
Note: Since the number of reference files of the said letters is large, letter No. 3 is being given further.
Dy.Collector (Eastern)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-

Letter No. 2 regarding corruption and fraud committed by the above-mentioned Society in violation of the MCS Act
Public Relations Department (PRO)
Edna Menino Roudrigues
04/09/20254591410
Ref. 1 : Sukhkarta S. R. A Cooperative Housing Society (P) Account Statement, Affidavit, Affidavit and Other Documents
Ref. 2 : Dated 13.01.2015 जा. क्र. झोपुप्रा/सहनि/कार्यासन-१/टा.१/सन २०१५ सहकार कक्ष, झो.पु.प्रा, मुंबई Ref. 3 : Dated 20/03/2015 Letter from Hon. Joint Registrar, Cooperative Societies, SRA, Mumbai.
Ref. 4 : Dated 18/2/2016. No. SRA/ENG/2540/S/PL&STG/LOI. Dated:16 January 2014
Ref. 5 : Deputy Collector's Cell उपजिल्हाधिकारी कक्ष, झोपुप्रा, मुंबई. क्र. झोपुप्रा/ उजि/ पु.ऊ/ लोक आयुक्त/ सुखकर्ता/ २०१६/५५५
Ref. 1,3 and 5 as per CTS No.237 Sukhkarta SRA Cooperative Housing Society and the developer, having 269 residents, in collusion, made 100 eligible members out of 120 members at Plot No. 237, 256, 249, 247, 1352 and obtained various permissions by showing 70% majority, LOI and IOA.
As per refs. 2,3,5, even though M. K. More was appointed as the authorized officer as the administrator and even though it was necessary to organize a meeting of Sukhkarta SRA Co-op Housing Society and pass a unanimous resolution, Rajesh Anant Bhosale, pretending to be the alleged main promoter, filed Writ Petition 723/2016 in the Hon'ble High Court, Mumbai without passing any resolution.
After investigating the above objections, action should be taken against the concerned persons under Sections 75 (1), 75 (2A), 75 (2B), 75 (4), 79 (1), 89, 79 (1A)(F), 80 (3) R/W, 154B-27, 154B-8,89,73 (1AB), 81/75,146(P), and 73/3(1AB) and MRTP of the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies Act, 1960.
Note: Since the number of reference files of the said letters is large, letter No. 3 is being given further.

Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

Edna Menino Roudrigues

443
GRI/2025/847
Regarding Issues in PTC Building No. 4, Sairaj Gudiya Pada CHS
Dy.Collector (City)Kunal Sukhdev Ghode04/09/2025459128
Respected Sir,
We, the residents of PTC Building No. 4, sincerely thank you for providing us with good quality flats as part of the rehabilitation of residents displaced due to the road widening project in Valnai, Mith Chowki, and Shankar Lane in Malad, Taluka Borivali

The flats are of very good standard, and the surrounding area is safe and not too far from our previous location, for which we are grateful. However, we would like to bring to your attention some issues related to the building, with the hope that they will be addressed:

Regular maintenance and management of the building is necessary. Support from the BMC (Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation) is required in this regard.

Out of the three domestic water pumps, only one is operational. The remaining two are not working — we kindly request that these be repaired and do the needful.

The elevator/lift occasionally stops working — we request action to fix this issue.

There are obstructions at the entrance of the building. We request that a fire drill and other safety inspections be arranged to ensure residents’ safety.

The looping of the water tanks on the terrace is not yet completed — we request this work to be finished.

Currently, there is only one water connection provided by BMC, which is inadequate for a 10-storey building. We request that follow-up be done with BMC to arrange for an additional water connection.

We request the installation of CCTV cameras in and around the building premises to enhance the safety and security of the residents.

The society lacks basic seating arrangements. We request the installation of benches or chairs in the common areas for senior citizens and other residents to comfortably use.

There is a need for proper dustbins at key locations in and around the building premises to maintain cleanliness and hygiene. We kindly request BMC to provide covered community dustbins for regular waste disposal.

We hope you will give due attention to the above-mentioned issues and provide us with the necessary assistance.


Sincerely,
All residents of PTC Building No. 4
Sairaj Gudiya Pada CHS, Sundar Lane
Malad (West), Mumbai – 400064
Dy.Collector (Western)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-

444
GRI/2025/846
अध्यक्ष, सचिव व खजिनदार निवड करण्या आधी प्राधिकरणाने अविश्वास प्रस्तावाची सखोल चौकशी करण्यात यावी आणि मग निर्णय घेण्यात यावा तो पर्यंत पधाधिकाऱयांची निवडणूक स्थगित करण्यात यावी .
Competent Authority -5
DURGESH DHONDU CHAVAN
04/09/2025459139
श्रीमती तनुजा वडनेरे
सक्षम प्राधिकारी
तहसीलदार ,झोपुप्रा, बृहन्मुंबई

माननिय सक्षम अधिकारी महोदय,

मि दुर्गेश धोंडू चव्हाण वरील संस्थेचा पदाधिकारी रहिवाशी आहे. मि वरील संस्थेचा सचिव या नात्याने SRA प्राधिकरण ला आमच्या संस्थे मधे होत असलेल्या गैर प्रकारबद्दल लेखी, ऑनलाइन व तोंडी स्वरुपात अनेकदा तक्रार केली आहे.
मौजे-मालवणी ता.बोरीवली येथील न्यू महाकाली नगर एस.आर.ए.सहकारी गृ निर्माण संस्था या संस्थेचा नोंदणी क्र. एम.यु.एम./एस.आर.ए./एच.एस.जि.(टी सी) /१२६१४ /सन २०१६ (CTS क्र.२८४१ पार्ट ) प्राधिकरणास वारंवार तक्रारी करण्यात आल्या कि अध्यक्षांनी लेटर हेड व संस्थेच्या नावाचा सिक्का बनावटी बनवून दोन रिक्त पदांची निवडणूक लावली आहे. पण प्राधिकरणाकडून संस्थेला समाधान कारक उत्तर मिळत नाही. विरुद्ध पार्टी लेटर पाठवते तर त्याचे उत्तर लवकर देण्यात येते ह्याचा अर्थ काय समजायचं? सचिव , खजिनदार ह्याची बाजू न ऐकता त्यांना पदावरून काढण्यात आले. श्री. रामचंद्र सीताराम चांदुरकर व इतर १० व्यवस्थापक समिती सदस्यांनी अविश्वास प्रस्ताव दाखल केला आहे तेच ११ सदस्य समितीच्या ४ ते ५ त्याहून अधिक मासिक सभेला सतत गैरहजर राहतात . त्यामुळे संस्थेने त्यांना समितीवरून काढले आहे. त्यासंदर्भात प्राधिकरणाला पत्रकही देण्यात आले आहे मग त्यांचा अविश्वास ठराव पारित करण्यात कसा आला . आम्हाला आपली बाजू मांडण्याची संधी देण्यात यावी. आमची आपल्याला विनंती आहे कि आमच्यावर लावलेले आरोप सिद्ध होई पर्यंत अध्यक्ष ,सचिव आणि खजिनदार ह्यांची निवड करण्यावर स्थगिती आणण्यात यावी.
आम्ही विकासकाच्या विरोधात आणि रहिवाश्याच्या बाजूने काम करतो म्हणून ह्या ११ सदस्यांनी आमच्यावर खोटा अविश्वास प्रस्ताव केला आहे .

आपला नम्र
दुर्गेश सावित्री धोंडू चव्हाण
संपर्क क्रमांक -९८९२८४७३१२
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-

अध्यक्ष, सचिव व खजिनदार निवड करण्या आधी प्राधिकरणाने अविश्वास प्रस्तावाची सखोल चौकशी करण्यात यावी आणि मग निर्णय घेण्यात यावा तो पर्यंत पधाधिकाऱयांची निवडणूक स्थगित करण्यात यावी .

श्रीमती तनुजा वडनेरे
सक्षम प्राधिकारी
तहसीलदार ,झोपुप्रा, बृहन्मुंबई

माननिय सक्षम अधिकारी महोदय,

मि दुर्गेश धोंडू चव्हाण वरील संस्थेचा पदाधिकारी रहिवाशी आहे. मि वरील संस्थेचा सचिव या नात्याने SRA प्राधिकरण ला आमच्या संस्थे मधे होत असलेल्या गैर प्रकारबद्दल लेखी, ऑनलाइन व तोंडी स्वरुपात अनेकदा तक्रार केली आहे.
मौजे-मालवणी ता.बोरीवली येथील न्यू महाकाली नगर एस.आर.ए.सहकारी गृ निर्माण संस्था या संस्थेचा नोंदणी क्र. एम.यु.एम./एस.आर.ए./एच.एस.जि.(टी सी) /१२६१४ /सन २०१६ (CTS क्र.२८४१ पार्ट ) प्राधिकरणास वारंवार तक्रारी करण्यात आल्या कि अध्यक्षांनी लेटर हेड व संस्थेच्या नावाचा सिक्का बनावटी बनवून दोन रिक्त पदांची निवडणूक लावली आहे. पण प्राधिकरणाकडून संस्थेला समाधान कारक उत्तर मिळत नाही. विरुद्ध पार्टी लेटर पाठवते तर त्याचे उत्तर लवकर देण्यात येते ह्याचा अर्थ काय समजायचं? सचिव , खजिनदार ह्याची बाजू न ऐकता त्यांना पदावरून काढण्यात आले. श्री. रामचंद्र सीताराम चांदुरकर व इतर १० व्यवस्थापक समिती सदस्यांनी अविश्वास प्रस्ताव दाखल केला आहे तेच ११ सदस्य समितीच्या ४ ते ५ त्याहून अधिक मासिक सभेला सतत गैरहजर राहतात . त्यामुळे संस्थेने त्यांना समितीवरून काढले आहे. त्यासंदर्भात प्राधिकरणाला पत्रकही देण्यात आले आहे मग त्यांचा अविश्वास ठराव पारित करण्यात कसा आला . आम्हाला आपली बाजू मांडण्याची संधी देण्यात यावी. आमची आपल्याला विनंती आहे कि आमच्यावर लावलेले आरोप सिद्ध होई पर्यंत अध्यक्ष ,सचिव आणि खजिनदार ह्यांची निवड करण्यावर स्थगिती आणण्यात यावी.
आम्ही विकासकाच्या विरोधात आणि रहिवाश्याच्या बाजूने काम करतो म्हणून ह्या ११ सदस्यांनी आमच्यावर खोटा अविश्वास प्रस्ताव केला आहे .

GRI/2025/841
NOTICE UNDER SECTION 353-B OF M.M.C.ACT 1888
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Smruti S Kadam 03/09/2025459118
SRA NOTIFICATION NO :SAA/MALAD/35 Dated 30/6/78. Gazette on 20/07/78 at page No.1074 Owner not known by the occupants,hutments building dilapidated and Hazaurds for nearby hutments surrounding the dilapidated building which is started collapsing and after the complaint with BMC P/SOUTH WARD. They have issued the subject certificate for Structural Audit which the occupants of nearby hutments surrounding area are not willing due poor people and can afford to pay the fees for a Architect,Hence requested to intervene, please the matter is serious . Due to inclement wether the building is caving inside and any time collapsing on the surrounding hutments may cause loss of life. Reporting this matter as a Alert citizen 🙏 Dhanyawad 🙏
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
आपल्या तक्रार अर्जातील मुद्यांबाबत आपण बृहन्मुंबई महानगरपालिकेकडे अर्ज सादर करावा.
-

GRI/2025/840
Request for Certified / Soft Copy of Annexure II – New Gulab Nagar, Trimurti CHS Ltd., Khar West, Mumbai – 400052
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Anif Jamil Ahamad03/09/2025459129
Respected Sir/Madam,

I, the undersigned, am a member of the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme at New Gulab Nagar, Trimurti CHS Ltd., Khar (West), Mumbai – 400052. As per the scheme records, Annexure II has been duly prepared by the SRA, and the allotted flat has also been received under the said scheme.

I kindly request your office to provide a Certified Copy / Soft Copy of Annexure II in the name of the original holder:

Name of Annexure II Holder: Shri/Mrs. Ahamad Immabi Jamil

Flat No.: 103 (A), Trimurti SRA CHS Ltd., Khar (West), Mumbai – 400052

Eligibility Period: 1995 – 2005


The document is already available on the SRA portal, however, I require an individual certified copy in the above name for record purposes. I confirm that I am in possession of the said flat since allotment and the same has neither been sold nor transferred.

If any further documents, identification, or verification are required, I am willing to comply and submit the necessary papers. I am also ready to collect the certified copy directly from the SRA office if so instructed.

I request your kind support in processing this grievance smoothly and at the earliest.

Thanks & Regards.

9869367246.
9819584182.
Competent Authority - 2
Resolved

450
GRI/2025/838
Compalint regarding delay in taking action on letter issued by your office
Assistant Registrar (City)
AMIT YADAV01/09/20254591110
SRA has issued letter dated 10/06/2022 appointing Mr.Annanda patil has a certified auditor but till date no audit was conducted by the officer best known reason known to him it clearly states the maladministration at SRA office and hand in glove in illegal activity.I hereby request you to kindly take contemplate on this matter and take necessary stringent action against officer for delay in discharging his duties in a time bound manner by giving an opportunity him to prove why the delay has caused.

Looking forward to early action in the above matter so that legal remedies can be sought by your HOD including court of law.
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
आपला अर्ज पूर्व उपनगरे विभागासाठीचा असून आपला तक्रार अर्जातील मुद्दा संस्थेच्या कामकाजासी सबंधित आहे. त्यासाठी प्रथम संस्थेकडे अर्ज करणे आवश्यक आहे. संस्थेने सदर अर्जावर निर्णय न दिल्यास निबंधकाकडे दाद मागण्याची तरतुद आहे.

Rohit Pandurang Patil31/08/20254591010

GRI/2025/835
विषय : निवडणूक अधिकारी श्री. महेश बी. थोरात यांना श्रीमती वनिता नायडू, श्रीमती प्रतिभा चव्हाण आणि सुनीता बावळे. ह्या उमेदवारांची पूर्ण माहिती दिली होती तरी सुद्धा २२.०२.२०२५ रोजी निवडणुकीला उभे राहण्याची परवानगी कशी दिली त्याचा खुलासा करण्या बाबत .
Public Relations Department (PRO)
DURGESH DHONDU CHAVAN
30/08/2025459089
आदरणीय महोदय/ महोदया, वरील विषयाला अनुसरून,वरील संस्थेच्या वतीने आपले लक्ष वेधण्यात येत आहे.मौजे-मालवणी ता.बोरीवली येथील न्यू महाकाली नगर एस.आर.ए.सहकारी गृ निर्माण संस्था या संस्थेचा नोंदणी क्र. एम.यु.एम./एस.आर.ए./एच.एस.जि.(टी सी) /१२६१४ /सन २०१६ (CTS क्र.२८४१ पार्ट ) आहे .शनिवार दिनांक २२.०२.२०२५ रोजी निवडणूक अधिकारी श्री. महेश बी. थोरात साहेबानी दोन रिक्त पदांची निवडणूक घेतली त्या मध्ये तीन उमेदवार उभे होते श्रीमती वनिता राजेंद्रन नायडू, श्रीमती प्रतिभा देवदास चव्हाण आणि सुनीता बावळे . १) श्रीमती वनिता राजेंद्रन नायडू ह्या व्यक्तीच्या नावे सदनिका नसून तिच्या मयत पती कै. राजेंद्र नायडू ह्यांच्या नावे सदनिका आहे . वनिता राजेंद्रन नायडू ह्या राजेंद्र नायडू ह्यांच्या दुसऱ्या पत्नी असून त्यांच्या पहिल्या पत्नीच्या मुलांनी कार्तिक राजेंद्रन नायडू आणि पूजा राजेंद्रन नायडू ह्यांनी इमारत क्र.१ सदनिका क्र.१०८ ची सदनिका लीगल हेअर करू नये असे संस्थेला आणि प्राधिकरणाला लेखीस्वरूपात पत्रक दिले. तसेच कै. राजेंद्र नायडू ह्याचे पहिल्या पत्नी सोबत कायदेशीर काडीमोड(घटस्फोट) झालेला नाही असे त्यांच्या मुलांचे म्हणणे आहे. संस्थेने श्रीमती वनिता राजेंद्रन नायडू हिला लीगल हेअर केले नाही ह्याची कल्पना निवडणूक अधिकारी श्री. महेश बी. थोरात ह्यांना दिली होती तरी सुद्धा श्रीमती वनिता नायडू ला निवडणुकीला उभे राहण्याची परवानगी कशी दिली . २) श्रीमती प्रतिभा देवदास चव्हाण ह्या व्यक्तीच्या नावे इमारत क्र.१ सदनिका क्र. ३०८ नसून तिच्या मयत पती कै. देविदास धोंडू चव्हाण ह्याच्या नावे आहे. संस्थेने श्रीमती प्रतिभा देवदास चव्हाण ह्यांना लीगल हेअर करून घेतलेले नाही ह्याची कल्पना निवडणूक अधिकारी श्री. महेश बी. थोरात ह्यांना दिली होती तरी सुद्धा त्यांनी तिला निवडणुकीला उभे राहण्याची परवानगी कशी दिली .३) सौ. सुनीता बावळे. इमारत क्र.२ सदनिका क्र.सी /९०३ आपली सदनिका भाडेतत्वावर देऊन चिकूवाडी.मार्वे रोड, मलाड (प) येथे राहात आहे. ह्याची कल्पना निवडणूक अधिकारी श्री. महेश बी. थोरात ह्यांना व प्राधिकरणास वारंवार देण्यात आली होती तरी सुद्धा त्यांनी तिला निवडणुकीला उभे राहण्याची परवानगी कशी दिली? वरील विषयावर प्राधिकरण च्या "शाससन पोर्टवर " DEP/HOUS/MUMS/२०२५/४३४दिनांक १७.०७.२०२५ तक्रार केली होती, त्याचे उत्तर दिनांक २९.०८.२०२५ संस्थेला मिळाले त्या पत्रकानुसार संबंधित पदाधिकारी यांच्या कडून खुलासा आपल्या कार्यालयास प्राप्त होत नाही तो पर्यंत संस्थेमधे कोणतेही नविन सभासद किंवा नवीन पदाची निवडणूक घेऊ नए ही आमची आपणास नम्र विनंती श्रीमती वनिता राजेंद्रन नायडू,श्रीमती प्रतिभा देवदास चव्हाण, सौ. सुनीता बावळे आणि श्री. महेश बी. थोरात ह्या सर्वानी मिळून झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण , निवडणूक आयोग, न्यू महाकाली नगर सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था आणि ५६१ सदनिका धारकांची फसवणूक केली आहे. माझी विनंती आहि कि वरील विषयाची सखोल चौकशी करण्यात यावी आणि योग्य तो निर्णय घेऊन श्रीमती वनिता नायडू, आणि सुनीता बावळे ह्या दोघींची समितीवरील सदस्यता रद्द करून हकालपट्टी करण्यात यावी .संस्थेला आणि ५६१ सदनिका धारकांना न्याय मिळवून द्याल अशी मी आशा करतो. आपला नम - दुर्गेश धोंडू चव्हाण
माहितीस्तव जोडत आहे : कै. राजेंद्रन नायडू ह्यांचे मुले कार्तिक नायडू आणि पूजा नायडू चे प्राधिकरणास आणि संस्थेस दिलेले पत्रक .
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/832
मी आपल्या निदर्शनास आणून देऊ इच्छितो की आमच्या भागातील मंजूर एस.आर.ए. प्रकल्प अद्याप सुरू झालेला नाही. विकसक व संबंधित अधिकाऱ्यांनी अनेक आश्वासने दिली असतानाही प्रत्यक्षात कोणतेही काम सुरू झालेले नाही. यामुळे रहिवाशांना मोठ्या अडचणींचा सामना करावा लागत आहे, आणि ते अजूनही असुरक्षित व खराब स्थितीत राहतात. कृपया त्वरित लक्ष घालून कारवाई करावी, जबाबदार व्यक्तींवर कारवाई करावी आणि प्रकल्प सुरू होण्याची स्पष्ट वेळसारणी द्यावी, ही विनंती.
Competent Authority -1Ambadas Gojollu30/08/20254590910

GRI/2025/829
Clarification on Apatra list posted in our society
AdminShivshankar Ganapuram30/08/2025459078
Address: Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Nagar CHS, beside Naman Midtown, Senapati bapat Marg, Prabhadevi station, Mumbai - 400013
In 2019, we received a letter stating the 489 houses are apatra out of 890 houses.

Now in 2025, for the society voting, received letter stating that provide list house owners are patra so eligible to vote.

Likely, apatra list is not provided with names of owner and reason.

I tried to search for same document in SRA site in proactive disclosure section but didn't found.

Could you please check and share the list.
AdminResolved
पात्र अपात्रतेबाबतचा विषय हा सक्षम प्राधिकारी-1, झोपुप्रा, बृहन्मुंबई यांचे विभागाशी संबंधित आहे. सबब आपण संबंधित विभागाशी संपर्क साधावा.

GRI/2025/827
जय भीम नगर संतोष नगर आलेल्या प्रारूप Annexure ची नोटीस आतापर्यंत नोटीस नाय लावण्यात आलेला आहे यांनी लोकांना प्रारूप Annexure ची माहिती हो नाही..!
Competent Authority -5SUNIL SHARMA29/08/2025459079

Gagangiri SRA CHS LTD. & Jai Shivdarshan SRA CHS Ltd. Village Malad (East), at Jay Bhim Nagar, Film City Road, Goregaon (East), Mumbai-400065. 33(10) Malad East 637 (Pt) of Village Malad (E), Tal. Still Annexure list not shown by Society and Developer to Public even not displayed to Notice Board.

461
GRI/2025/823
Urgent Complaint against M/s. AA Property Developers for non-payment of Transit Rent and request to withhold Occupancy Certificate (OC) for Project at Near Kurla Railway Station, Kurla (E), Mumbai - 400024.
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Salim Shaikh29/08/2025459079
We, the members of Fatima Bee SRA CHS LTD., are writing to bring to your urgent attention the gross negligence and breach of agreement by our builder, M/s. AA Property Developers.
Despite our repeated requests and reminders, the builder has willfully defaulted on the payment of monthly transit rent for all 31 eligible tenements since 14th January 2023. The last rent payment received was for the period up to 13th January 2023.
Detailed Calculation of Outstanding Principal Amount:
The outstanding amount is calculated with an annual 5% increase which calculates upto 15% increase for 3 years as per SRA norms, for 31 families for a period of 31 months (From 14th Jan 2023 to 13th Aug 2025 and counting).
Total Calculation:
• ₹12,000 + 15% = ₹13,800 per tenant
• For 31 tenants: 31 x ₹13,800 = ₹4,27,800
• Total for 31 months: 31 x ₹4,27,800 = ₹1,32,61,800

Grand Total Principal Outstanding = ₹1,32,61,800
(Rupees One Crore Thirty Two Lakh Sixty One Thousand Eight Hundred Only)
This amount is exclusive of any interest payable on these delayed payments as per rules.
Key Points of Grievance:
1. Massive Financial Default: As calculated above, the builder has accumulated a debt of ₹1,32,61,800. This has pushed 31 families into extreme financial hardship and mental agony.
2. Violation of SRA Mandate: This deliberate non-payment is a direct violation of the developer's obligations under the SRA scheme and specifically contravenes SRA Circular No. 210 & 153, which mandates timely payment of transit rent.
3. Builder Abscond Risk: We have learned that the builder has applied for the Occupancy Certificate (OC) for the project. We have a genuine and well-founded fear that once the OC is granted, the builder will abscond and wind up his operations, leaving us with no recourse to recover the massive pending rent amount.
4. Humanitarian Crisis: The non-payment of rent has created an untenable situation for our 31 member families, impacting children's education and future prospects, causing severe stress to senior citizens.

Our Humble Request:
In light of the above, we urgently plead with your office to:
1. Direct M/s. AA Property Developers to immediately clear all outstanding transit rent dues of ₹1,32,61,800/- (principal) along with applicable interest as per rules, before any further action is taken on their OC application.
2. Withhold the grant of the Occupancy Certificate (OC) of the sellable portion for the project until the builder fulfils all the provisions mentioned in Circular 210 and provides concrete proof of having cleared all outstanding rent dues to the society members.
3. Issue stop-work notice for the sale component of the project
4. Issue strict directions to the builder to adhere to all clauses of the Development Agreement and SRA regulations in the future.

We trust that the SRA will take swift and stern action to protect our interests and ensure justice is served.
We are available to meet with you in person to present our case.
Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
Please Visit SRA office Concerned Department
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1756457883689_7565_WhatsApp%20Scan%202025-08-28%20at%2022.00.19.pdf
462
GRI/2025/822

Grand Total Principal Outstanding = ₹1,32,61,800
(Rupees One Crore Thirty Two Lakh Sixty One Thousand Eight Hundred Only)

We have a genuine and well-founded fear that once the OC is granted, the builder will abscond and wind up his operations, leaving us with no recourse to recover the massive pending rent amount.

In light of the above, we urgently plead with your office to:

3. Issue stop-work notice for the sale component of the project
4. Issue strict directions to the builder to adhere to all clauses of the Development Agreement and SRA regulations in the future.

We trust that the SRA will take swift and stern action to protect our interests and ensure justice is served.
We are available to meet with you in person to present our case.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/821
Urgent Complaint against M/s. AA Property Developers for non-payment of Transit Rent and request to withhold Occupancy Certificate (OC) for Project at Near Kurla Railway Station, Kurla (E), Mumbai - 400024.

• ₹12,000 + 15% = ₹13,800 per tenant
• For 31 tenants: 31 x ₹13,800 = ₹4,27,800
• Total for 31 months: 31 x ₹4,27,800 = ₹1,32,61,800

Grand Total Principal Outstanding = ₹1,32,61,800
(Rupees One Crore Thirty Two Lakh Sixty One Thousand Eight Hundred Only)

We trust that the SRA will take swift and stern action to protect our interests and ensure justice is served.
We are available to meet with you in person to present our case.
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved

GRI/2025/820
Annexure 2 Verification Report not Received
Dy.Collector (City)
Ramlakhan Ramabhilakh Maurya
28/08/20254590710
17 जून 2025 को डिप्टी कलेक्टर के पास हमारे annexure2 वेरिफिकेशन रिपोर्ट देना था सहकर कक्ष को अभी तक वो नहीं दिया गया है आज 2 महीने से ज्यादा हो गए है 4 बार मैं ऑफिस जा चुका हु कभी प्रशांति माने mam नहीं रहती है कभी कोई सम्बन्धित ऑफिसर जगह पर नहीं होता ना ही ये लोग कोई मूवमेंट रजिस्टर जनता के सामने रखते है असल में वो ऑफिस कहा गया है । सरकार का नियम है 7 दिन से ज्यादा कोई फाइल रहनी नहीं चाहिए टेबल पर (Maharashtra section 10 De Relection of duty) पर इस कानून की धज्जियां sra के अधिकारी उड़ा रहे है पिछले 4 महीने से सिर्फ मै सहकर कक्ष के चक्कर लगा रहा हु अलॉटमेंट लेटर पाने के लिए । कोई अधिकारी सीधे तरीके से जवाब नहीं देता है जल्द से जल्द करवाई की मांग करता हु
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/814Remaining evidence documentDeputy Collector
SANTOSH SUPADU WAGH
25/08/2025459028
respected sir, i am santosh wagh residence in goregoan west ,flat no 130,omkar herabha chaya,registration no. sum/sra/hsc(city)/12083/year 2011 dated 09/09/2011,prabhat ngr,unnat ngr no 2 mumbai 400062.
i want raise grievances agiants Mr.Vijay sawant how was appointed as care taker by SRA MUMBAI west office on 13/11/2024,the letter for the same is attached ,this letter was issused by Mrs.Sandya bawankule ,asst.registrar .as Mr sawant is now currenlty looking after our socity admin as well as any isuue regarding socity, his mob number is 7045995951.
but Mr.sawant is not doing his duty, when we try to call or send him msg on his whatup ,he is not responding. currenlty there was water leakage from supply pipe in my room ,we have call him as well as send him video for same,but he did not respond,insted he send some local personal how was not professional plumber, till today he has not resopnd niether call .Mr.sawnt regularly withdraing money from our socity bank account with out any information to any socity members.

now, Mrs.sandya bawankule mam who has issued this letter ,as per her the committee member such as society secretary,chairman,treasurer was not present when ask for hearing ,where the committee members where present ,evidance of present is attached.

so, sir i request you to look in to matter and do investigation.
also request you to issue letter to conduct new member election as soon as possible.

thanking you

472
GRI/2025/812
विषय: झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरणाच्या तक्रारी प्रणालीवर केलेल्या तक्रारींचे उत्तर मिळण्याबाबत .
Assistant Registrar (Western)
DURGESH DHONDU CHAVAN
25/08/20254590410
आदरणीय महोदय / महोदया,

उपरोक्त विषयाच्या गांभीर्याकडे आपले लक्ष वेधण्यात येत आहे .
आपल्याला कळविण्यात येत आहे कि मी दुर्गेश धोंडू चव्हाण न्यू महाकाली नगर मार्वे क्रॉस रोड मालवणी चारकोप नाका येथील(MUM/SRA/HSG/(TC)/12614/2016(CTS NO. 2841/PART) संस्थेचा माजी सचिव आहे. मी पदावर असताना गेल्या काही महिन्यापासून मी झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरणाच्या तक्रारी प्रणालीवर तक्रारी केल्या आहेत परंतु मला संबंधित अधिकाऱ्याकडून एका हि तक्रारींचे उत्तर मिळालेले नाही.
तक्रारीचा Grievance ID खालील प्रमाणे आहेत :
1) GRI/2025/776 -Submission Date: 18-08-2025
2) GRI/2025/571 -Submission Date: 24-07-2025
3) GRI/2025/357 -Submission Date: 26-06-2025
4) GRI/2025/170 -Submission Date: 03-06-2025

मला आशा आहे कि मी केलेल्या तक्रारींचे उत्तर मला लवकरात लवकर मिळेल अशी मी आशा बाळगतो.
आपला कुपाभिलाषी ,

दुर्गेश धोंडू चव्हाण
माजी सचिव
संपर्क क्रमांक : ९८९२८४७३१२
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
आपण पोर्टलवर दाखल केलेल्या तक्रारींच्या अनुषंगाने आपणास उत्तर देण्यात आलेले आहे.
-
473
GRI/2025/811
Water leakeging from ceiling last 8 years
AdminIrfan shaikh25/08/20254590410
नमस्कार
मेरा नाम इरफान शैख है मे धारावी sra की लोक सेवा chs सोसाइटी 4 मंजिला रूम 408 रेहता हूँ मेरे घर की सीलिंग से लगातार 8 से 10 वर्ष से पानी टपक रहा है और सोसाइटी में लगातार शिकायत के बाद भी कुछ असर नहीं होता है और ऊपर रूम 508 में रहने वाली औरते दादागिरी करती है अब पानी काफी हाद तक बढ़ गया है जिसके वाजे से घर में बिजली शॉर्ट हो रही है और सीलिंग भी जर्जर हो रही है हमारा काफी नुकसान हो रहा है और मेरे घर मे अपंग भाई और बुढ़ी माँ है जिनको गिरने का डर है मुझे मे उम्मेद करता हूँ मेरी इस शिकायत पर sra संज्ञान ले गा
AdminResolved
सदनिका गळती बाबतचे निर्णय देण्याचा अधिकार या विभागास नाही. सबब संस्थेच्या मंजुर उपविधीमधील उपविधी क्रं. 174(ब) या तरतुदीनुसार विषयांकीत प्रकरणी सहकार न्यायालयात दाद लावून घ्यावी.

GRI/2025/808
Welfare office and Balwadi broken and not handover to Integrated Child Development Services Scheme)
Assistant Registrar (City)
Francis Fredericks24/08/2025459018
Dear Respected Sir,
I am writing this letter to just to know you that, as per the allotment letter 2 welfare office and 2 Balwadi was suppose to hand over. However , the welfare office is broken and made a entry. Only one balwadi is handover. They made shop out of welfare office.
Ashirwad SRA CHS Mulund (West) CTS No 755 Mulund Village KDG marg Mulund west Mumbai- 400080.

Assistant Registrar (City)

477
GRI/2025/807
Buildings - Unauthorized alteration/renovation of building,
Assistant Registrar (City)
Francis Fredericks24/08/20254590310
Dear Respected Sir,

The Society committee has done the alteration which has weakened the structure of the building.

As per the SRA plan, there was no entrance of the building, it was a welfare office which was assigned to the building committee.

The society committee has broken the welfare office and made an entrance, which has weakened the structure of the building. Which can result in major disaster for society members.

I have included the disaster Management department, so that future disasters can be avoided.

Please do a structure audit and the SRA department will never provide such kind of structure changes in the building.

Please set an example, so that in future no society committee will play with the lives of the society members.

I am attaching the video of entrance and Allotment letters of rooms.

Please take strict action.
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
या बाबत अभियांत्रिकी विभागाकडे स्वतंत्रपणे अर्ज सादर करावा.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1756024245092_1681_Allotment%20of%20rooms%20Ashirwad.jpg
478
GRI/2025/806
Water bill not paid of Amt Rs 8,61,671/ for Ashirwad SRA CHS Mulund (West) CTS 755 Customer ID (CNN) TX*0016309
Assistant Registrar (City)
Francis Fredericks24/08/2025459029
Water bill not paid of Amt Rs 8,61,671/ for Ashirwad SRA CHS Mulund (West) survey no CTS 755 Customer ID (CNN) TX*0016309. Ashirwad SRA CHS Mulund (West) CTS No 755 Mulund Village KDG marg Mulund west Mumbai- 400080, society committee has not paid the water bill of Rs 8,61,671/ for customer ID TX*0016309 for bill no 2526HEW0386137.

The society committee has taken maintenance from society members and not paid the water bill. Due to which society has faced a lot of issues regarding water shortage.

The society committee is misusing the society fund. As per bye law they should have made provision if they are not paying the water bill. They didn't make a provision of the same.

When I visited BMC for a clarification, then BMC got active and sent a notice to society.

After receiving the notice Society committee members have paid only around Rs 4,86,000/ and asked for a grace period to pay the rest till 1st September 2025.

This is a clear case of fund misuse by the Society Committee.

I am attaching a copy of the water bill.

Please take action accordingly.
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
आपला तक्रार अर्जातील मुद्दा संस्थेच्या कामकाजासी सबंधित आहे. त्यासाठी प्रथम संस्थेकडे अर्ज करणे आवश्यक आहे. संस्थेने सदर अर्जावर निर्णय न दिल्यास निबंधकाकडे दाद मागण्याची तरतुद आहे.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1756024006333_5627_Water%20Bill%20Ashirwad%20bill.pdf
479
GRI/2025/805
वारिस के अधिकार व फर्जी गिफ्ट डीड बनाकर संपत्ति हड़पने के प्रयास के संबंध में – शिकायत।
Estate OfficerNILESH NAIKAR23/08/2025459008
प्रति,
आयुक्त महोदय,
स्लम पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण (SRA),
मुंबई।
विषय: वारिस के अधिकार व फर्जी गिफ्ट डीड बनाकर संपत्ति हड़पने के प्रयास के संबंध में – शिकायत।
महोदय,
सादर निवेदन है कि मैं नीतेश हरि नाईकर (Mobile : 8850045446) तथा मेरे तीन भाई – बहन
1. नीतु हरि नाईकर
2. नितिन हरि नाईकर
3. नितेश हरि नाईकर
हम सभी स्व. हरि श्रीनिवास नाईकर के पुत्र व कानूनी वारिस हैं।
हमारी दादी स्व. ताराबाई श्रीनिवास नाईकर के कुल 6 संतान थे – 2 बेटे और 4 बेटियां:
1. श्रीवास नाईकर
2. सरला नाईकर
3. शुभलक्ष्मी नाईकर
4. रेनुका नाईकर
5. लीना नाईकर
6. जगनाथ नाईकर
हमारी दादी ताराबाई श्रीनिवास नाईकर का देहांत दिनांक 01/10/2021 को हुआ। उनके निधन के बाद उनके नाम पर स्थित संपत्ति (पता: Remedy Chawl, Room No. 9, Akurli Road, Kandivali East, Mumbai – 400101) का अधिकार कानूनन सभी कानूनी वारिसों में समान रूप से बंटना चाहिए था।
लेकिन, हमारी चार बुआओं – श्रीवास नाईकर, सरला नाईकर, शुभलक्ष्मी नाईकर, रेनुका नाईकर और लीना नाईकर – ने फर्जी व झूठा गिफ्ट डीड बनाकर उक्त कमरे की मालिकी अपने नाम करने का प्रयास किया है। उक्त कमरे का SRA प्रोजेक्ट हो चुका है और वर्तमान में उस कमरे का किराया और अधिकार उनके पास है।
मेरे पिता स्व. हरि श्रीनिवास नाईकर का निधन दिनांक 07/04/2025 को हुआ। वे कैंसर से पीड़ित थे, आर्थिक रूप से बेहद कमजोर थे और उनके नाम पर कोई संपत्ति नहीं थी। उनके निधन के बाद हमें पता चला कि हमारी चार बुआएं यह कमरा अपने नाम कर रही हैं और हमारा कानूनी हक पूरी तरह से खत्म करने का प्रयास कर रही हैं।
अतः आपसे विनम्र निवेदन है कि –
1. उक्त संपत्ति का किराया और ट्रांसफर प्रक्रिया तुरंत रोकी जाए।
2. फर्जी गिफ्ट डीड तैयार करने वालों की जांच कर कानूनी कार्रवाई की जाए।
3. हमें कानूनी वारिस के रूप में दर्ज कर हमारे अधिकार की रक्षा की जाए।
संलग्न दस्तावेज:
1. वारिस प्रमाण पत्र (कानूनी प्रमाण पत्र)
2. मृत्यु प्रमाण पत्र – स्व. ताराबाई श्रीनिवास नाईकर एवं स्व. हरिश्रीनिवास नाईकर
3. हमारे पहचान पत्र (आधार / पैन)
4. संपत्ति से संबंधित पुराने कागजात

आपकी कृपा होगी।
धन्यवाद,
भवदीय,
(हस्ताक्षर)
नीलेश हरिश्रीनिवास नाईकर
पता: __________________
मोबाइल: ______________
तारीख: //2025

Estate OfficerResolved
As per the circular 152, please apply for the legal heirship to the Deputy collector special cell.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755960395782_5935_WhatsApp%20Image%202025-08-23%20at%2020.01.49_1d2bd0f1.jpg,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755960400027_8978_Grievances%20_%20Slum%20Rehabilitation%20Authority%20nitesh%20naykar.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755960404389_5807_child%20aadhar%20card.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755960410194_2361_society%20letter.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755960415821_3262_shriniwas.pdf
480
GRI/2025/804
वारिस के अधिकार व फर्जी गिफ्ट डीड बनाकर संपत्ति हड़पने के प्रयास के संबंध में – शिकायत।
Public Relations Department (PRO)
NILESH NAIKAR23/08/2025459008
प्रति,
आयुक्त महोदय,
स्लम पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण (SRA),
मुंबई।
विषय: वारिस के अधिकार व फर्जी गिफ्ट डीड बनाकर संपत्ति हड़पने के प्रयास के संबंध में – शिकायत।
महोदय,
सादर निवेदन है कि मैं नीलेश हरि नाईकर (Mobile : 8850045446) तथा मेरे तीन भाई – बहन
1. नीतु हरि नाईकर
2. नितिन हरि नाईकर
3. नितेश हरि नाईकर
हम सभी स्व. हरि श्रीनिवास नाईकर के पुत्र व कानूनी वारिस हैं।
हमारी दादी स्व. ताराबाई श्रीनिवास नाईकर के कुल 6 संतान थे – 2 बेटे और 4 बेटियां:
1. श्रीवास नाईकर
2. सरला नाईकर
3. शुभलक्ष्मी नाईकर
4. रेनुका नाईकर
5. लीना नाईकर
6. जगनाथ नाईकर
हमारी दादी ताराबाई श्रीनिवास नाईकर का देहांत दिनांक 01/10/2021 को हुआ। उनके निधन के बाद उनके नाम पर स्थित संपत्ति (पता: Remedy Chawl, Room No. 9, Akurli Road, Kandivali East, Mumbai – 400101) का अधिकार कानूनन सभी कानूनी वारिसों में समान रूप से बंटना चाहिए था।
लेकिन, हमारी चार बुआओं – श्रीवास नाईकर, सरला नाईकर, शुभलक्ष्मी नाईकर, रेनुका नाईकर और लीना नाईकर – ने फर्जी व झूठा गिफ्ट डीड बनाकर उक्त कमरे की मालिकी अपने नाम करने का प्रयास किया है। उक्त कमरे का SRA प्रोजेक्ट हो चुका है और वर्तमान में उस कमरे का किराया और अधिकार उनके पास है।
मेरे पिता स्व. हरि श्रीनिवास नाईकर का निधन दिनांक 07/04/2025 को हुआ। वे कैंसर से पीड़ित थे, आर्थिक रूप से बेहद कमजोर थे और उनके नाम पर कोई संपत्ति नहीं थी। उनके निधन के बाद हमें पता चला कि हमारी चार बुआएं यह कमरा अपने नाम कर रही हैं और हमारा कानूनी हक पूरी तरह से खत्म करने का प्रयास कर रही हैं।
अतः आपसे विनम्र निवेदन है कि –
1. उक्त संपत्ति का किराया और ट्रांसफर प्रक्रिया तुरंत रोकी जाए।
2. फर्जी गिफ्ट डीड तैयार करने वालों की जांच कर कानूनी कार्रवाई की जाए।
3. हमें कानूनी वारिस के रूप में दर्ज कर हमारे अधिकार की रक्षा की जाए।
संलग्न दस्तावेज:
1. वारिस प्रमाण पत्र (कानूनी प्रमाण पत्र)
2. मृत्यु प्रमाण पत्र – स्व. ताराबाई श्रीनिवास नाईकर एवं स्व. हरिश्रीनिवास नाईकर
3. हमारे पहचान पत्र (आधार / पैन)
4. संपत्ति से संबंधित पुराने कागजात

आपकी कृपा होगी।
धन्यवाद,
भवदीय,
(हस्ताक्षर)
नीलेश हरिश्रीनिवास नाईकर

तारीख: 23/08/2025

Deputy CollectorResolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

विकासकाने प्राधिकरणाकडे सन 2020-21 चे भाडे जमा केलेले असल्याची खात्री करुन आपणास भाडे वितरीत करण्यात येईल.

https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755848879343_5350_Letter.pdf
482
GRI/2025/802
बोगस पॅनल व बनावट सभासद नोंदणी बाबत तक्रार अर्ज.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Appa Shankar Malik22/08/2025459009
महोदय,

मी अर्जदार शिवराम गोविंद पाटील, पत्ता जय शिव साई SRA गृहनिर्माण सहकारी संस्था चा पात्र सभासद असून, माझा परिशिष्ट क्रमांक आहे ३३२ आहे. मी खालीलप्रमाणे आपल्याकडे तक्रार करीत आहे .

सदर सोसायटीमध्ये सध्या व्यवस्थापक समिती अस्तित्वात नाही व प्रशासक म्हणून अ‍ॅड. सचिन काकड यांची नियुक्ती करण्यात आलेली आहे. अशा परिस्थितीत समितीचे कामकाज व सभासद नोंदणी ही प्रशासक मार्फतच व्हायची आहे.

मात्र, अलीकडे काही व्यक्तींनी “जयशिवसाई संकल्प पॅनल” या नावाने सोसायटीतील सभासदांची फसवणूक करून चुकीची माहिती देण्याचा व स्वतःला पॅनल म्हणून घोषित करण्याचा प्रयत्न चालवला आहे. त्यांनी व्हॉट्सअ‍ॅप ग्रुपवर लोकांना सभासद नोंदणीसाठी संपर्क करण्याचे आवाहन केले आहे.
मात्र,
1. हे लोक सोसायटीचे अधिकृत सदस्य किंवा पदाधिकारी नाहीत.

2. सोसायटीमध्ये कोणतीही मान्यताप्राप्त व्यवस्थापक समिती अस्तित्वात नाही.

3. अशा परिस्थितीत त्यांच्या कृतीमुळे सभासदांची फसवणूक होऊन दिशाभूल होत आहे व प्रशासकाच्या अधिकारात हस्तक्षेप केला जात आहे.

माझी नम्र विनंती आहे की ……

1. सदर प्रकरणाची तात्काळ चौकशी करून संबंधित व्यक्तींवर योग्य कायदेशीर कारवाई करण्यात यावी.

2. सोसायटीमध्ये चालू असलेली बनावट पॅनलची हालचाल व सभासद नोंदणी थांबवण्यात यावी.

3. प्रशासक (अ‍ॅड. सचिन काकड) यांच्या मार्फतच सोसायटीचा कारभार व सभासद नोंदणी प्रक्रिया सुरू राहील, हे लेखी स्वरूपात स्पष्ट करण्यात यावे.

आपला विश्वासू,

(शिवराम गोविंद पाटील)
मो. नं. : ९८६७६५६१११
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755844540721_7154_2.jpeg

I, Jeram Meghaji Bhutak, residing at Plot no 136, Room No. 10, Renuka Niwas, Near Mangal Murti hospital, Gorai, Borivali(W), Mumbai- 400 092. am a lawful occupant of the premises bearing Shop no 32, Ground Floor , Worli Shiv Sagar SRA Co Housing Society, Near Sumar Kendra, Shivram Amrutwar Marg, Mumbai- 400013. under the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme.
I had submitted an application/request on 09/05/2025 for name transfer in the SRA records from Suresh Tahilram Khabrai [Earlier Allottee] to my name, along with all the required supporting documents such as:
1. Copy of Allotment Letter/Agreement
2. Registered Document (Sale deed)
3. Identity and Address Proofs
4. NOC from Society
5. Death Certificate of Previous Allottee
6. Original Receipt of Transfer Fees Paid
Despite fulfilling all requirements and repeated follow-ups, the SRA has not processed my application. This delay is causing me severe hardship in exercising my lawful rights as an allottee and in availing essential facilities.
It appears that the concerned officials are either negligently delaying the matter or are failing to perform their statutory duties.
Therefore, I hereby lodge this formal complaint and request you to:
1. Immediately process and complete the name transfer in my favour.
2. Take appropriate action against the concerned officials responsible for the delay.
3. Provide me with a written response/acknowledgment within a reasonable time frame.
Kindly treat this complaint on priority. If no action is taken, I shall be constrained to approach higher authorities, RTI, and/or legal remedies available under law.
Thanking You,
Yours faithfully,
Jeram Meghaji Bhutak

493
GRI/2025/790
श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांनी चुकीच्या जातीच्या आधारे निवडणूक लढल्या बाबत.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Appa Shankar Malik19/08/2025458979
मी अनिल तुकाराम प्रभुळकर जय शिव साई एस आर ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्थेचा सभासद असून माझा परिशिष्ट क्रमांक ०२ आहे. जय शिव साई एस. आर. ए. सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्थेच्या पंच वार्षिक २०२५- २०३० व्यवस्थापक समितीच्या निवडणुकीला मी इतर मागास वर्गीय (OBC) प्रवर्गातून जय शीव साई एकनिष्ठ एकता पॅनल तर्फे अर्ज भरला होता. माझ्या विरुद्ध श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांनी सुद्धा त्याच प्रवर्गातून अर्ज भरला होता,
परंतु श्री तानाजी रामचंद्र पांढरे यांची जात पडताळणी केली असता त्यांची गवळी हि जात दर्शवली आहे आणि हिंदू गवळी (३६) हि जात विमुक्त जाती आणि भटक्या जमाती (NT-बी ) प्रवर्गा मध्ये मोडते. त्याचा शासकीय अधिनियम क्रमांक आहे CBC. १० / २००१ / प्र.क्र. २३२ / मावक -५ दिनांक १ जून २००४, प्रमाणे तसेच संकीर्ण -२००८/यादी/प्र. क्र. ५५३/मावक-५ दिनांक २६ सप्टेंबर २००८ प्रमाणे हिंदू गवळी हि जात भटक्या विमुक्त जाती जमाती प्रवर्गा समाविष्ट करण्यात आली आहे. श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांनी इतर मागास वर्गीय प्रवर्गातून अर्ज भरला आहे. श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांची जात गवळी (NT) असताना त्यांनी इतर मागास वर्ग मधून अर्ज भरला याचा अर्थ त्यांनी चुकीच्या प्रवर्गातून अर्ज केला होता आणि ते नियम बाह्य आहे तसेच श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांनी निवडणूक आयोगाची फसवणूक करून गंभीर गुन्हा केला आहे.
मी आपणाला विनंती करतो कि आपण श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांची जात प्रमाणपत्र पडताळणी करून त्यांची उमेदवारी रद्द करावी आणि मला इतर मागासवर्ग प्रवर्गातून माझी नियुक्ती करून मला न्याय मिळवून द्यावा.
पत्रासोबत गवळी जात प्रमाणपत्राची सरकार अधिनियम तसेच श्री रामचंद्र तानाजी पंधारे यांनी केलेल्या फसवणुकीची पुरावे आपल्याला सादर करत आहोत
कृपया आपण यौग्य निर्णय घेऊन मला आणि मला न्याय मिळवून द्यावा.

आपला विश्वासु,

अनिल तुकाराम प्रभुळकर
9594457075
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1755617409334_2988_Merge%20File.pdf

495
GRI/2025/787Issue of NOC from the Society AdminRahul Vishwakarma18/08/2025458969
I am writing to kindly bring to your attention the matter regarding the issuance of the No Objection Certificate (NOC) for tenant transfer from the society. I am the third and current lawful owner of my flat, having completed all ownership transfer formalities legally.

However, I have been informed that the society is insisting on the presence of the first owner of the flat in order to issue the NOC from the society Since the property has already changed hands lawfully, and all ownership rights are now vested with me as the third owner, I respectfully request clarity on whether the presence of the first owner is legally necessary for the issuance of this NOC.

From my understanding, once an ownership transfer is completed through a registered sale deed, the new (current) owner becomes the sole person responsible for the property and its tenancy rights. Therefore, requesting the involvement of the first owner—who no longer has any legal connection to the property—seems unnecessary and may not be in line with standard legal procedure.
AdminResolved
Please visit Assistant Registrar office with appropriate document
-
496
GRI/2025/786
Subject: Unauthorized Cash Collection and Formation of Society Members Without Consent – SRA Reddy Building No. 4
AdminShubham lad 18/08/2025458958
Respected Sir/Madam,

This is to bring to your kind attention that in SRA Reddy Building No. 4, a few individuals are collecting cash amounts for building maintenance without proper authorization and without utilizing the official society account. Furthermore, some persons are attempting to form society membership without the consent of the residents and without the knowledge or involvement of the builder.

Such practices raise serious concerns about transparency and accountability. We request you to kindly intervene in this matter and take the necessary steps to ensure that all financial transactions and membership processes are carried out in a legal, systematic, and transparent manner.

We look forward to your prompt action in this regard.

Thanking you,
[shubham Shrikrishna lad]
[8291650289]
AdminResolved
Please visit Assistant Registrar office with appropriate document
