आपण आपल्या तक्रारीमध्ये नमुद केलेल्या सुखशांती सह.गृह.संस्थे अंतर्गत मौजे- तुंगवा, न.भू.क्र. 78,79,81 पै या मिळकती वरील अंतिम परिशिष्ट-2 चे अवलोकन केले असता झोपडी क्र.9 अनिल रामचंद्र शेडगे यांना सन 1995 च्या मतदार यादी नुसार निवासी पात्र म्हणून घोषीत केल्याचे आढळून येते. तसेच झोपडी क्र.10 मंदाकीनी अनिल शेडगे अनिवासी यांना दि. 01/01/1995 पुर्वीचे अनिवासी वापराचे पुरावे सादर न केल्याने अपात्र केल्याचे आढळून येते.
आपण आपल्या तक्रारीमध्ये झोपडी क्र.9 व झोपडी क्र.10 हया एकच असल्याचे नमुद केले आहे. तत्कालीन उपजिल्हाधिकारी (अति/निष्का) घाटकोपर यांनी तद्ववेळी तत्कालीन भूमापक यांनी प्रत्यक्ष मिळकतीवर जाऊन केलेल्या सर्वेक्षणाअंती अहवालानुसार झोपडीधारकांची नावे अंतिम परि-2 मध्ये वापरासह नमुद केली असून तत्कालीन शासन निर्णयानुसार तत्कालीन उपजिल्हाधिकारी यांनी पात्रतेबाबत निर्णय घेतलेला असल्याचे आढळून येते. सबब आपल्या झ्ज्ञोपडी क्र. 9 व 10 ही एकच असल्याचे तक्रारीबाबत आपण महाराष्ट्र झोपडपट्टी (सु.नि.व.पू) अधिनियम 1971 चे कलम 35 अन्वये मा. अपर जिल्हाधिकारी अति/निष्का पुर्व उपनगरे, चर्चगेट यांचेकडे अपिल करून दाद मागावी. सदर कार्यालयातून प्रकरणी या कार्यालयास फेरपडताळणी कामी आदेश प्राप्त झाले नंतर आदेशातील नमुद वस्तुस्थिती नुसार प्रकरणी पुढील उचीत कर्यालयामार्फत पार पाडण्यात येईल.

1007
GRI/2025/228
पुनर्वसन सदनिकेचे वाटप पत्रं मिळणे बाबद
Assistant Registar
PARSHURAM SITARAM KADAM
20/06/2025458379
मी परशुराम सीताराम कदम
विनंती अर्ज करतो की मी साईदर्शन गंगादर्शन सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था मध्ये पात्रं झोपडपट्टी धारक असून या संस्थांच्या एकत्रित परिशिष्ट -२ मधील अ क्र. ४७ वर पात्रं झोपटपट्टीधारक असून मला विकासक शिवम डेव्हलपर्स त्यांच्याकडून दिनांक २५/११/२०१८ रोजी पुनर्वसन इमारत क्रमांक ए-४, सी विंग , मधील सदनिका क्रंमाक १०१७ चा कायमस्वरूपी ताबा दिलेला आहे.
तरी मला पुनर्वसन सदनिकेचे वाटप पत्र मिळालेला नाही मला ते मिळावा असा मी विनंती करतो.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदर बाबत आपणास कळविण्यात येते की, सदनिका वाटप प्राधिकरणाकडुन झाले आहे किंवा कसे ? याबाबतच्या माहितीसह मुळ झोपडीधारकाने पुराव्यासह कार्यालयात उपस्थित राहावे. व सदनिका वाटप प्राधिकरणाकडुन झाले असल्यास सदनिका वाटपपत्र प्राप्त करुन घ्यावे.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750412936368_8809_agree%20merg.pdf

Computent Authority-05
Sunil Manjrekar20/06/20254583810
We need your site i will colect servy copy
Competent Authority -3Resolved

GRI/2025/224
Compliants pending with SRA registrar for orders since more than 8 months for Auris Serenity Tower 1
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Anandeep Chadha20/06/2025458379
Honourable SRA registrar, Below greviances attached are pending with your office since more than 8 months and many hearings also conducted on this matter since 9 months. Alos there are greviances not resolved also pending at your office as detailed below
a) Illegal meetings conducted voilation byelaw 76 and 108 and passing resolutions which are contravention of 154-B(27) and 79(2) for which no actions are taken declaring such meetings null and void as done for other societies for which proof is also shared with your office
b) 82 disqualifcation not completed and audit rectification report not on records for almost 4 years with two times reminder on 82 voilation by govt auditor and new auditor also.
c) 154-b(8) voilation for which no actions are taken till date
d) No recovery officer appointed nor new BOA formation done to initiate recovery of more than 1.5 crs for default from those on whom 98 recovery was ordered by you almost 1.5 year back

1013
GRI/2025/222
उपरोक्त विषयांकित संस्थेने एम.सी.एस कायद्याचे उल्लंघन करून भष्ट्राचार व फसवणूक केल्याबाबत पत्र क्र ४
Assistant Registar
Sandeep Shashikant Salvi
19/06/2025458358
संदर्भ १: दि. २६.३.२०२५ रोजी मी झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण, वृहन्मुंबई व संबंधित विभागास केलेला पत्रव्यवहार
संदर्भ २: SRA/JTR/OW/2025/7543 दि.२/४/२०२५
संदर्भ ३: S.R.A/ARES/OW/2025/११५४६ सहकार कक्ष झोपुप्रा/ मुंबई दि. २५/०४/२०२५
संदर्भ ४ : दि. २५.४.२०२५ रोजी मी झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण, वृहन्मुंबई व संबंधित विभागास केलेला पत्रव्यवहार
संदर्भ ५ : दि. २७.५.२०२५ रोजी मी झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण, वृहन्मुंबई व संबंधित विभागास केलेला पत्रव्यवहार
संदर्भ १ प्रमाणे तहसिलदार तथा कार्यकारी दंडाधिकारी कुर्ला (मुलुंड) यांचे कार्यालयातुन संस्थेचे दप्तराचा ताबा प्राधिकृत अधिकारी श्री. अनिल शिंदे प्रमाणित लेखापरीक्षक यांना देण्यात यावा असा सक्तीचा आदेश असूनही झो. पु. प्रा. च्या संबंधित विभागाने दोषींवर कारवाई करण्यास टाळाटाळ केली तसेच निबंधक श्रीमती संध्या बावणकुळे मॅडम यांनी परस्पर निवडणुका घेवून संगनमत करून भ्रष्ट्राचार केला व फसवणूक केली संदर्भ संदर्भ २,३ व ४ प्रमाणे निवडणुकी नंतर अद्यापर्यंत संस्थेने सभा घेतल्या नाहीत व लेखाजोखा मांडला नाही
तसेच कै. श्री. जगन्नाथ शिवराम चिंदरकर सह्याद्री नगर, क्वारि रोड, भांडुप (प) मुंबई-७८ येथे भू. क्र.२३७ हिस्सा न. १०५ भाग ३ येथे राहत होते. मा. शहर दिवाणी न्यायालय, मुंबई येथे मालकी हक्कासंबंधी त्यांचा मुलगा किशोर जगन्नाथ चिंदरकर यांनी दावा क्र. १४३०/२०१७ दाखल केला आहे. त्यांच्या वडिलांचा मृत्यू दि. १९/८/२०११ रोजी झाला. असे असतानाही दि. ३/५/२०१५ रोजीच्या सभेच्या इतिवृतान्तावर वडिलांच्या नावासमोर बनावट सही दिसत आहे. त्यासंबंधी किशोर जगन्नाथ चिंदरकर यांनी संबंधित विभागाकडे दि. ३०/१२/२०२२ व १७/६/२०२५ रोजी तक्रार केलेली आहे. सोबत आपल्या संकेतस्थळावरील तक्रार प्रणाली वर आय डी क्र. GRI/2025/216 दि. १९/६/२०२५ रोजी ऑनलाइन तक्रार केलेली आहे.
वरील होत असलेल्या हरकतींची चौकशी करुन संबंधितांवर महाराष्ट्र सहकारी संस्था अधिनियम कायदा, १९६० कलम ७५ (१), ७५ (२अ), ७५ (२ख), ७५ (४), ७९(१), ८९, ७९(१अ)(एफ), ८०(३) आर/डब्ल्यू,१५४बी-२७, १५४ बी-८,८९,७३(१एबी), ८१/७५,१४६(पी), आणि ७३/३(१अब) व MRTP अंतर्गत कारावाई करावी.
(संदीप शशिकांत साळवी) संपर्क : ९८२१६३१२०७
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
तपासणी अधिकारी यांचेकडून तपासणी अहवाल या विभागास प्राप्त झालेला असून सदर अहवालाच्या अनुषंगाने पुढील कार्यवाही प्रस्तावित आहे. तसेच प्रलंबित भाडेबाबत तपासणी अहवाल या कार्यालयास प्राप्त असून त्याबाबत कार्यवाही करण्यात येत आहे.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750349908755_1876_%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AD%20%E0%A5%AC%20%E0%A4%AA.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750349925478_6284_%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AD%20%E0%A5%AD.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750349933525_9378_%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AD%20%E0%A5%AE.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750349942763_6779_%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AD%20%E0%A5%AF%20%E0%A4%AA.pdf,https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750349950439_7372_%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AD%20%E0%A5%A7%E0%A5%A6%20%E0%A4%AA.pdf
1014
GRI/2025/221
उपरोक्त विषयांकित संस्थेने एम.सी.एस कायद्याचे उल्लंघन करून भष्ट्राचार व फसवणूक केल्याबाबत पत्र ३
Assistant Registar
Sandeep Shashikant Salvi
19/06/2025458358
संदर्भ १: प्रमाणे सुखकर्ता एस. आर. ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था नोंदणी क्र : एम.यु. एम/एस. एस. जी/ (टी.सी)/१२४९४/ सन २०१४.
संदर्भ २: १३.०१.२०१५ जा. क्र. झोपुप्रा/सहनि/कार्यासण-१/टा.१/सन २०१५ सहकार कक्ष, झो.पु. प्रा, मुंबई
संदर्भ ३ : २०/०३/२०१५ रोजीचे मा. सहनिबंधक, सहकारी संस्था, झो. पु. प्रा, मुंबई यांचे पत्र.
संदर्भ ४: सह दु. नि. कुर्ला ४ दस्त क्र. करल/१८७९७/२०२१ दि. १८/१०/२०२१ गहाणखत (रु. ६० कोटी) गहाण ठेवण्यासाठी दिलेले सुखकर्ता संस्थेचे दि. २५.०८.२०२१ रोजीचे लेटरहेड
संदर्भ ५: क्र.तह/कुर्ला/जमीन/कलम-८०/कावी-३१/११५९/२०२२ दिनांक २५/११/२०२२.
संदर्भ: १ प्रमाणे सुखकर्ता SRA सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था नोंदणी संदर्भ: २ व ३ प्रमाणे प्रशासक म्हणून एम. के. मोरे प्राधिकृत अधिकारी नियुक्त असताना सुद्धा उपरोक्त संस्थेच्या सभासदांनी कोणतीही सभा न घेता रहिवाशांना अंधारात ठेवून संदर्भ: ४,५ संस्थेच्या सील आणि नोंदणी क्रमांकाचा गैरवापर करून मालमत्ता ६० कोटीची करून (गहाण) ठेऊन फसवणूक केली आहे. तसेच संदर्भ: ६ प्रमाणे तहसिलदार तथा कार्यकारी दंडाधिकारी कुर्ला (मुलुंड) यांचे कार्यालयातुन संस्थेचे दप्तराचा ताबा प्राधिकृत अधिकारी श्री. अनिल शिंदे प्रमाणित लेखापरीक्षक यांना देण्यात यावा असा सक्तीचा आदेश असूनही झो. पु. प्रा. च्या संबंधित विभागाने दोषींवर कारवाई करण्यास टाळाटाळ केली तसेच निबंधक श्रीमती संध्या बावणकुळे मॅडम यांनी परस्पर निवडणुका घेवून संगनमत करून भ्रष्ट्राचार केला व फसवणूक केली.

वि. सू. : सदर पत्रांच्या संदर्भ फाइल्सची संख्या जास्त असल्याने पत्र क्र ४ पुढे देत आहे.
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
तपासणी अधिकारी यांचेकडून तपासणी अहवाल या विभागास प्राप्त झालेला असून सदर अहवालाच्या अनुषंगाने पुढील कार्यवाही प्रस्तावित आहे. तसेच प्रलंबित भाडेबाबत तपासणी अहवाल या कार्यालयास प्राप्त असून त्याबाबत कार्यवाही करण्यात येत आहे.
-

1015
GRI/2025/220
उपरोक्त विषयांकित संस्थेने एम.सी.एस कायद्याचे उल्लंघन करून भष्ट्राचार व फसुवणूक केल्याबाबत पत्र क्र.२
Assistant Registar
Sandeep Shashikant Salvi
19/06/20254583710
संदर्भ १ : सुखकर्ता एस. आर. ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था (पी) स्टेटमेंट ऑफ अकाऊंट शपथपत्र, प्रतिज्ञापत्र व इतर दस्ताएवज
संदर्भ २ :१३.०१.२०१५ जा. क्र. झोपुप्रा/सहनि/कार्यासन-१/टा.१/सन २०१५ सहकार कक्ष, झो.पु. प्रा, मुंबई
संदर्भ ३ : २०/०३/ २०१५ रोजीचे मा. सहनिबंधक, सहकारी संस्था, झो.पु. प्रा, मुंबई यांचे पत्र.
संदर्भ ४ : No. SRA/ ENG/ 2540/ S/ PL&STG/ LOI. Dated:16 January 2014
संदर्भ ५ : उपजिल्हाधिकारी कक्ष, झोपुप्रा, मुंबई. क्र. झोपुप्रा/ उजि/ पु.ऊ/ लोक आयुक्त/ सुखकर्ता/ २०१६/५५५ दि. १८/२/२०१६.

संदर्भ १,४ व ५ प्रमाणे न. भू. क्र. २३७ रहीवाशी २६९ राहत असून सुखकर्ता एसआरए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण तसेच विकासक यांनी संगनमत करून न. भू. क्र. २३७, २५६, २४९, २४७, १३५२ येथे फक्त १२० सदस्य पैकी १०० पात्र सभासद करून ७०% बहुमत दाखवून वेगवेगळया परवानग्या घेतल्या LOI आणि IOA.
संदर्भ: २,३, व ५ प्रमाणे प्रशासक म्हणून एम. के. मोरे प्राधिकृत अधिकारी नियुक्त असताना सुद्धा तसेच सुखकर्ता एसआरए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्थेची सभा आयोजित करून सर्वानुमते ठराव पारित करणे गरजेचे असतानाही कोणताही ठराव पारित न करता स्वतःला कथित मुख्य प्रवर्तक आहे असे भासवून राजेश अनंत भोसले यांनी मा. उच्च न्यायालय, मुंबई येथे रीट पिटिशन ७२३/२०१६ दाखल केली खोटे शपथ पत्र दिले.
वरील होत असलेल्या हरकतींची चौकशी करुन संबंधितांवर महाराष्ट्र सहकारी संस्था अधिनियम कायदा, १९६० कलम ७५ (१), ७५ (२अ), ७५ (२ख), ७५ (४), ७९(१), ८९, ७९(१अ)(एफ), ८०(३) आर/डब्ल्यू,१५४बी-२७, १५४ बी-८,८९,७३(१एबी), ८१/७५,१४६(पी), आणि ७३/३(१अब) व MRTP अंतर्गत कारावाई करावी.

वि. सू. : सदर पत्रांच्या संदर्भ फाइल्सची संख्या जास्त असल्याने पत्र क्र ३ पुढे देत आहे.
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
तपासणी अधिकारी यांचेकडून तपासणी अहवाल या विभागास प्राप्त झालेला असून सदर अहवालाच्या अनुषंगाने पुढील कार्यवाही प्रस्तावित आहे. तसेच प्रलंबित भाडेबाबत तपासणी अहवाल या कार्यालयास प्राप्त असून त्याबाबत कार्यवाही करण्यात येत आहे.
-

GRI/2025/219
उपरोक्त विषयांकित संस्थेने एम.सी.एस कायद्याचे उल्लंघन करून भष्ट्राचार व फसवणूक केल्याबाबत पत्र क्र. १
Assistant Registar
Sandeep Shashikant Salvi
19/06/20254583710
संदर्भ १: जा. क्र. झोपुप्रा/जिअभूअ/कार्या-१/टे-१/तक्रार/१५७३३/२०१७/४५६ दिनांक: १५-०६-२०१७
संदर्भ २: न. भू. क्र. २३७ वर ओंकारेश्वर सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था, WS/HSG/TC/3414/1988-1989 (र.जि.) दिनांक २६/०९/१९८८ रोजी नमूद संस्था नोंदणीकृत
संदर्भ ३: जोडपत्र:२ (सुधारीत नमुना) ७/०१/२०१५

संदर्भ १ प्रमाणे शशिकांत तुकाराम साळवी व इतर २४ दि. ६/१०/१९९० पी. ब ब ज ४४०६/९० खरेदी खता प्रमाणे मालक आहेत.
संदर्भ २ प्रमाणे न. भू. क्र. २३७ वर ओंकारेश्वर सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था दिनांक २६/०९/१९८८ रोजी नोंदणीकृत
संदर्भ ३ प्रमाणे सुखकर्ता एस. आर. ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था नोंदणी.

वि. सू. : सदर पत्रांच्या संदर्भ फाइल्सची संख्या जास्त असल्याने पत्र क्र २ पुढे देत आहे.
CTSOResolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

1017
GRI/2025/218
पुनः घुसखोरी केलेल्या सदनिकेवर मा. सचिव साहेब यांनी दिलेल्या आदेशाची अमलबजावणी न केल्याबाबत
Hon. Secretary (SEC)Harish Pingulkar 19/06/20254583710
झो.पु.प्रा. सचिव साहेब यांचा आदेश ( पत्र क्र. SRA/EC/OW/2024/564 ) त्याचप्रमाणे मा. मुख्य कार्यकारी अधिकारी आणि मा. विधी विभाग यांच्या मान्यतेनुसार झो. पु. प्रा. उपजिल्हाधिकारी ( विशेष कक्ष ) ( पश्चिम उपनगर ) यांना दिनांक २० /१२/ २०२४ रोजी निष्कासन कारवाई करण्याचे आदेश आहेत. तरी आज पर्यन्त निष्कासनाची कारवाई झालीच नाही. त्यामुळे २०२२ पासून ते आज पर्यन्त आमची सदनिका आम्हाला मिळत नाही आहे. त्या संदर्भी मिळकत आणि उपजिल्हाधिकारी या दोन्ही विभागाच्या अधिकारींना वारंवर भेट देऊन आमची सदनिका आम्हास मिळावी म्हणून अनेक पत्र आणि विनवणी करुन देखील तरी आमची सदनिका आम्हास मिळाली नाही आहे. त्यामुळे मा. सचिव साहेब यांनी त्यावर लक्ष देऊन आम्हास आमची सदनिका मिळवून द्यावी.

Dy.Collector (Western)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-

1018
GRI/2025/217
पुनः घुसखोरी केलेल्या सदनिकेवर मा. सचिव साहेब यांनी दिलेल्या आदेशाची अमलबजावणी न केल्याबाबत
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Harish Pingulkar 19/06/2025458358
झो.पु.प्रा. सचिव साहेब यांचा आदेश ( पत्र क्र. SRA/EC/OW/2024/564 ) त्याचप्रमाणे मा. मुख्य कार्यकारी अधिकारी आणि मा. विधी विभाग यांच्या मान्यतेनुसार झो. पु. प्रा. उपजिल्हाधिकारी ( विशेष कक्ष ) ( पश्चिम उपनगर ) यांना दिनांक २० /१२/ २०२४ रोजी निष्कासन कारवाई करण्याचे आदेश आहेत. तरी आज पर्यन्त निष्कासनाची कारवाई झालीच नाही. त्यामुळे २०२२ पासून ते आज पर्यन्त आमची सदनिका आम्हाला मिळत नाही आहे. त्या संदर्भी मिळकत आणि उपजिल्हाधिकारी या दोन्ही विभागाच्या अधिकारींना वारंवर भेट देऊन आमची सदनिका आम्हास मिळावी म्हणून अनेक पत्र आणि विनवणी करुन देखील तरी आमची सदनिका आम्हास मिळाली नाही आहे. त्यामुळे मा. सचिव साहेब यांनी त्यावर लक्ष देऊन आम्हास आमची सदनिका मिळवून द्यावी.

Dy.Collector (Western)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1750337610029_2676_secretary%20order%20.pdf
1019
GRI/2025/216
सुखकर्ता एसआरए गृहनिर्माण संस्थेने केलेल्या गैरप्रकाराबाबत
Assistant Registar
Kishor Jagannath Chindarkar
19/06/2025458369
महोदय/महोदया,
मी किशोर जगन्नाथ चिंदरकर, वय वर्षे ५०, उपरोक्त सध्याच्या पत्त्यावर भाडे तत्वावर रहात असून सह्याद्री नगर, भांडुप (प) मुंबई-७८ न. भू. क्र. २३७ हिस्सा न. १०५ भाग ३ पत्ता येथे राहतो. मा. शहर दिवाणी न्यायालय, मुंबई येथे मालकी हक्कासंबंधी माझा दावा क्र. १४३०/२०१७ असा दाखल आहे.



सुखकर्ता एसआरए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था (नियोजित) यांची विशेष सर्वसाधारण सभा दि.३/५/२०१४ रोजी सायं. ६ वाजता मंदार विद्यालय, समर्थ नगर, भांडुप (प) मुंबई-७८. येथे झो. पु. प्राधिकरणातील तत्कालीन प्राधिकृत अधिकारी श्री. एम. के. मोरे, सहकारी अधिकारी श्रेणी-१ तसेच त्यावेळेचे कथित मुख्य प्रवर्तक राजेश अनंत भोसले व इतर पदाधिकारी यांचे उपस्थितीत घेण्यात आली होती. तसे सूचना परिपत्रक दि. २८/४/२०१४ रोजी जाहीर करण्यात आले होते. त्या सभेच्या वृतान्तात १२० सभासदांच्या स्वाक्ष-या आहेत. त्यापैकी अनू. क्र.२ व परिशिष्ट क्र.९ वर माझे वडिल कै. श्री. जगन्नाथ शिवराम चिंदरकर यांचे नाव व त्या नावासमोर स्वाक्षरी दिसत आहे. परंतु माझ्या वडिलांचे दि. १९/८/२०११ रोजी निधन झालेले असताना ते दि. ३/५/२०१४ रोजी संस्थेच्या झालेल्या सर्वसाधारण सभेत कसे हजर राहू शकतात? सदर प्रकरणावरून माझ्या वडिलांची स्वाक्षरी खोटी आहे हे सिद्ध होते. तसेच ते हयात नसताना त्यांचे भाग भांडवल व प्रवेश फी रु.५१/- कोणी व कशी भरली? याबाबत सहनिबंधक श्रीम. संध्या बावनकुळे यांना दि.३०/१२/२०२२ रोजी तक्रार अर्ज करूनही आजतागायत त्यावर कोणतीही कारावाई झालेली नाही.
सुखकर्ता एसआरए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्थेची कार्यकारीणी दिनांक २०/०३/२०१५ रोजी संस्थेच्या अनियमित भ्रष्ट कारभारामुळे बरखास्त करण्यात आली. १) २०१५ नंतर सदर संस्थेची मे २०२३ पर्यन्त कोणतीही सभा झालेली नाही अथवा त्याचे वैधानिक लेखापरीक्षण झालेले नाही २) लेखापरीक्षकाची नियुक्ती केलेली नाही ३) सर्वसाधारण सभेत प्रत्येक ताळेबंदाबरोबर पुढील गोष्टी संदर्भातील अहवाल सादर करण्यात आलेला नाही. ४) लेखापरीक्षण अहवाल व इतर बाबी अधिमंडळाच्या सभेसमोर ठेवण्यात आलेल्या नाहीत.
सुखकर्ता एसआरए गृहनिर्माण संस्था ही येथील रहिवाशी यांची फसवणूक करणारी संस्था आहे. ही या व इतर प्रकरणावरून सिद्ध होते. तरीही आपण सदर प्रकरणातील दोषी व्यक्तींवर कठोर कारावाई करून आम्हास न्याय द्यावा ही विनंती.

आपला विश्वासू,


किशोर जगन्नाथ चिंदरकर
मोबाइल : ८१६९९८९१३८
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
तपासणी अधिकारी यांचेकडून तपासणी अहवाल या विभागास प्राप्त झालेला असून सदर अहवालाच्या अनुषंगाने पुढील कार्यवाही प्रस्तावित आहे. तसेच प्रलंबित भाडेबाबत तपासणी अहवाल या कार्यालयास प्राप्त असून त्याबाबत कार्यवाही करण्यात येत आहे.

GRI/2025/206
Subject: Complaint Regarding Misappropriation and Misuse of Documents to Falsely Show Two Huts Shown in Annexure-II for SukhShanti scheme Dated April 17, 2012 – Anil Shedge & Mandakini Shedge Listed for Hut Nos. 9 & 10. No. BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97 cITING The Hon’ble Supreme Court of India, in the landmark judgment S.P. Chengalvaraya Naidu (Dead) by L.Rs. v. Jagannath (Dead) by L.Rs. & Others, reported in (1994) 1 S.C.J. 179, categorically held that: “Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal.” This principle applies squarely to the present case, where fraudulent representations have been made to secure undue benefits under the SRA scheme. From,Mr. M Nazir ,B- 12 , SukhShanti CHSL, SukhShanti CHSL, Tunga Village, Shiv Shakti Nagar Saki Vihar Road, Powai, Mumbai-72-
—--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Subject:Complaint Regarding Misappropriation and Misuse of Documents to Falsely Show Two Huts Shown in Annexure-II for SukhShanti scheme Dated April 17, 2012 – Anil Shedge & Mandakini Shedge Listed for Hut Nos. 9 & 10. Despite Only One Legal Structure (Room E1) as per SukhShanti CHSL Records legally Registered under Maharashtra cooperative act ( MCS act ) on 3rd Oct 1996 (Reg. No. BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97

cITING The Hon’ble Supreme Court of India, in the landmark judgment S.P. Chengalvaraya Naidu (Dead) by L.Rs. v. Jagannath (Dead) by L.Rs. & Others, reported in (1994) 1 S.C.J. 179, categorically held that: “Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal.”
This principle applies squarely to the present case, where fraudulent representations have been made to secure undue benefits under the SRA scheme.
EXH-5- Page1 -communication/circular from Housing dept with bearing No. : Zopuyo-2011 / PR No. 335 / Zopsu-1 dated: 27/9/2011 FROM,,Under Secretary to the Government of Maharashtra. Madam Cama Road, Hutatma Rajguru Chowk, Mantralaya, Mumbai - 400.032. This pertains to Immediately file cases in the concerned police station under section 3 Z-2 (6) of the said Act FOR Misappropriation and Misuse of Documents

Note -
According Annexure-II dated April 17, 2012, Anil Shedge and Mandakini Shedge are listed as occupants of two distinct huts zopadi no.9 & 10.
However, as per documented records of SukhShanti CHSL (registered with Konkan Bhavan in 1996), the original share certificate holder is Dhananjay Shedge, whose name is in the 2008 elections.The room no. for the same is E1 and is one roomAs per MCS act the share certificate holder is entitled for voting rights in election.
—-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Scheme address - SRS in L Ward,CTS No-78,79(pt) & 81(pt),Tunga village,near Shanti Complex , Powai, Mumbai - 400072
SRA LOI No.: SRA/ENG/2149/L/STGL & PL/LOI dated 01/11/2012 ,Draft LOI dated: 24/04/2024
Developer: Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) , Architect: Ellora Projects

Pdf attachment contains following COMPELLING EVIDENCES

EXH-1 -1st page. - acknowledgment receipt dated 6th Aug 2024, bearing the SRA inward stamp, confirms the submission of two sets (1 each addressed to CA-8 & Hon’ble CEO, SRA)


EXH-1 -2 To 6 pages. - complaint signed by M Nazir acknowledgment receipt dated 6th Aug 2024, bearing the SRA , CA-8 inward stamp, .


EXH-2 - 1st page. - Registration Certificate of Sukhshanti CHSL, originally registered with Konkan Bhavan with original 93 members.


EXH-3- 1 To 4 pages - Documents carrying the official seal of the Deputy Registrar, L Ward, including the list of 93 original members.Dhananjay Shedge LISTED ON PAGE 4 OF EXH-3 AT SR.NO.78


EXH 4 - 1 To 3 pages - Extracts from Annexure-2, specifically the pages reflecting Hutment Nos. 9 and 10, . pAGE 2 & 3 SHOWS Hutment Nos. 9 and 10 RESPECTIVELY


EXH-5- 1 To 2 pages consist of the Order dated 13.11.2006 issued by the Deputy Registrar, L Ward, appointing Shri M.N. Wasnik as Administrator, thereby nullifying the claim of any elected Managing Committee functioning during that period.


EXH-5- Pages 3 to 22 comprise the detailed submission under GEN/2024/81401 dated 20th September 2024, addressed to the CEO, SRA. This includes compelling prima facie evidence of serious misconduct, including forgery, tampering of stamp papers, and collusive acts between Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) and the then Managing Committee. Notably, Page No. 14 of EXH-5 contains Statement C, in which Shri Dhananjay Shedge is listed at Sr. No. 78. Further, Page No. 15 of EXH-5 confirms that Dhananjay Shedge appears at Sr. No. 78 in the society’s voter list for the elections conducted on 9th March 2008.The last page of EXH-5 clearly displays the layout plan & WRITE UP related to the matter.
This unambiguously establishes that no transfer certificate was issued, and the membership remained unchanged at that time. The document also confirms that election results were declared on 27th May 2008, and Anil Shedge did not contest the elections, thereby reinforcing that the subsequent inclusion of his name for hutments in Annexure-II is manipulated and unsupported by society records.
EXH-5- Page1 -communication/circular from Housing dept with bearing No. : Zopuyo-2011 / PR No. 335 / Zopsu-1 dated: 27/9/2011 FROM,,Under Secretary to the Government of Maharashtra. Madam Cama Road, Hutatma Rajguru Chowk, Mantralaya, Mumbai - 400.032. This pertains to Immediately file cases in the concerned police station under section 3 Z-2 (6) of the said Act FOR Misappropriation and Misuse of Documents
Supporting citations /GR /circularS
FROM, (S. S. Dhapate) Under Secretary to the Government of Maharashtra. No: Zopuyo-2011 / PR No. 335 / Zopsu-1 Housing Block, Madam Cama Road, Hutatma Rajguru Chowk, Mantralaya, Mumbai - 400.032. dated: 27/9/2011 , TO, Additional Collector (Ex. / Ex.) Sir, Eastern Suburbs, Industrial Insurance Building, 1st Floor, Churchgate, Mumbai. Subject: - Regarding the proceedings to be taken to point out that the documents submitted in the inquiry are unreliable. References: Your letter No. Ajia / Ati / Nisha / Mampu / Kawi - 7/2011, dated 3.8.2011. BRIEF AS FOLLOWS
According to the above topic. In pursuance of the letter dated 3.8.2011, it is informed that after ascertaining the eligibility of the hut holders whose eligibility has been ascertained while certifying Annexure-II under the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme and after some time after verification, it is found that such hut holders have submitted bogus documents, the competent authority is required to initiate proceedings for disqualification / cancellation of eligibility of such hut holders. Maharashtra Slum (S.N. Under the provisions of the Act, 1971, the competent authority is competent to take necessary decisions at their level on the complaints without considering the appeal in such cases.
It is expected to take action to cancel the eligibility of the hut holders on the basis of bogus documents / documents and immediately file cases against them in the concerned police station under section 3 Z-2 (6) of the said Act. Action will be taken after investigation by the police against the officials of the concerned slum dwellers' cooperative housing society or the developer who will be found guilty of assisting in this crime..The above steps should be followed.
In the case of Jijaba Dashrath Shinde v. The State of Maharashtra (Writ Petition (L) No. 5671 of 2024), the Hon'ble High Court of Judicature at Bombay, comprising Justices G.S. Patel and Kamal Khata, dated 21 Feb 24.BRIEF AS FOLLOWS
“that if the Slum Act is a welfare legislation, the welfare is not that of builders. We also express our extreme displeasure at the manner in which the AGRC is conducting and discharging — or more accurately not conducting nor discharging — its required functions “
In the case of A.V. Papayya Sastry & Others vs. Government of Andhra Pradesh & Others, the judgement was delivered on 7th March 2007 by Justice C.K. Thakker. The case, recorded under Appeal (Civil) 5097-5099 of 2004, was heard by a bench comprising Justice C.K. Thakker and Justice Lokeshwar Singh Panta. The petitioners, led by A.V. Papayya Sastry, challenged the actions of the Government of Andhra Pradesh and other respondents in this significant legal matter. BRIEF AS FOLLOWS
It is a well-established principle of law that any judgement or order obtained through fraud cannot be recognized as valid in the eyes of the law. Three centuries ago, Chief Justice Edward Coke famously proclaimed, "Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal." This principle asserts that a judgement, decree, or order procured by deceit or fraud against the Court, Tribunal, or Authority is deemed a nullity, lacking any legal effect.
Such a judgement—whether issued by a lower court or a final court—must be treated as void by all courts, regardless of their hierarchy. It can be contested in any court at any time, whether through appeal, revision, writ, or even in collateral proceedings.
In the landmark case of Lazarus Estates Ltd. v. Beasley (1956), Lord Denning eloquently stated, "No judgement of a court, no order of a Minister, can be allowed to stand if it has been obtained by fraud." This underscores the judiciary's commitment to upholding justice and ensuring that no fraudulent actions can taint the legal process.
The Hon’ble Apex Court, in the case of S.P. Chengavaraya Naidu (dead) by L.Rs. v. Jagannath (dead) by L.Rs. & others, reported in (1994) 1 S.C.J. 179, has pronounced an important judgment concerning the legal impact of fraud, as follows:
"Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal," observed Chief Justice Edward Coke of England about three centuries ago. It is a well-settled proposition of law that a judgment or decree obtained by playing fraud upon the court is a nullity and non-est in the eyes of the law. Such a judgment or decree, whether passed by the first Court or even by the highest court, must be treated as a nullity by every court, whether superior or inferior. This can be challenged in any court, even in collateral proceedings."

Respected Hon’ble officer,
With reference to the above subject and attached documents, we wish to highlight the symbiotic collusion between the developer (Vibhuti Constructions) and certain complicit Managing Committee members. Despite our complaints since 2013, no action has been taken against this ongoing misconduct.
KEY ISSUES - On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) entered into a DA and GPOA with a self-declared MC of Sukhshanti CHSL, despite:
The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act,
It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society,
The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence.
Further, these agreements were tampered with and dated to 2008 and subsequently submitted to SRA in February 2009, leading to the issuance of LOI in Nov 2012 . Despite this, the Engineering Department of SRA — which, as revealed through RTI, has been in possession of these documents — has failed to initiate any criminal or appropriate administrative action, despite complaints filed as early as 2013 and as recently as Oct 2023.

As per Annexure-II dated April 17, 2012, both Anil Shedge and Mandakini Shedge have been shown as occupants of Hut Nos. 9 and 10. However, the registration records of Sukhshanti CHSL, registered legally under the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies Act with Konkan Bhavan, Navi Mumbai (Reg. No. BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97), clearly show only one legal structure (Room No. E1) in the name of Dhananjay Shedge, who was listed as a member during the 2008 elections.
This appears to be a deliberate act to exploit the SRA scheme by fraudulently claiming multiple benefits. Unfortunately, our repeated complaints have gone unheard.
—-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Brief history-
The number of structures recorded under Sukhshanti CHSL, registered with Konkan Bhavan in 1996, appears to have been increased arbitrarily in the records of Annexure-II for SukhShanti scheme Dated April 17, 2012 & Sukhshanti SRA CHSL, which was registered with the SRA on March 21, 2013. This discrepancy is deeply regrettable and indicates a serious lapse in regulatory oversight.
In accordance with the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies (MCS) Act, the proper processes for clearance, transfer, and approval of share certificate holders of hutments—from the Registration Department of Konkan Bhavan, Belapur, to the jurisdiction of SRA, Bandra East—appear to be missing. Additionally, the names listed in Annexure-II, dated April 17, 2012, meant to determine Patrata/Eligibility for SRA, do not match the names of original share certificate holders of hutments under the 1996-registered society.
Despite legitimate complaints filed on March 5, 2013, the SRA proceeded to register Sukhshanti SRA CHSL on March 21, 2013, disregarding the regulatory gaps and noncompliances. The discrepancies in the number of hutments between the LOI issued on 1st November 2012 and the updated records in 2024, along with other irregularities—especially relating to the integration require a holistic and cross-departmental investigation, rather than isolated reviews by individual authorities.
Furthermore, historical complaints dating back to 2013 suggest that certain officers within the SRA and other government bodies may have overlooked or ignored clear documentation issues and irregularities. Despite over 90 members raising serious and valid concerns regarding the process of LOI issuance and society registration, no fair or conclusive action has been taken to date.
We request you to take immediate and appropriate action against this fraudulent entry and initiate an impartial investigation to uphold the integrity of the scheme.
Prayers
cITING The Hon’ble Supreme Court of India, in the landmark judgment S.P. Chengalvaraya Naidu (Dead) by L.Rs. v. Jagannath (Dead) by L.Rs. & Others, reported in (1994) 1 S.C.J. 179, categorically held that: “Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal.”
This principle applies squarely to the present case, where fraudulent representations have been made to secure undue benefits under the SRA scheme.
In view of this, we respectfully request that appropriate action be taken in accordance with thecommunication/circular from Housing dept with bearing No. : Zopuyo-2011 / PR No. 335 / Zopsu-1 dated: 27/9/2011 FROM,,Under Secretary to the Government of Maharashtra. Madam Cama Road, Hutatma Rajguru Chowk, Mantralaya, Mumbai - 400.032.
Immediately file cases in the concerned police station under section 3 Z-2 (6) of the said Act FOR Misappropriation and Misuse of Documents to Falsely Show Two Huts Shown in Annexure-II for SukhShanti scheme Dated April 17, 2012 – Anil Shedge & Mandakini Shedge Listed for Hut Nos. 9 & 10. Despite Only One Legal Structure (Room E1) as per SukhShanti CHSL Records legally Registered under Maharashtra cooperative act ( MCS act ) on 3rd Oct 1996 (Reg. No. BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97


Thanking you,
Yours sincerely,
Competent Authority -8Resolved
आपण आपल्या तक्रारीमध्ये नमुद केलेल्या सुखशांती सह.गृह.संस्थे अंतर्गत मौजे- तुंगवा, न.भू.क्र. 78,79,81 पै या मिळकती वरील अंतिम परिशिष्ट-2 चे अवलोकन केले असता झोपडी क्र.9 अनिल रामचंद्र शेडगे यांना सन 1995 च्या मतदार यादी नुसार निवासी पात्र म्हणून घोषीत केल्याचे आढळून येते. तसेच झोपडी क्र.10 मंदाकीनी अनिल शेडगे अनिवासी यांना दि. 01/01/1995 पुर्वीचे अनिवासी वापराचे पुरावे सादर न केल्याने अपात्र केल्याचे आढळून येते.
आपण आपल्या तक्रारीमध्ये झोपडी क्र.9 व झोपडी क्र.10 हया एकच असल्याचे नमुद केले आहे. तत्कालीन उपजिल्हाधिकारी (अति/निष्का) घाटकोपर यांनी तद्ववेळी तत्कालीन भूमापक यांनी प्रत्यक्ष मिळकतीवर जाऊन केलेल्या सर्वेक्षणाअंती अहवालानुसार झोपडीधारकांची नावे अंतिम परि-2 मध्ये वापरासह नमुद केली असून तत्कालीन शासन निर्णयानुसार तत्कालीन उपजिल्हाधिकारी यांनी पात्रतेबाबत निर्णय घेतलेला असल्याचे आढळून येते. सबब आपल्या झ्ज्ञोपडी क्र. 9 व 10 ही एकच असल्याचे तक्रारीबाबत आपण महाराष्ट्र झोपडपट्टी (सु.नि.व.पू) अधिनियम 1971 चे कलम 35 अन्वये मा. अपर जिल्हाधिकारी अति/निष्का पुर्व उपनगरे, चर्चगेट यांचेकडे अपिल करून दाद मागावी. सदर कार्यालयातून प्रकरणी या कार्यालयास फेरपडताळणी कामी आदेश प्राप्त झाले नंतर आदेशातील नमुद वस्तुस्थिती नुसार प्रकरणी पुढील उचीत कर्यालयामार्फत पार पाडण्यात येईल.

GRI/2025/203
Complain about flat owner as my neighbor
Assistant RegistarTejal morajkar 12/06/20254583010
I stay in andheri east I wanna complain about my neighbor as she is using abuse words and troubling us and our committe is not taking any action as I want to complain against her that she is also a 3rd owner and committe is not taking any action bcoz committe have involved themselve in them so I want justice. She have ran and came here with her husband she belongs to caste UP bhaiya . She says that marathi lokanchi layki nhi ahe hita rahnayachi marathi lokani por kadun sodli ha rasta var such things are said by her . So plz request take quick action and I'm studying for mpsc it's always a disturbance she dont allow anyone to play on floor
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
आपला तक्रार अर्जातील मुद्दा संस्थेच्या कामकाजासी सबंधित आहे. त्यासाठी प्रथम संस्थेकडे अर्ज करणे आवश्यक आहे. संस्थेने सदर अर्जावर निर्णय न दिल्यास निबंधकाकडे दाद मागण्याची तरतुद आहे.

GRI/2025/202
Society charges extra money for keeping tenant
Assistant RegistarDhanji Gangar 12/06/2025458288
I have kept tenant in my premises so the society charges me extra 10000 rs and maintenance charges extra
I m handicapped person and i m not able to pay. Society was not accepted maintenance charges which i have paid for 10 months and they says first you pay 10000rs for tenant then we accept maintenance charges i m staying with mom in other place on rent. We have only income of this rent.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
आपला तक्रार अर्जातील मुद्दा संस्थेच्या कामकाजासी सबंधित आहे. त्यासाठी प्रथम संस्थेकडे अर्ज करणे आवश्यक आहे. संस्थेने सदर अर्जावर निर्णय न दिल्यास निबंधकाकडे दाद मागण्याची तरतुद आहे.

1028
GRI/2025/201
SOS CALL FOR APPOINTMENT OF Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb — URGENT REQUEST FOR REGISTRATION OF FIR & LOI CANCELLATION BASED ON COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF FORGED AGREEMENTS-Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA)
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Ashish shukla11/06/20254582910
TITLE - SOS CALL -18 YEARS ORDEAL - PROLONGED ADMINISTRATIVE SILENCE REFLECTS A SERIOUS DERELICTION OF STATUTORY DUTIES, WHICH HAS EFFECTIVELY ENABLED THE DEVELOPER AND MANAGING COMMITTEE TO CONTINUE SYSTEMIC MANIPULATIONS UNCHECKED SINCE 2006. JUSTICE DELAYED , JUSTICE DENIED
Date - 11 JUNE 25
TO,
Hon. CEO ,SRA ,Dr. Kalyankar saheb,
AK Marg ,Mumbai-51


FROM
__Mr. Ashish Shukla Room No. __C-23, SukhShanti CHSL, Tunga Village, Shiv Shakti Nagar, Saki Vihar Road, Powai, Mumbai – 400072
SRA Scheme- Sukhshanti CHS , SRA LOI No.: SRA/ENG/2149/L/STGL & PL/LOI dated 01/11/2012 ,Draft LOI dated: 24/04/2024 Developer: Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) , Architect: Ellora Projects
Subject: SOS CALL FOR APPOINTMENT OF Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb , — URGENT REQUEST FOR REGISTRATION OF FIR & LOI CANCELLATION BASED ON COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF FORGED AGREEMENTS { (Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA)}

SELF EXPLANATORY COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF MISAPPROPRIATED DOCUMENTS FORGERY
EXH-A -SRA-131106-ADMINIS-forgery - Self explanatory compelling evidence of misappropriated documents
On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence.


EXH-B -SRA-1PGFORG+13NOV06+19SEPT24FIR- - Self explanatory compelling evidence of misappropriated documents
PAGE1 shows self explanatory evidence of forgery done in agreements with visual clarity & supporting write up
PAGE2 & 3 - shows Deputy Registrar ,L ward Order dated 13.11.2006 appointing Administrator M.N. Wasnik;
PAGE 4 onwards - Grievance submitted via email from rajukasa@gmail.com on 19 Sep 2024 at 15:38 hrs to CEO@sra.gov.in, & others .which was also signed by Mohd.Nazir & submitted on 20 Sept 24 to SRA. (GEN/2024/81401 dated 20 Sept 2024,)
EXH-C-SRA- nazir-transfers&delay-30april24- - complaint dated 30 Apr 2024 to HON. CEO -SRA TO INITIATE DISCIPLINARY ACTION UNDER SECTION 10 OF MAHARASHTRA GOVERNMENT SERVANTS' REGULATION OF TRANSFERS AND PREVENTION OF DELAY IN DISCHARGE OF OFFICIAL DUTIES ACT, 2005 .ACTION AGAINST Concerned Officer/Incharge of SRA FOR CANCELLATION OF LOI( engg.dept,SRA),Dy. Registrar- SRA, Dy. Collector and Competent Authority, Ghatkopar-SRA


EXH-D- HIGH RESOLUTION CLARITY -1 pager showing self explanatory evidences of forgery done in agreements with visual clarity & supporting write up



KEY ISSUE - KEY ISSUE 1: ILLEGAL DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT & GPOA – BAD IN LAW (Since 22.11.2006 – 6,772 Days) - On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence. Further, these agreements were tampered with and dated to 2008 and subsequently submitted to SRA in February 2009, leading to the fraudulent issuance of LOI in November 2012. Despite this, the Engineering Department of SRA – in possession of these documents (as revealed via RTI) – has failed to initiate criminal or disciplinary action, despite complaints filed as early as 2013 and as recently as October 2023.
KEY ISSUE 2: NON-COMPLIANCE AFTER MEETING WITH CEO, SRA (03.05.2024- A meeting was held on 03.05.2024 with the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, where clear instructions were issued to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt to act upon the above issues. However, no meaningful follow-up action has been initiated by the concerned head of departments, and the notings of the Hon’ble CEO on subsequent letters have been entirely disregarded.
KEY ISSUE 3: FAILURE TO ACT ON MASS GRIEVANCE HEARING (04.10.2024) - Further, during the joint mass grievance meeting on 04.10.2024 (246 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble MP Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar, strong prima facie evidence of forgery and collusion was presented. CEO ISSUED Specific directions to Smt. Sandhya Bawankule – Assistant Registrar ,Shri R.B. Mitkar – Dy. Chief Engineer & Shri Birje – Dy. Chief Engineer .However, no tangible action has resulted, reflecting serious lapses in administrative accountability.
KEY REFERENCES- Initial Complaints Filed to SRA Since March 2013 Recent reminder complaints filed since 03.10.2023 remain unresolved for over 599 days. Multiple letters to the SRA include GEN/2023/80255 dated 03 Oct 2023, GEN/2023/93223 dated 06 Nov 2023, GEN/2024/4835 dated Jan 2024, etc. Further representations were made via letters to SRA, include GEN/2024/43520, GEN/2024/52487, GEN/2024/38932 dated 22 April 2024, GEN/2024/81401 dated 20 Sept 2024, etc. Joint mass grievance meeting was held on 04.10.2024 (227 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble MP Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon’ble CEO Dr. Kalyankar at SRA.
OTHER REFERENCES- 1) E-Tappal Nos. 7391598/2024/MANTRA-CRU, 7403496/2024/MANTRA-CRU dtd 20.09.24 , 7296650/2024/CMO-TAPAL dtd 22.08.24) 2) Reference: E-Tappal Nos. 7250681,7250848,7221561/2024/MANTRA-CRU .Email dated 31.07.2024 at 20:58 hrs from rajukasa@gmail.com — Senior Citizen SOS appeal for Hon’ble CM’s appointment & so on. Hard copy submitted on 01.08.2024. 3) Note: Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th Sep 2024, issued by the Housing Department, was officially addressed to the Hon’ble CEO, SRA. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830. 4) letter from Housing Department No. Sankerna-2024/pr.kra.03/Zhopasu-1 dated 15 Oct 2024 ( nond.sha.kra - Aa.Mu.S (gruni) 7511 with ref no- 901/2024 ) 5) Refer attachment - Recent Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 sent from Hon’ble Deputy Secretary Shri Sunil Tumhare Sahib to Hon’ble CEO, SRA citing References to the Department’s letter dated 03.10.2024 (No. Sankirna-2024/No.No.831/Zhopsu-1) and subsequent reminder letters dated 30.10.2024, 07.01.2025, 09.01.2025, and 27.01.2025. Mantralaya directed to meet Hon’ble CEO, SRA, but attempts blocked at OSD/PA level.


LEGAL BRIEF ON SUKHSHANTI CHSL (REGD. Oct 1996) & ADMINISTRATIVE SILENCE: SYSTEMIC MANIPULATION AND THE SYMBIOTIC COLLUSION OF VESTED INTERESTS UNCHECKED SINCE NOVEMBER 2006
1. ORIGINAL SOCIETY REGISTRATION & CONVEYANCE(1996) Sukhshanti CHSL was registered on 03.10.1996 with 93 members over CTS Nos. 78, 79(pt), and 81(pt) under the MCS Act, 1960, based on an agreement dated 11.08.1995 between landlord Shri Jagdishchandra Gupta and promoter Mr. Azad. The land was to be conveyed to the society after its registration, thereby ensuring members right
2. 6,772 DAYS (Since 22.11.2006): ILLEGAL DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT & GPOA On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97), even though: (a) MC had No lawful authority as MC was not elected through elections conducted under the MCS Act; (b) It violated the Deputy Registrar’s ,L ward Order dated 13.11.2006 appointing Administrator M.N. Wasnik; (c) It involved misuse of the society’s seal and registration number. [EXH-A -COMPELLING EVIDENCE PROVING THE FRAUD}
3. FRAUDULENT USE OF SOCIETY SEAL ,REG.NO. & ADDED SURROUNDING RESIDENTS WITHOUT MAJORITY CONSENT ILLEGALLY Unauthorized individuals misused the society’s registration number and seal to enter into binding contracts, thereby committing fraud under the (IPC) and violating Section 146(p) of the MCS Act.
4. SUPPRESSION & NON-HANDOVER OF RECORDS Since 2006, symbiotic collusion established a pattern of non-transparent functioning along with criminal intimidation .Society records have not been produced despite multiple Khulasa (disclosure) orders issued by the Registrar,L ward since Nov 2023 recently.
5. 5,944 DAYS (Since 27.02.2009) FORGED DOCUMENTS SUBMITTED IN LOI PROPOSAL IN FEB 2009 TO SECURE LOI LOI proposal comprising of Tampered agreements dated to 2008 were submitted in February 2009 to SRA, leading to the fraudulent issuance of an LOI in November 2012.The Engineering Department of SRA, in custody of these ( Info issued via RTI) has failed to initiate meaningful action despite complaints since 2013 and as recently as Oct 2023. yet no criminal or administrative action has been taken GOVERNMENT DIRECTIVE UNDER SECTION 79(A), MCS ACT, 1960 — MANDATORY COMPLIANCE IN REDEVELOPMENT MATTERS A Government Resolution (G.R.) bearing No. SaGruYo-2007/Pra.Kra.554/14-S, dated 03.01.2009, was issued by the Cooperation, Marketing, and Textile Department, By Order This directive under Section 79(A) of the Maharashtra Co-operative Societies Act, 1960, mandates compliance, transparency, and statutory accountability in the redevelopment of co-operative housing societies. Objective was: To address member complaints and ensure that all redevelopment processes adhere strictly to the provisions of the MCS Act, Rules, and registered by-laws. Despite the binding nature of the above Government Resolution, such statutory measures issued by the Hon’ble Government are routinely overlooked or bypassed by vested interests within the system. This selective disregard conveniently benefits collusive networks, undermines statutory compliance, and defeats the very objective of transparency and justice envisioned under Section 79(A) of the MCS Act, 1960. 6. ANNEXURE-II MANIPULATION, LOI APPROVAL & SOCIETY REGISTRATION Following LOI approval in November 2012, the SRA-registered Sukhshanti SRA CHSL (Reg. Date: 21.03.2013) was formed with only 30 out of the 143 actual hutments, raising serious questions of exclusion and manipulation. In contrast, the original society registered in 1996 had 93 structures, which subsequently increased to more than 98, as evident from Annexure-II dated 17.04.2012. These additions included unauthorized numbers and unverified occupants. For nearly the same geographical area, this increase from 93 to over 98 huts points to clear systematic manipulation. Moreover, irregularities in transfer certificates and inclusion of unknown names have been flagged in Annexure-II, and a separate complaint has been submitted to Mantralaya (July 2024). To avoid circular referencing and procedural delays, these auxiliary issues are being temporarily kept separate from the primary focus on LOI cancellation. Note: The issuance and cancellation of the LOI fall exclusively under the jurisdiction of the SRA Engineering Department and must be acted upon independently and without delay.
7. ADMINISTRATIVE INACTION & CONSEQUENCES
7.1 4,477 DAYS (Since 05.03.2013) -MINISTERIAL INTERVENTION IGNORED- Initial complaints in March 2013 submitted. Following intervention by Hon’ble Guardian Minister Shri Naseem Khan, the SRA Engineering Department’s report dated 18.05.2013 stated cancellation of the LOI or fresh GBR then. However, no action was initiated, with the matter manipulated systemically & managed to protect vested interests.
7.2 613 DAYS (Since 03.10.2023) PROLONGED DELAY, RECENT REMINDER COMPLAINTS IGNORED & NON-REDRESSAL CONTINUES Despite continuous follow-ups, recent Reminder complaints filed since 03.10.2023 remain unresolved for over 599 days. Multiple letters to the SRA include GEN/2023/80255 dated 3 Oct 23 ,GEN/2023/93223 dated 6 Nov 23 , GEN/2024/4835 dated Jan 24 etc
7.3 REVISED LOI APPROVED (NOT ISSUED) ON 24.04.2024 – FURTHER VALIDATES SYSTEMIC MANIPULATION A revised LOI was approved (not issued) On 24.04.2024 under the altered name“SUKHASHANTI CHS (Proposed)” (note -”A” between Sukh & shanti), bypassing the existing SRA-registered society, reflecting intentional procedural violation to protect the disqualification of Managing Committee , evade MCS Act liabilities & offences & continue the same autocratic pattern..The Engineering Department , SRA, again conveniently turned blind eye to the same. It is pertinent to note that, as seen in many SRA schemes, the society is being reduced to a mere puppet or redundant institution, primarily to enable the developer to bypass statutory processes and regulatory scrutiny. This undermines the cooperative structure and violates the spirit and intent of redevelopment
7.4 FAILURE TO ACT ON CEO’S DIRECTIONS DATED 03.05.2024 A meeting was held on 03.05.2024 with the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, during which directions were issued to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt. However, no meaningful follow-up action has been taken by the Heads of the concerned Departments, despite notings by the CEO on subsequent letters. Multiple letters to the SRA have been brought to the Hon’ble CEO’s attention recently, including key references such as GEN/2024/43520, GEN/2024/52487, GEN/2024/38932 dated 22 April 2024, GEN/2024/81401 DATED 20 SEP 24 ETC.
7.5 EVIDENCE IGNORED AT HIGHEST LEVELS & NON-REDRESSAL CONTINUES Prima facie evidence of forgery, stamp paper tampering, and collusion between the developer and a self-declared MC was submitted to: The Hon’ble Chief Minister’s Janta Darbar on 21.08.2024 ( E-Tappal Nos. 7296650/2024/CMO-TAPAL dtd 22.08.24) Follow-up Detailed complaint on 19.09.2024 submitted to Hon.CM & others (E-Tappal Nos. 7391598/2024/MANTRA-CRU, 7403496/2024/MANTRA-CRU dtd 20.09.24 ) Yet, no redressal or criminal action has followed from the concerned authorities. Repeated letters & reminders from the Housing Department to the SRA regarding the matter and seeking inquiry report or avhal have not been honoured. Despite clear directions issued by the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, during the meeting held on 03.05.2024, addressed to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt, no meaningful follow-up action has been undertaken by HEAD OF the concerned departments, reflecting administrative inaction and disregard of statutory responsibilities. Note: Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th September 2024, issued by the Housing Department, was officially addressed to the Hon’ble CEO, SRA. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830. This letter, routed through the prescribed protocol and command chain, was forwarded to various internal departments for necessary action and compliance. Yet, as of date, no substantial response or resolution has been reported. Other letter issued from Housing Department, include Letter No. Sankerna-2024/pr.kra.03/Zhopasu-1 dated 15 Oct 2024 ( nond.sha.kra - Aa.Mu.S (gruni) 7511 with ref no- 901/2024 ) Refer attachment - Recent Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 sent from Hon’ble Deputy Secretary Shri Sunil Tumhare Sahib to Hon’ble CEO, SRA citing References to the Department’s letter dated 03.10.2024 (No. Sankirna-2024/No.No.831/Zhopsu-1) and subsequent reminder letters dated 30.10.2024, 07.01.2025, 09.01.2025, and 27.01.2025. The Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 stated “ Tari Shri. Kasa yanchya vividha e-mail madhil namud mudyambabat niyamochit karwahi karun kelelelya karwahi cha svayansparsh ahwal tatkal shasanas sadar karava, hi vinanti.” 7.6 PUBLIC INTEREST COMPROMISED These continuing failures constitute serious violations of the MCS & IPC and severely undermine public interest, allowing systemic fraud and manipulation to persist ............................................................................. (LR)


LEGAL REFERENCES Hon'ble Supreme Court of India in case of "A.V. Papayya Sastry & Ors. v. Government of A.P. & Ors.", the Apex Court has opined that, if any judgment or order is obtained by fraud, it cannot be said to be a judgment or order in law. “Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal. This principle applies universally—whether the fraud is against a Court, Tribunal, or Statutory Authority—rendering the outcome void ab initio Hon'ble Supreme Court of India in case of Sheila Sebastian V/s R. Jawaharaj & Anr. (Criminal Appeal Nos. 359-360 of 2010) - ‘Forgery’ and ‘Making of False Documents’ Md. Ibrahim & Ors V/s State of Bihar & Anr, (2009) 8 SCC 751 Supreme Court Order -Dhanraj N. Asawani vs. Amarjeetsingh Mohindersingh Basi. (Citation: 2023 (SC) 652). Date of Decision:July 25, 2023 .Maharashtra Co-Operative Societies Act Does Not Curtail Power Of Police Investigation Under CrPC: Supreme Court . Supreme Court Order- Ramarao & Anr vs Narayan & Anr on 20 December, 1968 Equivalent citations: 1969 AIR 724, 1969 SCR (3) 185. IN SUPPORT OF GRIEVANCE REDRESSAL MANDATE Excerpt from Court Order cited IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION WRIT PETITION NO. 2333 OF 2008 Shankar Versus The Chief Executive Officer, Slum Rehabilitation Authority & Ors. "We make it clear that the Chief Executive Officer (C.E.O.), Slum Rehabilitation Authority, Mumbai, shall issue a circular forthwith bringing this order to the notice of all concerned Departments and requiring them to act expeditiously, diligently, and within the time-frame provided in the orders of the Court. The principle of public accountability would require a public servant to discharge his obligations without any delay and with a complete sense of responsibility. There should be no justification whatsoever for keeping matters pending on their table for years together without passing any order. It is expected of the public servant to respond to letters, applications, and requests made by citizens seeking redressal of their grievances at the earliest and, in any case, normally it should not exceed a period of eight weeks. We direct the C.E.O. to issue a circular and ensure its compliance in future." . .............................................................................


Respected Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb,


With reference to the above-mentioned brief facts, complaints, and grievances, we respectfully draw your kind attention to the continued administrative inaction persisting since 2009.


On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence. The following individuals self-declared themselves as the Managing Committee of the society and signed the Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) on 22nd November 2006: PResident -Shri Umesh Dalvi (Room No. C-29), Secretary -Shri Anil R. Shedge (Room No. E-1), Treasurer- Shri Prabhakar Kashinath Dhumak (Room No. B-07), Smt. Jayanti M. Mayavansi (Room No. B-08), Shri Ramesh K. Boricha (Room No. C-16), Shri Chandrapal Ramkumar Singh (Room No. C-28), Smt. Gyandevi Govindlal Sonar (Room No. C-31), Shri Ramkishan Chowdhary (Room No. C-06), Smt. Jayashri Shankar Jadhav (Room No. E-07), Smt. Chhaya Ganpat Uttarvar (Room No. D-06), and Smt. Rajashri R. Choudhary (Room No. C-06).


Further, these agreements were tampered with and dated to 2008 and subsequently submitted to SRA in February 2009, leading to the fraudulent issuance of LOI in November 2012. Despite this, the Engineering Department of SRA – in possession of these documents (as revealed via RTI) – has failed to initiate criminal or disciplinary action, despite complaints filed as early as 2013 and as recently as October 2023.
Refer EXH-A & EXH-B which consists of SELF EXPLANATORY COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF MISAPPROPRIATED DOCUMENTS & FORGERY in support of submissions
The names of following individuals found as per theare: Syed Manzoor Ali (D-04), Dhumak P. Kashinath (B-07), Ramkrishna Chaudhary (C-06), Kane Shivaji (C-15), Chairman - Dalvi Umesh (C-29),Secretary - Ramesh Boricha (C-16), Treasurer- Jayashree Jadhav (E-07), Fernandes F (B-04).However, it is important to note that the individuals who unlawfully represented themselves as the self declared Managing Committee in agreements dated 22 Nov 2006 inspite of administrator appointed on 13 Nov 2006 & the MC appointed after the declaration of results dated 27th May 2008 are also responsible for suppressing facts & for their collusive and joint actions, in accordance with Section 73(1AB) of (MCS) Act, 1960, which holds all members of the MC jointly and severally liable


It is important to note that our representatives, Mr. Mohammad Nazir and Mr. Rau Kasa have been diligently pursuing the matter. Mr. Raju Kasa had personally met you on 3rd May 2024 in this regard. However, subsequent attempts to secure a follow-up meeting with your esteemed office were curtailed at the OSD & PA level.
I wish to emphasize that both of these representatives have our full support, and respectfully seek your kind intervention in the matter. As recently as joint mass grievance hearing held on 4th October 2024, which was chaired by Hon’ble Member of Parliament Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon’ble CEO of SRA, Dr. Mahendra Kalyankar, the urgency and gravity of our issues were reiterated.
During this meeting, strong prima facie evidence of forgery, collusion, and fraudulent practices done by the developer and purported Managing Committee was placed on record.
Following this, the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, issued specific directions to: Smt. Sandhya Bawankule – Assistant Registrar Shri R.B. Mitkar – Deputy Chief Engineer Shri Birje – Deputy Chief Engineer
However, despite the gravity of the evidence and the seniority of the officials involved, no concrete or remedial action has been taken to date. This continued inaction reflects serious lapses in administrative accountability and undermines the very purpose of grievance redressal mechanisms.
Superficial Handling of Complaints- Although the system demonstrates exemplary governance at higher levels, complaints lodged via the Aaplesarkar portal are being addressed only in a superficial manner. Token letters are sent to the developer, who has failed to respond, leading to premature closure of complaints. This practice defeats the very purpose of redressal and undermines public trust.
Despite clear and substantial evidence( refer attachment) being already in possession of the Engineering Department since 2009 , no effective follow-up or action has been taken against the developer responsible. This is to further bring to your esteemed attention that a series of long-standing irregularities, fraudulent representations, and systemic failures have plagued the redevelopment process of Sukhshanti CHS Ltd. The facts enumerated herein demonstrate: Material violations of law, including the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies Act, 1960 and Slum Act provisions; Breach of cooperative principles and due process; And complete non-compliance with directives issued during high-level meetings, despite repeated representations by affected parties and senior citizens. I sincerely urge your urgent and personal intervention to uphold the sanctity of the law, ensure fair administrative action, and restore faith in the justice delivery system


PRAYERS-
Urgent appointment Hon. CEO , SRA sought to
Take cognizance & Initiate LOI cancellation based on fraud & forgery evidence
Facilitate FIR registration against the accused
Despite over 90 occupants signing the complaint in 2013, no meaningful action has been taken till date.


Several recent complaints have also gone unaddressed.


Concerned officers failed to act, raising serious questions of administrative inaction and accountability.


A detailed investigation is requested to determine the reasons for delay and inaction.


Departmental and legal action must be initiated against those responsible for negligence or complicity.
Uphold Able Governance


I am confident that your esteemed office will not allow such a grave matter involving forgery, collusion, and abuse of system to go unaddressed, and will act promptly to ensure justice is served.
With sincere regards,
CTSOResolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

PRAVIN ARUN JAGUSHTE
11/06/2025458278
प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे ओम श्री गणेश एस. आर. ए. संस्था श्याम नगर , शॉप नं ७, बिल्डिंग नं -१ जोगेश्वरी पूर्व मुंबई - ४०००६० महोदय, मी प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे संदर्भ विषयानुसार तक्रार करतो कि , विकासक ऐश्वर्या लाइट कंपनी ने जून २०१९ रोजी फक्त गाळ्याचे ताबा पत्र दिले. पण गाळ्याचा प्रत्यक्ष ताबा दिला नाही . तो ताबा आपल्या झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण वांद्रे पूर्व यांचे मार्फत जानेवारी २०२३ रोजी मिळाला . पण या जून २०२९ ते जानेवारी २०२३ असे एकूण ४३ महिन्याचे भाडे मला विकासकांकडून मिळालेले नाही आहे . झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण यांनी विकासकांना स्टॉप वर्क ची ऑर्डर काढली . पण त्यापुढे विकासकावर कोणतीच कारवाई नाही आता प्रकल्प पूर्ण झाला आहे. आपल्या इंजिनियर विभागात चौकशी केली असता असे सांगतात कि जेव्हा विकासक विक्री साठी उपलबध असलेल्या इमारतीची OC घेण्यास येईल तेव्हा आम्ही त्यास विचारू . या पुढे काहीच सांगत नाहीत . विकासकाकडे गेल्यास विकासक भेट देत नाही तरी कृपा करून आपण मला माझे थकीत भाडे विकासकाकडून मिळवून द्यावे . हि विनंती . आपला , प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे मो ९७०२९५३८२३
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदरचा तक्रार अर्ज sra.gov.in या संकेतस्थळावर प्रसिध्द करण्यात यावा, आपली तक्रार निकाली काढणे सोईचे होईल.

1030
GRI/2025/199
विकासकाकडून थकीत भाडे मिळण्याबाबत तक्रार अर्ज
Assistant Registar
PRAVIN ARUN JAGUSHTE
11/06/20254582910


प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे
ओम श्री गणेश एस. आर. ए. संस्था
श्याम नगर , शॉप नं ७, बिल्डिंग नं -१
जोगेश्वरी पूर्व मुंबई - ४०००६०

महोदय,
मी प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे संदर्भ विषयानुसार तक्रार करतो कि , विकासक ऐश्वर्या लाइट कंपनी ने जून २०१९ रोजी फक्त गाळ्याचे ताबा पत्र दिले. पण गाळ्याचा प्रत्यक्ष ताबा दिला नाही . तो ताबा आपल्या झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण वांद्रे पूर्व यांचे मार्फत जानेवारी २०२३ रोजी मिळाला . पण या जून २०२९ ते जानेवारी २०२३ असे एकूण ४३ महिन्याचे भाडे मला विकासकांकडून मिळालेले नाही आहे . झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण यांनी विकासकांना स्टॉप वर्क ची ऑर्डर काढली . पण त्यापुढे विकासकावर कोणतीच कारवाई नाही आता प्रकल्प पूर्ण झाला आहे. आपल्या इंजिनियर विभागात चौकशी केली असता असे सांगतात कि जेव्हा विकासक विक्री साठी उपलबध असलेल्या इमारतीची OC घेण्यास येईल तेव्हा आम्ही त्यास विचारू . या पुढे काहीच सांगत नाहीत . विकासकाकडे गेल्यास विकासक भेट देत नाही

तरी कृपा करून आपण मला माझे थकीत भाडे विकासकाकडून मिळवून द्यावे .

हि विनंती .


आपला ,


प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे
मो ९७०२९५३८२३

Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved

1032
GRI/2025/197
विकासकाकडून मंजूर प्लॅन प्रमाणे गाळ्याचे क्षेत्रफळ मिळून गाळ्यात संडास पाण्याची सोय मिळणेबाबत दिनांक ११/१/२०२४ अर्ज क्रमांक ३३२८ ह्यावर काहीच कारवाई झाल्याबाबत ...
Engineering Department
PRAVIN ARUN JAGUSHTE
11/06/2025458289
महोदय, मी प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे संदर्भ पत्रानुसार तक्रार करतो कि विकासक ऐश्वर्या लाइट कंपनी ने जून २०१९ रोजी फक्त गाळ्याचे ताबा पत्र दिले. पण प्रत्यक्ष गाळ्याचा ताबा दिला नाही तो आपल्या सर्व विभागामार्फत जानेवारी २०२३ रोजी मिळाला. पण या गाळ्यात संडास पाण्याची सोय करून देतो असे विकासकांनी सांगितले होते व त्यांनी मला दिलेल्या मंजूर प्लॅन मध्ये सुद्धा संडास ची सोय दाखवत आहे. पण विकासकांनी अजून हि मला उपलब्ध करून दिले नाही त्यामुळे माझ्या कुटुंबाची गैरसोय होत आहे तरी आपण लक्ष घालून मला मंजूर प्लॅन प्रमाणे गेल्याचे क्षेत्रफळ मिळउन देऊन त्यात संडास पाण्याची सोय करून द्यावी .
हा अर्ज दिल्यास आपल्या कार्यालयात वरिष्ठ इंजिनियर श्री. मसाळ साहेबांची ३,४ वेळा भेट घेतली त्यांनी विकासकांना फोन लावला होता पण विकासक फोन उचलत नाही . त्यामुळे नेमके काय याचे उत्तर मला मिळत नाही.

महोदय ,
माझी या जागेव्यक्तिरिक्त राहण्याची व उदरनिर्वाहाची कोणतीच सोय नाही. मी माझी पत्नी व तरुण मुलगी या जागेत राहतो, संडास साठी आम्हाला सार्वजनिक सौचालायात जावे लागते. रात्री अपरात्री सौचालाय बंद असल्यावर आमची गैरसोय होते. तरी आपण सदर तक्रारीची शहानिशा सत्य पडताळणी पाहणी करून आम्हाला न्याय द्यावा व आमची गैरसोय दूर करावी .

हि विंनंती .
आपला ,



प्रवीण अरुण जागुष्टे
मो.- ९७०२९५३८२३
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/193
Complaint regarding slab leakage in Ekdanta SRA CHS LTD. Flat No. 601
Assistant Registar
ROSHAN SUBHASH WARANG
10/06/2025458279
Dear Sir & Madam,

I am writing to bring to your attention a serious issue with my flat 601 in [Ekdanta SRA CHS LTD]. Despite the building being relatively new (Handed over flats in September 2024), I have noticed significant slab leakage in my unit, which is causing concern and inconvenience.

The leakage is occurring at hall ceiling, washroom wall, etc., and I believe it is due to a structural issue with the building. As the building is still under warranty, I request that you take immediate action to rectify this issue. I am strongly taken up this matter with builder from last
5-6 month. No any action taken from the builder side..

I would appreciate it if you could:

1. Investigate the cause of the leakage and provide a detailed report.
2. Carry out the necessary repairs to prevent further damage.
3. Ensure that the repairs are done promptly and efficiently to avoid any further inconvenience.

I would be grateful if you could provide a timeline for the completion of the repairs and keep me informed about the progress.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Shri. Subhash Warang
Mob. 9967757178
Engineering DepartmentResolved
इमारतीच्या लिंकेजबाबात संस्था उपविधी क्रं १७४ प्रमाणे मधील तरतुदीअन्वये सक्षम प्राधिकरणाकडे अर्ज दाखल करावा.
