GRI/2025/185
SENIOR CITIZEN SOS CALL FOR APPOINTMENT OF Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb — URGENT REQUEST FOR REGISTRATION OF FIR & LOI CANCELLATION BASED ON COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF FORGED AGREEMENTS-Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA)
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Mohd.Nazir07/06/20254582510
Description :
TITLE - SENIOR CITIZEN SOS CALL -18 YEARS ORDEAL - PROLONGED ADMINISTRATIVE SILENCE REFLECTS A SERIOUS DERELICTION OF STATUTORY DUTIES, WHICH HAS EFFECTIVELY ENABLED THE DEVELOPER AND MANAGING COMMITTEE TO CONTINUE SYSTEMIC MANIPULATIONS UNCHECKED SINCE 2006. JUSTICE DELAYED , JUSTICE DENIED
Date -7 JUNE 25
TO Hon. CEO ,SRA ,Dr. Kalyankar saheb
FROM
Senior Citizen Mr. Mohammad Nazir Siddiqui Mallu & Others B-Wing, Room No. 12, SukhShanti CHSL, Tunga Village, Shiv Shakti Nagar, Saki Vihar Road, Powai, Mumbai – 400072
SRA Scheme- Sukhshanti CHS , SRA LOI No.: SRA/ENG/2149/L/STGL & PL/LOI dated 01/11/2012 ,Draft LOI dated: 24/04/2024 Developer: Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) , Architect: Ellora Projects
Subject: SENIOR CITIZEN SOS CALL FOR APPOINTMENT OF HON’BLE MP, Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwadji and Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb , — URGENT REQUEST FOR REGISTRATION OF FIR & LOI CANCELLATION BASED ON COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF FORGED AGREEMENTS


EXH-A -SRA-131106-ADMINIS-forgery - Self explanatory compelling evidence of misappropriated documents
On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence.


EXH-B -SRA-1PGFORG+13NOV06+19SEPT24FIR- - Self explanatory compelling evidence of misappropriated documents
PAGE1 shows self explanatory evidence of forgery done in agreements with visual clarity & supporting write up
PAGE2 & 3 - shows Deputy Registrar ,L ward Order dated 13.11.2006 appointing Administrator M.N. Wasnik;
PAGE 4 onwards - Grievance submitted via email from rajukasa@gmail.com on 19 Sep 2024 at 15:38 hrs to CEO@sra.gov.in, & others .which was also signed by Mohd.Nazir & submitted on 20 Sept 24 to SRA. (GEN/2024/81401 dated 20 Sept 2024,)
EXH-C-SRA- nazir-transfers&delay-30april24- - complaint dated 30 Apr 2024 to HON. CEO -SRA TO INITIATE DISCIPLINARY ACTION UNDER SECTION 10 OF MAHARASHTRA GOVERNMENT SERVANTS' REGULATION OF TRANSFERS AND PREVENTION OF DELAY IN DISCHARGE OF OFFICIAL DUTIES ACT, 2005 .ACTION AGAINST Concerned Officer/Incharge of SRA FOR CANCELLATION OF LOI( engg.dept,SRA),Dy. Registrar- SRA, Dy. Collector and Competent Authority, Ghatkopar-SRA


EXH-D- HIGH RESOLUTION CLARITY -1 pager showing self explanatory evidences of forgery done in agreements with visual clarity & supporting write up















KEY ISSUE - KEY ISSUE 1: ILLEGAL DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT & GPOA – BAD IN LAW (Since 22.11.2006 – 6,772 Days) - On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence. Further, these agreements were tampered with and dated to 2008 and subsequently submitted to SRA in February 2009, leading to the fraudulent issuance of LOI in November 2012. Despite this, the Engineering Department of SRA – in possession of these documents (as revealed via RTI) – has failed to initiate criminal or disciplinary action, despite complaints filed as early as 2013 and as recently as October 2023.
KEY ISSUE 2: NON-COMPLIANCE AFTER MEETING WITH CEO, SRA (03.05.2024- A meeting was held on 03.05.2024 with the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, where clear instructions were issued to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt to act upon the above issues. However, no meaningful follow-up action has been initiated by the concerned head of departments, and the notings of the Hon’ble CEO on subsequent letters have been entirely disregarded.
KEY ISSUE 3: FAILURE TO ACT ON MASS GRIEVANCE HEARING (04.10.2024) - Further, during the joint mass grievance meeting on 04.10.2024 (246 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble MP Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar, strong prima facie evidence of forgery and collusion was presented. CEO ISSUED Specific directions to Smt. Sandhya Bawankule – Assistant Registrar ,Shri R.B. Mitkar – Dy. Chief Engineer & Shri Birje – Dy. Chief Engineer .However, no tangible action has resulted, reflecting serious lapses in administrative accountability.
KEY REFERENCES- Initial Complaints Filed to SRA Since March 2013 Recent reminder complaints filed since 03.10.2023 remain unresolved for over 599 days. Multiple letters to the SRA include GEN/2023/80255 dated 03 Oct 2023, GEN/2023/93223 dated 06 Nov 2023, GEN/2024/4835 dated Jan 2024, etc. Further representations were made via letters to SRA, include GEN/2024/43520, GEN/2024/52487, GEN/2024/38932 dated 22 April 2024, GEN/2024/81401 dated 20 Sept 2024, etc. Joint mass grievance meeting was held on 04.10.2024 (227 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble MP Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon’ble CEO Dr. Kalyankar at SRA.
OTHER REFERENCES- 1) E-Tappal Nos. 7391598/2024/MANTRA-CRU, 7403496/2024/MANTRA-CRU dtd 20.09.24 , 7296650/2024/CMO-TAPAL dtd 22.08.24) 2) Reference: E-Tappal Nos. 7250681,7250848,7221561/2024/MANTRA-CRU .Email dated 31.07.2024 at 20:58 hrs from rajukasa@gmail.com — Senior Citizen SOS appeal for Hon’ble CM’s appointment & so on. Hard copy submitted on 01.08.2024. 3) Note: Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th Sep 2024, issued by the Housing Department, was officially addressed to the Hon’ble CEO, SRA. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830. 4) letter from Housing Department No. Sankerna-2024/pr.kra.03/Zhopasu-1 dated 15 Oct 2024 ( nond.sha.kra - Aa.Mu.S (gruni) 7511 with ref no- 901/2024 ) 5) Refer attachment - Recent Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 sent from Hon’ble Deputy Secretary Shri Sunil Tumhare Sahib to Hon’ble CEO, SRA citing References to the Department’s letter dated 03.10.2024 (No. Sankirna-2024/No.No.831/Zhopsu-1) and subsequent reminder letters dated 30.10.2024, 07.01.2025, 09.01.2025, and 27.01.2025. Mantralaya directed to meet Hon’ble CEO, SRA, but attempts blocked at OSD/PA level.






LEGAL BRIEF ON SUKHSHANTI CHSL (REGD. Oct 1996) & ADMINISTRATIVE SILENCE: SYSTEMIC MANIPULATION AND THE SYMBIOTIC COLLUSION OF VESTED INTERESTS UNCHECKED SINCE NOVEMBER 2006
1. ORIGINAL SOCIETY REGISTRATION & CONVEYANCE(1996) Sukhshanti CHSL was registered on 03.10.1996 with 93 members over CTS Nos. 78, 79(pt), and 81(pt) under the MCS Act, 1960, based on an agreement dated 11.08.1995 between landlord Shri Jagdishchandra Gupta and promoter Mr. Azad. The land was to be conveyed to the society after its registration, thereby ensuring members right
2. 6,772 DAYS (Since 22.11.2006): ILLEGAL DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT & GPOA On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97), even though: (a) MC had No lawful authority as MC was not elected through elections conducted under the MCS Act; (b) It violated the Deputy Registrar’s ,L ward Order dated 13.11.2006 appointing Administrator M.N. Wasnik; (c) It involved misuse of the society’s seal and registration number. [EXH-A -COMPELLING EVIDENCE PROVING THE FRAUD}
3. FRAUDULENT USE OF SOCIETY SEAL ,REG.NO. & ADDED SURROUNDING RESIDENTS WITHOUT MAJORITY CONSENT ILLEGALLY Unauthorized individuals misused the society’s registration number and seal to enter into binding contracts, thereby committing fraud under the (IPC) and violating Section 146(p) of the MCS Act.
4. SUPPRESSION & NON-HANDOVER OF RECORDS Since 2006, symbiotic collusion established a pattern of non-transparent functioning along with criminal intimidation .Society records have not been produced despite multiple Khulasa (disclosure) orders issued by the Registrar,L ward since Nov 2023 recently.
5. 5,944 DAYS (Since 27.02.2009) FORGED DOCUMENTS SUBMITTED IN LOI PROPOSAL IN FEB 2009 TO SECURE LOI LOI proposal comprising of Tampered agreements dated to 2008 were submitted in February 2009 to SRA, leading to the fraudulent issuance of an LOI in November 2012.The Engineering Department of SRA, in custody of these ( Info issued via RTI) has failed to initiate meaningful action despite complaints since 2013 and as recently as Oct 2023. yet no criminal or administrative action has been taken GOVERNMENT DIRECTIVE UNDER SECTION 79(A), MCS ACT, 1960 — MANDATORY COMPLIANCE IN REDEVELOPMENT MATTERS A Government Resolution (G.R.) bearing No. SaGruYo-2007/Pra.Kra.554/14-S, dated 03.01.2009, was issued by the Cooperation, Marketing, and Textile Department, By Order This directive under Section 79(A) of the Maharashtra Co-operative Societies Act, 1960, mandates compliance, transparency, and statutory accountability in the redevelopment of co-operative housing societies. Objective was: To address member complaints and ensure that all redevelopment processes adhere strictly to the provisions of the MCS Act, Rules, and registered by-laws. Despite the binding nature of the above Government Resolution, such statutory measures issued by the Hon’ble Government are routinely overlooked or bypassed by vested interests within the system. This selective disregard conveniently benefits collusive networks, undermines statutory compliance, and defeats the very objective of transparency and justice envisioned under Section 79(A) of the MCS Act, 1960. 6. ANNEXURE-II MANIPULATION, LOI APPROVAL & SOCIETY REGISTRATION Following LOI approval in November 2012, the SRA-registered Sukhshanti SRA CHSL (Reg. Date: 21.03.2013) was formed with only 30 out of the 143 actual hutments, raising serious questions of exclusion and manipulation. In contrast, the original society registered in 1996 had 93 structures, which subsequently increased to more than 98, as evident from Annexure-II dated 17.04.2012. These additions included unauthorized numbers and unverified occupants. For nearly the same geographical area, this increase from 93 to over 98 huts points to clear systematic manipulation. Moreover, irregularities in transfer certificates and inclusion of unknown names have been flagged in Annexure-II, and a separate complaint has been submitted to Mantralaya (July 2024). To avoid circular referencing and procedural delays, these auxiliary issues are being temporarily kept separate from the primary focus on LOI cancellation. Note: The issuance and cancellation of the LOI fall exclusively under the jurisdiction of the SRA Engineering Department and must be acted upon independently and without delay.
7. ADMINISTRATIVE INACTION & CONSEQUENCES
7.1 4,477 DAYS (Since 05.03.2013) -MINISTERIAL INTERVENTION IGNORED- Initial complaints in March 2013 submitted. Following intervention by Hon’ble Guardian Minister Shri Naseem Khan, the SRA Engineering Department’s report dated 18.05.2013 stated cancellation of the LOI or fresh GBR then. However, no action was initiated, with the matter manipulated systemically & managed to protect vested interests.
7.2 613 DAYS (Since 03.10.2023) PROLONGED DELAY, RECENT REMINDER COMPLAINTS IGNORED & NON-REDRESSAL CONTINUES Despite continuous follow-ups, recent Reminder complaints filed since 03.10.2023 remain unresolved for over 599 days. Multiple letters to the SRA include GEN/2023/80255 dated 3 Oct 23 ,GEN/2023/93223 dated 6 Nov 23 , GEN/2024/4835 dated Jan 24 etc
7.3 REVISED LOI APPROVED (NOT ISSUED) ON 24.04.2024 – FURTHER VALIDATES SYSTEMIC MANIPULATION A revised LOI was approved (not issued) On 24.04.2024 under the altered name“SUKHASHANTI CHS (Proposed)” (note -”A” between Sukh & shanti), bypassing the existing SRA-registered society, reflecting intentional procedural violation to protect the disqualification of Managing Committee , evade MCS Act liabilities & offences & continue the same autocratic pattern..The Engineering Department , SRA, again conveniently turned blind eye to the same. It is pertinent to note that, as seen in many SRA schemes, the society is being reduced to a mere puppet or redundant institution, primarily to enable the developer to bypass statutory processes and regulatory scrutiny. This undermines the cooperative structure and violates the spirit and intent of redevelopment
7.4 FAILURE TO ACT ON CEO’S DIRECTIONS DATED 03.05.2024 A meeting was held on 03.05.2024 with the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, during which directions were issued to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt. However, no meaningful follow-up action has been taken by the Heads of the concerned Departments, despite notings by the CEO on subsequent letters. Multiple letters to the SRA have been brought to the Hon’ble CEO’s attention recently, including key references such as GEN/2024/43520, GEN/2024/52487, GEN/2024/38932 dated 22 April 2024, GEN/2024/81401 DATED 20 SEP 24 ETC.
7.5 EVIDENCE IGNORED AT HIGHEST LEVELS & NON-REDRESSAL CONTINUES Prima facie evidence of forgery, stamp paper tampering, and collusion between the developer and a self-declared MC was submitted to: The Hon’ble Chief Minister’s Janta Darbar on 21.08.2024 ( E-Tappal Nos. 7296650/2024/CMO-TAPAL dtd 22.08.24) Follow-up Detailed complaint on 19.09.2024 submitted to Hon.CM & others (E-Tappal Nos. 7391598/2024/MANTRA-CRU, 7403496/2024/MANTRA-CRU dtd 20.09.24 ) Yet, no redressal or criminal action has followed from the concerned authorities. Repeated letters & reminders from the Housing Department to the SRA regarding the matter and seeking inquiry report or avhal have not been honoured. Despite clear directions issued by the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, during the meeting held on 03.05.2024, addressed to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt, no meaningful follow-up action has been undertaken by HEAD OF the concerned departments, reflecting administrative inaction and disregard of statutory responsibilities. Note: Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th September 2024, issued by the Housing Department, was officially addressed to the Hon’ble CEO, SRA. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830. This letter, routed through the prescribed protocol and command chain, was forwarded to various internal departments for necessary action and compliance. Yet, as of date, no substantial response or resolution has been reported. Other letter issued from Housing Department, include Letter No. Sankerna-2024/pr.kra.03/Zhopasu-1 dated 15 Oct 2024 ( nond.sha.kra - Aa.Mu.S (gruni) 7511 with ref no- 901/2024 ) Refer attachment - Recent Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 sent from Hon’ble Deputy Secretary Shri Sunil Tumhare Sahib to Hon’ble CEO, SRA citing References to the Department’s letter dated 03.10.2024 (No. Sankirna-2024/No.No.831/Zhopsu-1) and subsequent reminder letters dated 30.10.2024, 07.01.2025, 09.01.2025, and 27.01.2025. The Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 stated “ Tari Shri. Kasa yanchya vividha e-mail madhil namud mudyambabat niyamochit karwahi karun kelelelya karwahi cha svayansparsh ahwal tatkal shasanas sadar karava, hi vinanti.” 7.6 PUBLIC INTEREST COMPROMISED These continuing failures constitute serious violations of the MCS & IPC and severely undermine public interest, allowing systemic fraud and manipulation to persist ............................................................................. (LR)


LEGAL REFERENCES Hon'ble Supreme Court of India in case of "A.V. Papayya Sastry & Ors. v. Government of A.P. & Ors.", the Apex Court has opined that, if any judgment or order is obtained by fraud, it cannot be said to be a judgment or order in law. “Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal. This principle applies universally—whether the fraud is against a Court, Tribunal, or Statutory Authority—rendering the outcome void ab initio Hon'ble Supreme Court of India in case of Sheila Sebastian V/s R. Jawaharaj & Anr. (Criminal Appeal Nos. 359-360 of 2010) - ‘Forgery’ and ‘Making of False Documents’ Md. Ibrahim & Ors V/s State of Bihar & Anr, (2009) 8 SCC 751 Supreme Court Order -Dhanraj N. Asawani vs. Amarjeetsingh Mohindersingh Basi. (Citation: 2023 (SC) 652). Date of Decision:July 25, 2023 .Maharashtra Co-Operative Societies Act Does Not Curtail Power Of Police Investigation Under CrPC: Supreme Court . Supreme Court Order- Ramarao & Anr vs Narayan & Anr on 20 December, 1968 Equivalent citations: 1969 AIR 724, 1969 SCR (3) 185. IN SUPPORT OF GRIEVANCE REDRESSAL MANDATE Excerpt from Court Order cited IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION WRIT PETITION NO. 2333 OF 2008 Shankar Versus The Chief Executive Officer, Slum Rehabilitation Authority & Ors. "We make it clear that the Chief Executive Officer (C.E.O.), Slum Rehabilitation Authority, Mumbai, shall issue a circular forthwith bringing this order to the notice of all concerned Departments and requiring them to act expeditiously, diligently, and within the time-frame provided in the orders of the Court. The principle of public accountability would require a public servant to discharge his obligations without any delay and with a complete sense of responsibility. There should be no justification whatsoever for keeping matters pending on their table for years together without passing any order. It is expected of the public servant to respond to letters, applications, and requests made by citizens seeking redressal of their grievances at the earliest and, in any case, normally it should not exceed a period of eight weeks. We direct the C.E.O. to issue a circular and ensure its compliance in future." . .............................................................................


Respected Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb, With reference to the ABOVESAID brief facts & complaints /grievances ,we respectfully draw your kind attention to the continued administrative inaction following a joint mass grievance hearing held on 04th October 2024 (227 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble Member of Parliament Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon’ble CEO, SRA, Dr. Mahendra Kalyankar. During this meeting, strong prima facie evidence of forgery, collusion, and fraudulent practices by the developer and purported Managing Committee was placed on record. Following this, the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, issued specific directions to: Smt. Sandhya Bawankule – Assistant Registrar Shri R.B. Mitkar – Deputy Chief Engineer Shri Birje – Deputy Chief Engineer However, despite the gravity of the evidence and the seniority of the officials involved, no concrete or remedial action has been taken to date. This continued inaction reflects serious lapses in administrative accountability and undermines the very purpose of grievance redressal mechanisms. Superficial Handling of Complaints- Although the system demonstrates exemplary governance at higher levels, complaints lodged via the Aaplesarkar portal are being addressed only in a superficial manner. Token letters are sent to the developer, who has failed to respond, leading to premature closure of complaints. This practice defeats the very purpose of redressal and undermines public trust. Despite clear and substantial evidence( refer attachment) being already in possession of the Engineering Department since 2009 , no effective follow-up or action has been taken against the developer responsible. This is to further bring to your esteemed attention that a series of long-standing irregularities, fraudulent representations, and systemic failures have plagued the redevelopment process of Sukhshanti CHS Ltd. The facts enumerated herein demonstrate: Material violations of law, including the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies Act, 1960 and Slum Act provisions; Breach of cooperative principles and due process; And complete non-compliance with directives issued during high-level meetings, despite repeated representations by affected parties and senior citizens. We sincerely urge your urgent and personal intervention to uphold the sanctity of the law, ensure fair administrative action, and restore faith in the justice delivery system. We respectfully request you to take note of the latest follow-up details as outlined below: Pursuant to our recent interaction on Monday, 5th May 2025, with Shri Amol Patankar Saheb, Officer from the Hon’ble Chief Minister’s Janta Darbar (CMO), under Token No. 6, raised by Shri Mohd. Nazir, along with Shri Raju Kasa and Smt. Pushma Kasa, we were kindly advised to approach the esteemed office of Housing Department for redressal regarding the long-pending matter concerning the registration of an FIR. The matter specifically pertains to grave allegations of Forgery & Fraud in the execution of the Developer Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) dated 22nd November 2006, executed by Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) in collusion with a self-declared Managing Committee. These documents were executed after an Administrator had been legally appointed under Order dated 13th November 2006 by the Deputy Registrar, L Ward), thereby rendering the acts illegal, unauthorized, and void ab initio. Following this advice, we met the Personal Secretary, Shri Sudhir Rathod Saheb, to the Hon’ble Minister of State , Housing -Shri Pradeep Bhoyyar ji, who graciously gave us over 5 minutes of patient hearing. He was kind enough to understand our concerns and then directed us to Shri Tarange Saheb, the recently appointed Deputy Secretary, Housing Department, succeeding Shri Sunil Tumbhare Saheb. Shri Tarange Saheb was equally receptive and heard our concerns with attention, duly taking note of the compelling documentary evidence of forgery and misrepresentation in the said Developer Agreement and Power of Attorney. He also acknowledged the correspondence already issued by the Housing Department to the SRA in this regard.. Further, on 5th May 2025, both the undersigned — Shri Raju Kasa and Shri Mohd. Nazir — again visited Shri Tarange Saheb to highlight the ongoing administrative inaction and delays affecting the resolution of the complaint. Subsequently, on Thursday, 15th May 2025, Shri Tarange Saheb was pleased to direct the DyCE SRA, Shri Birje, to look into the serious matter. Following this, Shri Birje confirmed a prior appointment for 5:00 PM on Tuesday, 20th May 2025 to discuss the grievance. We arrived well in advance for the confirmed meeting and waited patiently. However, we witnessed several individuals entering Shri Birje’s cabin and being entertained ahead of our scheduled slot. Upon respectfully intervening and reminding him of our confirmed appointment, Shri Birje, without any interaction, directed his assistant to refer us to Executive Engineer Shri Wani. We waited at Shri Wani’s office (including AE,SE -Lward) until 6.30 PM, but they were not available. As anticipated, no outcome-oriented direction was issued, and our grievance remained unaddressed. It is respectfully submitted that such conduct — particularly when prior appointments are confirmed — is discouraging and reflective of institutional apathy. Despite multiple visits, reminders, and submission of serious and verifiable evidence of forgery, the matter continues to suffer. We regret to note that such neglect is not isolated but symptomatic of a broader issue at SRA, where lesser privileged and aggrieved citizens, even while presenting compelling evidence, are not heard in the right spirit. The evidence provided has been in the custody of the SRA since 2009, yet no substantial steps have been taken. Even after several reminders by the Housing Department calling for an “Avhal” (report), only superficial letters were issued to the developer seeking "Khulasa", despite the seriousness of the matter This continued apathy and red-tapism, combined with a lack of tangible action, have caused further delay, injustice, and hardship to the aggrieved senior citizens and families involved. In light of the above, we humbly request the Hon’ble Officers at Mantralaya to kindly take urgent cognizance of this matter and initiate immediate follow-up action, including the issuance of the Avhal and appropriate proceedings, to uphold citizen centric governance and statutory accountability. II.


PRAYERS Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb, is respectfully requested to: Grant an urgent appointment to address this matter- 18 YEAR ORDEAL; Take cognizance and initiate cancellation of the LOI based on evidence of fraud and forgery; Facilitate registration of FIR against the accused parties; Uphold principles of able governance ensuring transparency and justice. We are confident that your esteemed office will not allow such a grave matter involving forgery, collusion, and abuse of system to go unaddressed, and will act promptly to ensure justice is served.
With sincere regards,


Shri Mohd. Nazir & Others
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
Your Grievance is forwarded to Secretary SRA for Further needfull. as such your Grievance is Closed with this office.

GRI/2025/184
SENIOR CITIZEN SOS CALL FOR APPOINTMENT OF Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb — URGENT REQUEST FOR REGISTRATION OF FIR & LOI CANCELLATION BASED ON COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF FORGED AGREEMENTS-Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA)
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Mohd.Nazir07/06/2025458249

TITLE - SENIOR CITIZEN SOS CALL -18 YEARS ORDEAL - PROLONGED ADMINISTRATIVE SILENCE REFLECTS A SERIOUS DERELICTION OF STATUTORY DUTIES, WHICH HAS EFFECTIVELY ENABLED THE DEVELOPER AND MANAGING COMMITTEE TO CONTINUE SYSTEMIC MANIPULATIONS UNCHECKED SINCE 2006. JUSTICE DELAYED , JUSTICE DENIED
Date -7 JUNE 25
TO Hon. CEO ,SRA ,Dr. Kalyankar saheb
FROM
Senior Citizen Mr. Mohammad Nazir Siddiqui Mallu & Others B-Wing, Room No. 12, SukhShanti CHSL, Tunga Village, Shiv Shakti Nagar, Saki Vihar Road, Powai, Mumbai – 400072
SRA Scheme- Sukhshanti CHS , SRA LOI No.: SRA/ENG/2149/L/STGL & PL/LOI dated 01/11/2012 ,Draft LOI dated: 24/04/2024 Developer: Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) , Architect: Ellora Projects
Subject: SENIOR CITIZEN SOS CALL FOR APPOINTMENT OF HON’BLE MP, Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwadji and Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb , — URGENT REQUEST FOR REGISTRATION OF FIR & LOI CANCELLATION BASED ON COMPELLING EVIDENCE OF FORGED AGREEMENTS


EXH-A -SRA-131106-ADMINIS-forgery - Self explanatory compelling evidence of misappropriated documents
On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence.


EXH-B -SRA-1PGFORG+13NOV06+19SEPT24FIR- - Self explanatory compelling evidence of misappropriated documents
PAGE1 shows self explanatory evidence of forgery done in agreements with visual clarity & supporting write up
PAGE2 & 3 - shows Deputy Registrar ,L ward Order dated 13.11.2006 appointing Administrator M.N. Wasnik;
PAGE 4 onwards - Grievance submitted via email from rajukasa@gmail.com on 19 Sep 2024 at 15:38 hrs to CEO@sra.gov.in, & others .which was also signed by Mohd.Nazir & submitted on 20 Sept 24 to SRA. (GEN/2024/81401 dated 20 Sept 2024,)
EXH-C-SRA- nazir-transfers&delay-30april24- - complaint dated 30 Apr 2024 to HON. CEO -SRA TO INITIATE DISCIPLINARY ACTION UNDER SECTION 10 OF MAHARASHTRA GOVERNMENT SERVANTS' REGULATION OF TRANSFERS AND PREVENTION OF DELAY IN DISCHARGE OF OFFICIAL DUTIES ACT, 2005 .ACTION AGAINST Concerned Officer/Incharge of SRA FOR CANCELLATION OF LOI( engg.dept,SRA),Dy. Registrar- SRA, Dy. Collector and Competent Authority, Ghatkopar-SRA


EXH-D- HIGH RESOLUTION CLARITY -1 pager showing self explanatory evidences of forgery done in agreements with visual clarity & supporting write up















KEY ISSUE - KEY ISSUE 1: ILLEGAL DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT & GPOA – BAD IN LAW (Since 22.11.2006 – 6,772 Days) - On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97). This was done without legal mandate or authority, as: The so-called MC had no lawful status, as it was not elected under due process of the MCS Act, It was in direct violation of the Deputy Registrar’s Order dated 13.11.2006, which had appointed Administrator Shri M.N. Wasnik for the society, The Society’s seal and registration number were misused, which is a serious offence. Further, these agreements were tampered with and dated to 2008 and subsequently submitted to SRA in February 2009, leading to the fraudulent issuance of LOI in November 2012. Despite this, the Engineering Department of SRA – in possession of these documents (as revealed via RTI) – has failed to initiate criminal or disciplinary action, despite complaints filed as early as 2013 and as recently as October 2023.
KEY ISSUE 2: NON-COMPLIANCE AFTER MEETING WITH CEO, SRA (03.05.2024- A meeting was held on 03.05.2024 with the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, where clear instructions were issued to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt to act upon the above issues. However, no meaningful follow-up action has been initiated by the concerned head of departments, and the notings of the Hon’ble CEO on subsequent letters have been entirely disregarded.
KEY ISSUE 3: FAILURE TO ACT ON MASS GRIEVANCE HEARING (04.10.2024) - Further, during the joint mass grievance meeting on 04.10.2024 (246 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble MP Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar, strong prima facie evidence of forgery and collusion was presented. CEO ISSUED Specific directions to Smt. Sandhya Bawankule – Assistant Registrar ,Shri R.B. Mitkar – Dy. Chief Engineer & Shri Birje – Dy. Chief Engineer .However, no tangible action has resulted, reflecting serious lapses in administrative accountability.
KEY REFERENCES- Initial Complaints Filed to SRA Since March 2013 Recent reminder complaints filed since 03.10.2023 remain unresolved for over 599 days. Multiple letters to the SRA include GEN/2023/80255 dated 03 Oct 2023, GEN/2023/93223 dated 06 Nov 2023, GEN/2024/4835 dated Jan 2024, etc. Further representations were made via letters to SRA, include GEN/2024/43520, GEN/2024/52487, GEN/2024/38932 dated 22 April 2024, GEN/2024/81401 dated 20 Sept 2024, etc. Joint mass grievance meeting was held on 04.10.2024 (227 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble MP Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon’ble CEO Dr. Kalyankar at SRA.
OTHER REFERENCES- 1) E-Tappal Nos. 7391598/2024/MANTRA-CRU, 7403496/2024/MANTRA-CRU dtd 20.09.24 , 7296650/2024/CMO-TAPAL dtd 22.08.24) 2) Reference: E-Tappal Nos. 7250681,7250848,7221561/2024/MANTRA-CRU .Email dated 31.07.2024 at 20:58 hrs from rajukasa@gmail.com — Senior Citizen SOS appeal for Hon’ble CM’s appointment & so on. Hard copy submitted on 01.08.2024. 3) Note: Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th Sep 2024, issued by the Housing Department, was officially addressed to the Hon’ble CEO, SRA. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830. 4) letter from Housing Department No. Sankerna-2024/pr.kra.03/Zhopasu-1 dated 15 Oct 2024 ( nond.sha.kra - Aa.Mu.S (gruni) 7511 with ref no- 901/2024 ) 5) Refer attachment - Recent Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 sent from Hon’ble Deputy Secretary Shri Sunil Tumhare Sahib to Hon’ble CEO, SRA citing References to the Department’s letter dated 03.10.2024 (No. Sankirna-2024/No.No.831/Zhopsu-1) and subsequent reminder letters dated 30.10.2024, 07.01.2025, 09.01.2025, and 27.01.2025. Mantralaya directed to meet Hon’ble CEO, SRA, but attempts blocked at OSD/PA level.






LEGAL BRIEF ON SUKHSHANTI CHSL (REGD. Oct 1996) & ADMINISTRATIVE SILENCE: SYSTEMIC MANIPULATION AND THE SYMBIOTIC COLLUSION OF VESTED INTERESTS UNCHECKED SINCE NOVEMBER 2006
1. ORIGINAL SOCIETY REGISTRATION & CONVEYANCE(1996) Sukhshanti CHSL was registered on 03.10.1996 with 93 members over CTS Nos. 78, 79(pt), and 81(pt) under the MCS Act, 1960, based on an agreement dated 11.08.1995 between landlord Shri Jagdishchandra Gupta and promoter Mr. Azad. The land was to be conveyed to the society after its registration, thereby ensuring members right
2. 6,772 DAYS (Since 22.11.2006): ILLEGAL DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT & GPOA On 22.11.2006, Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) executed a Development Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) with a self-declared Managing Committee (MC) of Sukhshanti CHSL (Reg. No.: BOM/2/WL/HSG/TC/8211/96-97), even though: (a) MC had No lawful authority as MC was not elected through elections conducted under the MCS Act; (b) It violated the Deputy Registrar’s ,L ward Order dated 13.11.2006 appointing Administrator M.N. Wasnik; (c) It involved misuse of the society’s seal and registration number. [EXH-A -COMPELLING EVIDENCE PROVING THE FRAUD}
3. FRAUDULENT USE OF SOCIETY SEAL ,REG.NO. & ADDED SURROUNDING RESIDENTS WITHOUT MAJORITY CONSENT ILLEGALLY Unauthorized individuals misused the society’s registration number and seal to enter into binding contracts, thereby committing fraud under the (IPC) and violating Section 146(p) of the MCS Act.
4. SUPPRESSION & NON-HANDOVER OF RECORDS Since 2006, symbiotic collusion established a pattern of non-transparent functioning along with criminal intimidation .Society records have not been produced despite multiple Khulasa (disclosure) orders issued by the Registrar,L ward since Nov 2023 recently.
5. 5,944 DAYS (Since 27.02.2009) FORGED DOCUMENTS SUBMITTED IN LOI PROPOSAL IN FEB 2009 TO SECURE LOI LOI proposal comprising of Tampered agreements dated to 2008 were submitted in February 2009 to SRA, leading to the fraudulent issuance of an LOI in November 2012.The Engineering Department of SRA, in custody of these ( Info issued via RTI) has failed to initiate meaningful action despite complaints since 2013 and as recently as Oct 2023. yet no criminal or administrative action has been taken GOVERNMENT DIRECTIVE UNDER SECTION 79(A), MCS ACT, 1960 — MANDATORY COMPLIANCE IN REDEVELOPMENT MATTERS A Government Resolution (G.R.) bearing No. SaGruYo-2007/Pra.Kra.554/14-S, dated 03.01.2009, was issued by the Cooperation, Marketing, and Textile Department, By Order This directive under Section 79(A) of the Maharashtra Co-operative Societies Act, 1960, mandates compliance, transparency, and statutory accountability in the redevelopment of co-operative housing societies. Objective was: To address member complaints and ensure that all redevelopment processes adhere strictly to the provisions of the MCS Act, Rules, and registered by-laws. Despite the binding nature of the above Government Resolution, such statutory measures issued by the Hon’ble Government are routinely overlooked or bypassed by vested interests within the system. This selective disregard conveniently benefits collusive networks, undermines statutory compliance, and defeats the very objective of transparency and justice envisioned under Section 79(A) of the MCS Act, 1960. 6. ANNEXURE-II MANIPULATION, LOI APPROVAL & SOCIETY REGISTRATION Following LOI approval in November 2012, the SRA-registered Sukhshanti SRA CHSL (Reg. Date: 21.03.2013) was formed with only 30 out of the 143 actual hutments, raising serious questions of exclusion and manipulation. In contrast, the original society registered in 1996 had 93 structures, which subsequently increased to more than 98, as evident from Annexure-II dated 17.04.2012. These additions included unauthorized numbers and unverified occupants. For nearly the same geographical area, this increase from 93 to over 98 huts points to clear systematic manipulation. Moreover, irregularities in transfer certificates and inclusion of unknown names have been flagged in Annexure-II, and a separate complaint has been submitted to Mantralaya (July 2024). To avoid circular referencing and procedural delays, these auxiliary issues are being temporarily kept separate from the primary focus on LOI cancellation. Note: The issuance and cancellation of the LOI fall exclusively under the jurisdiction of the SRA Engineering Department and must be acted upon independently and without delay.
7. ADMINISTRATIVE INACTION & CONSEQUENCES
7.1 4,477 DAYS (Since 05.03.2013) -MINISTERIAL INTERVENTION IGNORED- Initial complaints in March 2013 submitted. Following intervention by Hon’ble Guardian Minister Shri Naseem Khan, the SRA Engineering Department’s report dated 18.05.2013 stated cancellation of the LOI or fresh GBR then. However, no action was initiated, with the matter manipulated systemically & managed to protect vested interests.
7.2 613 DAYS (Since 03.10.2023) PROLONGED DELAY, RECENT REMINDER COMPLAINTS IGNORED & NON-REDRESSAL CONTINUES Despite continuous follow-ups, recent Reminder complaints filed since 03.10.2023 remain unresolved for over 599 days. Multiple letters to the SRA include GEN/2023/80255 dated 3 Oct 23 ,GEN/2023/93223 dated 6 Nov 23 , GEN/2024/4835 dated Jan 24 etc
7.3 REVISED LOI APPROVED (NOT ISSUED) ON 24.04.2024 – FURTHER VALIDATES SYSTEMIC MANIPULATION A revised LOI was approved (not issued) On 24.04.2024 under the altered name“SUKHASHANTI CHS (Proposed)” (note -”A” between Sukh & shanti), bypassing the existing SRA-registered society, reflecting intentional procedural violation to protect the disqualification of Managing Committee , evade MCS Act liabilities & offences & continue the same autocratic pattern..The Engineering Department , SRA, again conveniently turned blind eye to the same. It is pertinent to note that, as seen in many SRA schemes, the society is being reduced to a mere puppet or redundant institution, primarily to enable the developer to bypass statutory processes and regulatory scrutiny. This undermines the cooperative structure and violates the spirit and intent of redevelopment
7.4 FAILURE TO ACT ON CEO’S DIRECTIONS DATED 03.05.2024 A meeting was held on 03.05.2024 with the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, during which directions were issued to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt. However, no meaningful follow-up action has been taken by the Heads of the concerned Departments, despite notings by the CEO on subsequent letters. Multiple letters to the SRA have been brought to the Hon’ble CEO’s attention recently, including key references such as GEN/2024/43520, GEN/2024/52487, GEN/2024/38932 dated 22 April 2024, GEN/2024/81401 DATED 20 SEP 24 ETC.
7.5 EVIDENCE IGNORED AT HIGHEST LEVELS & NON-REDRESSAL CONTINUES Prima facie evidence of forgery, stamp paper tampering, and collusion between the developer and a self-declared MC was submitted to: The Hon’ble Chief Minister’s Janta Darbar on 21.08.2024 ( E-Tappal Nos. 7296650/2024/CMO-TAPAL dtd 22.08.24) Follow-up Detailed complaint on 19.09.2024 submitted to Hon.CM & others (E-Tappal Nos. 7391598/2024/MANTRA-CRU, 7403496/2024/MANTRA-CRU dtd 20.09.24 ) Yet, no redressal or criminal action has followed from the concerned authorities. Repeated letters & reminders from the Housing Department to the SRA regarding the matter and seeking inquiry report or avhal have not been honoured. Despite clear directions issued by the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, during the meeting held on 03.05.2024, addressed to the Secretary and SE Shri R. Dhavalbhakt, no meaningful follow-up action has been undertaken by HEAD OF the concerned departments, reflecting administrative inaction and disregard of statutory responsibilities. Note: Letter No. Sankerna-2024/S.No.831/Zhopasu-1 dated 25th September 2024, issued by the Housing Department, was officially addressed to the Hon’ble CEO, SRA. The corresponding URN/Inward Number at SRA is GEN/2024/93830. This letter, routed through the prescribed protocol and command chain, was forwarded to various internal departments for necessary action and compliance. Yet, as of date, no substantial response or resolution has been reported. Other letter issued from Housing Department, include Letter No. Sankerna-2024/pr.kra.03/Zhopasu-1 dated 15 Oct 2024 ( nond.sha.kra - Aa.Mu.S (gruni) 7511 with ref no- 901/2024 ) Refer attachment - Recent Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 sent from Hon’ble Deputy Secretary Shri Sunil Tumhare Sahib to Hon’ble CEO, SRA citing References to the Department’s letter dated 03.10.2024 (No. Sankirna-2024/No.No.831/Zhopsu-1) and subsequent reminder letters dated 30.10.2024, 07.01.2025, 09.01.2025, and 27.01.2025. The Reminder Letter No. 5 dated 22nd April 2025 stated “ Tari Shri. Kasa yanchya vividha e-mail madhil namud mudyambabat niyamochit karwahi karun kelelelya karwahi cha svayansparsh ahwal tatkal shasanas sadar karava, hi vinanti.” 7.6 PUBLIC INTEREST COMPROMISED These continuing failures constitute serious violations of the MCS & IPC and severely undermine public interest, allowing systemic fraud and manipulation to persist ............................................................................. (LR)


LEGAL REFERENCES Hon'ble Supreme Court of India in case of "A.V. Papayya Sastry & Ors. v. Government of A.P. & Ors.", the Apex Court has opined that, if any judgment or order is obtained by fraud, it cannot be said to be a judgment or order in law. “Fraud avoids all judicial acts, ecclesiastical or temporal. This principle applies universally—whether the fraud is against a Court, Tribunal, or Statutory Authority—rendering the outcome void ab initio Hon'ble Supreme Court of India in case of Sheila Sebastian V/s R. Jawaharaj & Anr. (Criminal Appeal Nos. 359-360 of 2010) - ‘Forgery’ and ‘Making of False Documents’ Md. Ibrahim & Ors V/s State of Bihar & Anr, (2009) 8 SCC 751 Supreme Court Order -Dhanraj N. Asawani vs. Amarjeetsingh Mohindersingh Basi. (Citation: 2023 (SC) 652). Date of Decision:July 25, 2023 .Maharashtra Co-Operative Societies Act Does Not Curtail Power Of Police Investigation Under CrPC: Supreme Court . Supreme Court Order- Ramarao & Anr vs Narayan & Anr on 20 December, 1968 Equivalent citations: 1969 AIR 724, 1969 SCR (3) 185. IN SUPPORT OF GRIEVANCE REDRESSAL MANDATE Excerpt from Court Order cited IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION WRIT PETITION NO. 2333 OF 2008 Shankar Versus The Chief Executive Officer, Slum Rehabilitation Authority & Ors. "We make it clear that the Chief Executive Officer (C.E.O.), Slum Rehabilitation Authority, Mumbai, shall issue a circular forthwith bringing this order to the notice of all concerned Departments and requiring them to act expeditiously, diligently, and within the time-frame provided in the orders of the Court. The principle of public accountability would require a public servant to discharge his obligations without any delay and with a complete sense of responsibility. There should be no justification whatsoever for keeping matters pending on their table for years together without passing any order. It is expected of the public servant to respond to letters, applications, and requests made by citizens seeking redressal of their grievances at the earliest and, in any case, normally it should not exceed a period of eight weeks. We direct the C.E.O. to issue a circular and ensure its compliance in future." . .............................................................................


Respected Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb, With reference to the ABOVESAID brief facts & complaints /grievances ,we respectfully draw your kind attention to the continued administrative inaction following a joint mass grievance hearing held on 04th October 2024 (227 days ago), chaired by Hon’ble Member of Parliament Smt. Varsha Tai Gaikwad and Hon’ble CEO, SRA, Dr. Mahendra Kalyankar. During this meeting, strong prima facie evidence of forgery, collusion, and fraudulent practices by the developer and purported Managing Committee was placed on record. Following this, the Hon’ble CEO, SRA, issued specific directions to: Smt. Sandhya Bawankule – Assistant Registrar Shri R.B. Mitkar – Deputy Chief Engineer Shri Birje – Deputy Chief Engineer However, despite the gravity of the evidence and the seniority of the officials involved, no concrete or remedial action has been taken to date. This continued inaction reflects serious lapses in administrative accountability and undermines the very purpose of grievance redressal mechanisms. Superficial Handling of Complaints- Although the system demonstrates exemplary governance at higher levels, complaints lodged via the Aaplesarkar portal are being addressed only in a superficial manner. Token letters are sent to the developer, who has failed to respond, leading to premature closure of complaints. This practice defeats the very purpose of redressal and undermines public trust. Despite clear and substantial evidence( refer attachment) being already in possession of the Engineering Department since 2009 , no effective follow-up or action has been taken against the developer responsible. This is to further bring to your esteemed attention that a series of long-standing irregularities, fraudulent representations, and systemic failures have plagued the redevelopment process of Sukhshanti CHS Ltd. The facts enumerated herein demonstrate: Material violations of law, including the Maharashtra Cooperative Societies Act, 1960 and Slum Act provisions; Breach of cooperative principles and due process; And complete non-compliance with directives issued during high-level meetings, despite repeated representations by affected parties and senior citizens. We sincerely urge your urgent and personal intervention to uphold the sanctity of the law, ensure fair administrative action, and restore faith in the justice delivery system. We respectfully request you to take note of the latest follow-up details as outlined below: Pursuant to our recent interaction on Monday, 5th May 2025, with Shri Amol Patankar Saheb, Officer from the Hon’ble Chief Minister’s Janta Darbar (CMO), under Token No. 6, raised by Shri Mohd. Nazir, along with Shri Raju Kasa and Smt. Pushma Kasa, we were kindly advised to approach the esteemed office of Housing Department for redressal regarding the long-pending matter concerning the registration of an FIR. The matter specifically pertains to grave allegations of Forgery & Fraud in the execution of the Developer Agreement (DA) and General Power of Attorney (GPOA) dated 22nd November 2006, executed by Vibhuti Constructions (SK Group) in collusion with a self-declared Managing Committee. These documents were executed after an Administrator had been legally appointed under Order dated 13th November 2006 by the Deputy Registrar, L Ward), thereby rendering the acts illegal, unauthorized, and void ab initio. Following this advice, we met the Personal Secretary, Shri Sudhir Rathod Saheb, to the Hon’ble Minister of State , Housing -Shri Pradeep Bhoyyar ji, who graciously gave us over 5 minutes of patient hearing. He was kind enough to understand our concerns and then directed us to Shri Tarange Saheb, the recently appointed Deputy Secretary, Housing Department, succeeding Shri Sunil Tumbhare Saheb. Shri Tarange Saheb was equally receptive and heard our concerns with attention, duly taking note of the compelling documentary evidence of forgery and misrepresentation in the said Developer Agreement and Power of Attorney. He also acknowledged the correspondence already issued by the Housing Department to the SRA in this regard.. Further, on 5th May 2025, both the undersigned — Shri Raju Kasa and Shri Mohd. Nazir — again visited Shri Tarange Saheb to highlight the ongoing administrative inaction and delays affecting the resolution of the complaint. Subsequently, on Thursday, 15th May 2025, Shri Tarange Saheb was pleased to direct the DyCE SRA, Shri Birje, to look into the serious matter. Following this, Shri Birje confirmed a prior appointment for 5:00 PM on Tuesday, 20th May 2025 to discuss the grievance. We arrived well in advance for the confirmed meeting and waited patiently. However, we witnessed several individuals entering Shri Birje’s cabin and being entertained ahead of our scheduled slot. Upon respectfully intervening and reminding him of our confirmed appointment, Shri Birje, without any interaction, directed his assistant to refer us to Executive Engineer Shri Wani. We waited at Shri Wani’s office (including AE,SE -Lward) until 6.30 PM, but they were not available. As anticipated, no outcome-oriented direction was issued, and our grievance remained unaddressed. It is respectfully submitted that such conduct — particularly when prior appointments are confirmed — is discouraging and reflective of institutional apathy. Despite multiple visits, reminders, and submission of serious and verifiable evidence of forgery, the matter continues to suffer. We regret to note that such neglect is not isolated but symptomatic of a broader issue at SRA, where lesser privileged and aggrieved citizens, even while presenting compelling evidence, are not heard in the right spirit. The evidence provided has been in the custody of the SRA since 2009, yet no substantial steps have been taken. Even after several reminders by the Housing Department calling for an “Avhal” (report), only superficial letters were issued to the developer seeking "Khulasa", despite the seriousness of the matter This continued apathy and red-tapism, combined with a lack of tangible action, have caused further delay, injustice, and hardship to the aggrieved senior citizens and families involved. In light of the above, we humbly request the Hon’ble Officers at Mantralaya to kindly take urgent cognizance of this matter and initiate immediate follow-up action, including the issuance of the Avhal and appropriate proceedings, to uphold citizen centric governance and statutory accountability. II.


PRAYERS Hon. CEO Dr. Kalyankar saheb, is respectfully requested to: Grant an urgent appointment to address this matter- 18 YEAR ORDEAL; Take cognizance and initiate cancellation of the LOI based on evidence of fraud and forgery; Facilitate registration of FIR against the accused parties; Uphold principles of able governance ensuring transparency and justice. We are confident that your esteemed office will not allow such a grave matter involving forgery, collusion, and abuse of system to go unaddressed, and will act promptly to ensure justice is served.
With sincere regards,


Shri Mohd. Nazir & Others
Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
Your Grievance is forwarded to Secretary SRA for Further needfull. as such your Grievance is Closed with this office.

Assistant Registrar (Western)

Mr Rajiv halde AR Deparment misleading and voilation of In the Maharashtra Government Servants Regulation of Transfers and Prevention of Delay in Discharge of Official Duties Act, 2005, Section 10 addresses dereliction of duty, defining it as wilful or intentional delay or negligence in discharging official duties. Such actions, if committed by a government servant, are grounds for disciplinary action, rajiv halde se mai 45 days se allotment letter ki mang kar raha hu per pichle 45 days mujhe mislead kar rahe hai jo uper diye law me aata hai,abhi tak sirf mujhe ghumaya ja raha hai,mai jab office visit karta hu wo attitude alag hai jiski mere pas video footage hai, har bar ek nayi bat bolte hai,ye puri tarah cooruption na dene ki wajah se mere kam ko delay karne ka kosis kar rahe hai
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved

1058
GRI/2025/170
संस्थे कडून पाठवण्यात आलेल्या पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरणाला पत्रकांचे उत्तर मिळत नाही त्यासंबंधित.
Assistant Registar
DURGESH DHONDU CHAVAN
03/06/20254582110
आदरणीय महोदय,

आम्ही वरील संस्थेच्या वतीने कळवू इच्छीतो की,आमच्या
येथील पुनर्वसन इमारत क्र.०१ व ०२ मधील अनेक समस्या बाबत एस.आर.ए. पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण अधिकाऱ्यानं कडे वारंवार पत्र व्यवहार करण्यात आले. परंतु आमच्या संस्थेला एका हि पत्राचे उत्तर मिळालेले नाही.
मी सचिव श्री. दुर्गेश धोंडू चव्हाण स्वतः दिनांक ०८.०३.२०२५ रोजी एस.आर.ए. पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण अधिकार्याना जाऊन भेटलो आणि पाठवलेल्या पत्रका बद्दल विचारणा केली असता अधिकाऱयांकडून मला उडवाउडवीचे उत्तर देण्यात आले. आणि बोलले कि पोलिसात FIR करा . आम्ही पोलिसात लेखी तक्रार करायला गेलो पण आमची तक्रार घेतली नाही. ते सांगतात तुम्ही S R A ला जा तिथे तक्रार करा.
महोदया अध्यक्ष श्रीमती सविता पंढरीनाथ शेट्ये यांचा मुलगा श्री रविन्द्र शेट्ये यांनी बनावटी लेटर हेड आणि अध्यक्ष च्या नावाचा शिक्का बनवून चुकीच्या पद्धतीने पत्रव्यवहार केला आहे. त्यासंबंधित संस्थेने दिनांक १९.११.२०२४ रोजी प्राधिकारणास पत्र व्यवहार केला आणि त्यानंतर पाठवलेल्या एकाही पत्रकांचे उत्तर एस.आर.ए. पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरणाच्या अधिकाऱयांनी आज पर्यन्त दिले नाही.
पण दिनांक २६.११.२०२४ रोजी दोन रिक्त पद भरण्यासाठी अध्यक्षांनी आणि त्यांच्या सहकाऱयांनी बनावटी पद्धतीने पत्रव्यवहार केला त्याच्यावर तुमच्या अधिकाऱयांनी निवडणूक घेण्याचे आदेश काढले. आमच्या संस्थेचे एकच म्हणणे आहे कि दोन रिक्त पद भरण्यासाठी आपल्याकडे आलेल्या सर्व पत्रक खरे आहेत कि खोटे आहेत ह्याची छाननी करण्यात यावी.
महोदया आमच्या संस्थेला तुमच्या कडून खूप अपेक्षा आहेत कि तुम्ही आम्हाला न्याय मिळवून द्याल अशी मी आशा बाळगतो.
पाठविण्यात आलेल्या पत्रांचा तपशील खालील प्रमाणे :

१ ) दिनांक: १९-११-२०२४ चे पत्रक , २ ) दिनांक: १५-०१-२०२५ चे पत्रक , ३ ) दिनांक: २०-०१-२०२५ चे पत्रक , ४ ) दिनांक: ११-०२-२०२५ चे पत्रक , ५ ) दिनांक: ०४-०३ -२०२५ चे पत्रक.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
आपण दाखल केलेल्या तक्रारींच्या अनुषंगाने आपणास उत्तर देण्यात आलेले आहे.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748934339879_6540_NEW%20MAHAKALI%20NAGAR%20COOP%20SOC.pdf
1059
GRI/2025/169
Kamgarpanch ganga II SRA CHS :- No response for complaint
Computent Authority-05
Rajesh Suresh Surve02/06/2025458199

GRI/2025/168
बिल्डर विरुद्ध भाड्याबद्दल तक्रार आणि दादागिरी बद्दल आणि मला माझ्या घरात जाऊन देत नाही ही तक्रार
Assistant Registar
AMIT Vishwanath SURVE
01/06/2025458189
आरे ग्रीन डेव्हलपर प्रायव्हेट लिमिटेड यांच्या सिटी सर्वे नंबर - २९४/११(पी टी) - २९४/३५(पी टी)
मी सरिता चव्हाण
माझे घर पात्र असूनही गेले दीड वर्ष बिल्डर मला म्हणाले तुम्ही तुमचा रूम खाली करा मी तुम्हाला भाडे देतो मी माझे घर खाली केले आणि गेले दीड वर्षापासून मला भाडे न देता आणि मला माझ्या घरात जाऊन देत नाही आम्ही आमची तक्रार बाजूच्या पोलीस चौकीत केली आणि एसीपी ऑफिस डीसीपी ऑफिस लेकिन तक्रार केली या तक्रार बद्दल आम्हाला काही उत्तर मिळाले नाही
याबद्दल तक्रार केली होती एस आर ए कडे ही विनंती की मला माझे घराचे भाडे मिळावे ही विनंती

आपले विश्वासू
सरिता चव्हाण

मोबाईल नंबर - ०९८९२५९०१७५
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved

1061
GRI/2025/165
Grievance regarding non-receipt of relief from SRA in Prem Nagar, Vile Parle – Pending for 8 Years
Competent Authority-03
pratik poojary01/06/2025458189
We, the residents of Prem Nagar, Vile Parle, are writing to express our deep anguish and disappointment regarding the inordinate delay and continued neglect by the Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA) in addressing our rehabilitation concerns.

It has been 8 long years since the initiation of the redevelopment process under the SRA scheme in our locality, and yet we have not received any form of relief, housing, or progress update. During this period, many of us have suffered tremendous emotional, financial, and physical hardships. We are still living in extremely difficult conditions, with no clarity on when we will receive what was promised to us.

Despite repeated follow-ups, written complaints, and meetings with concerned officials, no concrete action has been taken. The delay is not only unjust but also appears to be a serious case of administrative apathy.

We humbly request you to:

Investigate the current status of the SRA project for Prem Nagar, Vile Parle.

Provide us with an official update and timeline for completion.

Ensure that the rights of affected residents are safeguarded and relief is provided without any further delay.

This is a final and urgent appeal from the residents. We sincerely hope that your esteemed office will intervene immediately and take necessary actions to address our plight.

We trust in your commitment to uphold justice and public welfare and look forward to your prompt response.
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-
1062
GRI/2025/164Reference:- GRI/2025/163
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
John Joshua01/06/20254581910
John Joshua
Room No. 1, Mainu Bhai Chawl
Marol Maroshi Road, Gaondevi Talav
Mumbai - 400059
Mobile number - +91-9664206175

To: Dr. Mahendra Kalyankar (I.A.S.)
The Chief Executive Officer
Administrative Building, Anant Kanekar Marg, D Block BKC,
Naupada, Bandra (E), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400051,



Dear Dr. Mahendra Kalyankar (I.A.S.),

I am writing to formally express my concerns regarding the redevelopment project undertaken by your company at Mainu Bhai Chawl, Marol Maroshi Road, Gaondevi Talav, Mumbai - 400059.

It has come to my attention that there is an ongoing road extension as part of the redevelopment project. However, this extension appears to be proceeding without adherence to the approved Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA) protocols and the Development Plan (DP) reservations. The lack of transparency and deviation from sanctioned plans have raised significant concerns among the residents.

Key Issues:

Unauthorized Road Extension: The road extension seems to be executed without proper approvals from the SRA and the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC). This unauthorized development is causing disruptions and safety concerns for the residents.

Non-Compliance with SRA Guidelines: As per the SRA's guidelines, any redevelopment work, including infrastructure changes, must be carried out following the approved plans and with due consultation with the affected residents. The current activities suggest a deviation from these protocols.

Impact on Residents: The unauthorized construction has led to increased noise, dust, and restricted access, adversely affecting the daily lives and well-being of the residents.

Requested Actions:

Immediate Halt of Unauthorized Work: Cease all ongoing unauthorized construction activities related to the road extension until proper approvals are obtained.

Transparency and Communication: Provide detailed information about the current redevelopment plans, including any changes made to the original approved plans, and ensure open communication with the residents.

Compliance with Regulatory Protocols: Ensure that all redevelopment activities strictly adhere to the guidelines and approvals set forth by the SRA and BMC.

Resident Consultation: Engage with the residents to address their concerns and incorporate their feedback into the redevelopment process.

I urge you to take immediate corrective actions to address these issues. Failure to comply may compel the residents to escalate the matter to the relevant authorities, including the SRA and BMC, for further intervention.

Please acknowledge receipt of this letter and inform me of the steps your company intends to take within 14 days.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
John Joshua
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748776727282_5821_BUNCH%2BNO%2B8.pdf

GRI/2025/163

Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
John Joshua01/06/2025458178
Dear Dr. Mahendra Kalyankar (I.A.S.),

I am writing to formally express my concerns regarding the redevelopment project undertaken by your company at Mainu Bhai Chawl, Marol Maroshi Road, Gaondevi Talav, Mumbai - 400059.

It has come to my attention that there is an ongoing road extension as part of the redevelopment project. However, this extension appears to be proceeding without adherence to the approved Slum Rehabilitation Authority (SRA) protocols and the Development Plan (DP) reservations. The lack of transparency and deviation from sanctioned plans have raised significant concerns among the residents.

Key Issues:

Unauthorized Road Extension: The road extension seems to be executed without proper approvals from the SRA and the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC). This unauthorized development is causing disruptions and safety concerns for the residents.

Non-Compliance with SRA Guidelines: As per the SRA's guidelines, any redevelopment work, including infrastructure changes, must be carried out following the approved plans and with due consultation with the affected residents. The current activities suggest a deviation from these protocols.

Impact on Residents: The unauthorized construction has led to increased noise, dust, and restricted access, adversely affecting the daily lives and well-being of the residents.

Requested Actions:

Immediate Halt of Unauthorized Work: Cease all ongoing unauthorized construction activities related to the road extension until proper approvals are obtained.

Transparency and Communication: Provide detailed information about the current redevelopment plans, including any changes made to the original approved plans, and ensure open communication with the residents.

Compliance with Regulatory Protocols: Ensure that all redevelopment activities strictly adhere to the guidelines and approvals set forth by the SRA and BMC.

Resident Consultation: Engage with the residents to address their concerns and incorporate their feedback into the redevelopment process.

I urge you to take immediate corrective actions to address these issues. Failure to comply may compel the residents to escalate the matter to the relevant authorities, including the SRA and BMC, for further intervention.

Please acknowledge receipt of this letter and inform me of the steps your company intends to take within 14 days.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Regards
John Joshua

GRI/2025/162
Greivance regarding non issuance of allotment letter despite repeated follow ups
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Jayshri Vinayak Gite01/06/2025458189
Respected Sir/Madam,

I Mrs. Jayshri Vinayak Gite, W/o late Shri Vinayak Shankar Gite, Aged 59, Resident of 1404/ A wing, Prakashwadi SRA CHSL, Nr. Western Express Highway Metro Station, Andheri (E), Mumbai 400093. This is to bring it to your kind attention regarding the inordinate delay in the issuance of my SRA allotment letter.
It has been over four months since 6/01/2025 I have been continuously following up with your office (Where we met Mr Arun Jadhav - Who is at the designation of - “Sahakari Adhikari Shreni - 1”) both in person and through verbal/written communication. I am attaching the letter 6/01/2025 along with copy annexure which I submitted to your office Requesting to give me my allotment letter) However, I have yet to receive the allotment letter that I am duly entitled to as part of the rehabilitation process.

Despite fulfilling all required formalities and submitting the necessary documentation well within the stipulated timelines, there has been no clarity or update on the status of my allotment. Every visit to the office results in vague assurances, without any concrete timeline or action.

This delay is causing me and my family significant distress and uncertainty, especially as this allotment is essential for securing stable housing. I request you to kindly look into the matter urgently and ensure that the allotment letter is issued at the earliest without further delay.

I also request a written acknowledgment of this grievance and a timeline by which the matter will be resolved. Should there be any further requirements from my end, I am more than willing to comply immediately.

Looking forward to a prompt and positive response.

Thanking you,
Mrs. Jayshri Vinayak Gite
Assistant Registrar (Western)

1067
GRI/2025/158 भाडे जमा करण्याविषयी तक्रार
Assistant Registrar (Western)
AMIT Vishwanath SURVE
29/05/20254581610
मी श्री सुरज नाईक दिनांक ९/१/२०२५ रोजी एस आर ए कडून माझ्या झोपडीचे डिमोल्युशन करण्यात आले. डेव्हलपर ने माझ्या झोपडीला अनिर्णित दाखवून, इतर पात्र झोपडीधारकांना दोन वर्षाप्रमाणे (४,३२०००)रु भाडे व टेम्पोचे भाडे आणि एजंट चे भाडे हे सर्व दिले गेले. पण मला मात्र पात्र असून सुद्धाअनिर्णित दाखवून फक्त (१,८००००)रू एवढेच भाडे चेक श्री स्वप्निल कदम यांच्याकडे दिले गेले. मी एस आर इकडे वारंवार भाड्या संबंधी तक्रार करून सुद्धा माझ्या तक्रारीवर कोणतीही दखल घेतली गेली नाही याआधीही ऑनलाइन पोर्टलवर मी श्री सुरज नाईक एप्लीकेशन नंबर-७४० या नावाने कंप्लेंट दाखल केली आहे. तरी ऑनलाईन पोर्टलवर स्टेटस म्हणून डेव्हलपर एक्सप्लोरेटरी कॉल असे दिसत आहे. तरी यासंबंधी मला डेव्हलपर करून कोणताही कॉल आलेला नाही माझी एस आर कडे अशी विनंती आहे की लवकरात लवकर माझे पूर्ण भाडे जमा करण्यात यावे.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
थकीत भाडेबाबत विकासकास सुचना देण्यात आलेल्या आहेत.

https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748541555448_8287_17485414239351697783521065221450.jpg
1068
GRI/2025/157 भाडे जमा करण्याविषयी तक्रार
Assistant Registrar (Western)
AMIT Vishwanath SURVE
29/05/2025458159
मी केतन विश्वनाथ सुर्वे दिनांक ९/१/२०२५ रोजी माझ्या घराचे एस आर इकडून डिमोल्युशन करण्यात आले. डेव्हलपर ने माझ्या पात्र झोपडीला अनिर्णित दाखवून इतर पात्र झोपडीधारकांना (४,३२०००) दोन वर्षाप्रमाणे भाडे दिले असून आम्हाला मात्र (१,८००००) एवढेच भाडे श्री स्वप्निल कदम चेक मार्फत जमा केले. वारंवार एस आर ए कडे भाड्या संबंधी तक्रार करून सुद्धा आमच्या तक्रारीवर कोणीही दखल घेतली जात नाही मी आधीही ऑनलाइन पोर्टलवर श्री केतन विश्वनाथ सुर्वे एप्लीकेशन नंबर-७४२ तक्रार केलेली आहे तरी माझी आपणास विनंती आहे की लवकरात लवकर माझे पूर्ण भाडे सारी कडे जमा करण्यात यावे. डेव्हलपर कडून आम्हाला कोणत्याही प्रकारचा कॉल आलेला नाही.

Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
थकीत भाडेबाबत विकासकास सुचना देण्यात आलेल्या आहेत.

https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748539505521_5708_17485394399841642191113838238307.jpg
1069
GRI/2025/156 भाडे जमा करण्याविषयी तक्रार
Assistant Registrar (Western)
AMIT Vishwanath SURVE
29/05/2025458159
मी शबनम निहाल चौधरी माझ्या घराचे दिनांक ९/१/२०२५ रोजी एस आर कडून डीमोलिशन करण्यात आले. डेव्हलपर ने माझी झोपडी पात्र असून असूनही अनिर्णीत दाखवून एस आर ए कडे इतर पात्र झोपडीधारकांपेक्षा (४,३२०००)कमी भाडे (१,८००००) दोन वर्षे याप्रमाणे स्वप्निल कदम यांच्याकडे चेक जमा केला आहे. तरी एस आर एन ए इतर पात्र झोपडीधारकांप्रमाणे माझेही पूर्ण भाडे सारे कडे जमा करण्यात यावे ही विनंती करत आहे. मी एस आर ए च्या ऑनलाईन पोर्टल वरती शबनम निहाल चौधरी माझा एप्लीकेशन नंबर-७४१ असून दिनांक ४/१/२०२५ रोजी मी ऑनलाईन तक्रार केली असून त्यामध्ये माझा स्टेटस डेव्हलपर एक्सप्लोरेटरी कॉल असा येत असून मला डेव्हलपर कडून कोणताही कॉल आलेला नाही तरी माझी विनंती आहे की लवकरात लवकर एस आर ए मध्ये माझे भाडे जमा केले जावे.

Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
थकीत भाडेबाबत विकासकास सुचना देण्यात आलेल्या आहेत.

GRI/2025/155 भाडे जमा करण्याविषयी तक्रार
Assistant Registrar (Western)
AMIT Vishwanath SURVE
29/05/2025458159
मी आरती विश्वनाथ सुर्वे दिनांक - ०९/०१/२०२५ रोजी माझ्या राहत्या घराचे एस आर ए कडून डीमोल्युशन करण्यात आले. वारंवार एस आर ए कडे बाळा संबंधी तक्रार करून सुद्धा आमच्या तक्रारीवर कोणतीही दखल घेतली जात नाही याआधीही एस आर ए च्या ऑनलाईन पोर्टलवर दिनांक 4 जानेवारी 2025 रोजी आरती विश्वनाथ सुर्वे एप्लीकेशन नंबर -७४३ कंप्लेंट दाखल केली आहे व तिचा स्टेटस डेव्हलपर एक्सप्लोरेटरी कॉल असा दाखवतो आहे तरी आम्हाला डेव्हलपर कडून कोणताही कॉल आलेला नाही. मी आपणास विनंती करते की लवकरात लवकर एस आर एन कडे आमचे भाडे जमा करण्यात यावे
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
थकीत भाडेबाबत विकासकास सुचना देण्यात आलेल्या आहेत.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748536759159_6732_17485367398959169949575756202818.jpg
1071
GRI/2025/154 भाडे जमा करण्याविषयी तक्रार
Assistant Registrar (Western)
AMIT Vishwanath SURVE
29/05/2025458148
९/१/२०२५ रोजी एस आर एस कडून आमच्या घराचे डीमोलिशन करण्यात आले. वारंवार एस आर ए कडे भाड्या संबंधी तक्रार करून सुद्धा आमच्या तक्रारीवर कोणतीही दखल घेतली जात नाही याआधीही आम्ही ऑनलाईन एप्लीकेशन द्वारे आमची कंप्लेंट दाखल केली होती एप्लीकेशन नंबर पुढील प्रमाणे-७३६ नाव अमित विश्वनाथ सुर्वे यांनी दिनांक ४ जानेवारी 2025 एस आर ए चा ऑनलाईन पोर्टलवर कंप्लेंट दाखल केली होती तरी अजूनही तिचा स्टेटस वेटिंग म्हणून दाखवतो आम्ही विनंती करतो की लवकरात लवकर आमचे भाडे एस आर ए मध्ये जमा करण्यात यावे
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
थकीत भाडेबाबत विकासकास सुचना देण्यात आलेल्या आहेत.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748534367519_3914_1748534228138443537001422820095.jpg
1072
GRI/2025/153
प्रकाश नगर, माहिम वेस्ट येथे श्री. राजेंद्र विजय चव्हाण व त्यांच्या साथीदारांकडून होणारे बेकायदा बांधकाम व अतिक्रमण.
Competent Authority-01
Meekail Nasir Shaikh29/05/20254581610
महोदय,
मी, मीकाईल नासिर शेख, प्रकाश नगर, माहिम वेस्टचा रहिवासी असून गेल्या 20 वर्षांपासून येथे वास्तव्यास आहे. आमच्या परिसरातील सोसायटी सदस्य राजेंद्र विजय चौहान, नूर हकीक खान आणि प्रकाश भागोजी झोरे हे मोकळ्या जागेवर घरे बांधून, बनावट कागदपत्रे (वीज बिल, रेशन कार्ड इत्यादी) तयार करून अपात्र लोकांना विकत आहेत. यासाठी ते प्रत्येक व्यक्तीकडून अंदाजे ₹2.5 लाख किंवा अधिक रक्कम घेत आहेत. या गैरव्यवहारांमुळे गेल्या 10 वर्षांत परिसरातील घरांची संख्या सुमारे 150 वरून 300 पेक्षा जास्त झाली आहे. ही बेकायदेशीर कृत्ये सुमारे ₹4 कोटींचा घोटाळा असून, या व्यक्तींकडून सार्वजनिक जागेवरही अतिक्रमण होत आहे...
Dy.Collector (City)Resolved
पात्रतेबाबत आक्षेप असेल तर आपण मा. अपर जिल्हाधिकारी यांचेकडे कलम ३५ नुसार अर्ज करावा

1073
GRI/2025/152
जनकल्याण दहिसर एस आर आर सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था मर्यादित. शांती नगर दहिसर पूर्व मुंबई ४०००६८ या संस्थेच्या व्यवस्थापक समितीने बेकायदेशीरपणे अधिकारात नसताना अपात्र राहिवाशी यांना चाव्या वाटप केल्या बाबत
Estate Department
Mahesh Bibhishan Thorat
28/05/2025458149
जनकल्याण दहिसर एस आर आर सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था मर्यादित. शांती नगर दहिसर पूर्व मुंबई ४०००६८ या संस्थेच्या व्यवस्थापक समितीने बेकायदेशीरपणे अधिकारात नसताना अपात्र राहिवाशी यांना चाव्या वाटप केल्या बाबत आपल्या कार्यालयात तक्रार केलेली असताना देखील आज पर्यन्त कोणतीही कारवाई संस्थेच्या व्यवस्थापक समिति विरोधात झालेली नाही व त्यांच्याकडून चाव्या घेण्यात आलेल्या नाहीत. कृपया आपण योगहया ती कारवाई लवकरात लवकर करण्यात यावी

1074
GRI/2025/151
रामकरण राम हरिजन यांच्याविरुद्ध उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५, झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण च्या नावाने बनावट निष्कासन आदेश पाठवल्याबद्दल आणि माझ्या आणि माझ्या कुटुंबाविरुद्ध सतत छळ, फसवणूक आणि जातीय भाषेचा वापर केल्याबद्दल तक्रार.
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Surekha Rajbhar28/05/2025458138

सुरेखा मनोहर राजभर
1508, श्री रामायण एसआरए सीएचएस लि
भाबरेकर नगर, कांदिवली (पश्चिम)
मुंबई- 400067.
९७०२९७१३९०.
तारीख- २५.५.२०२५


1. मुख्य कार्यकारी अधिकारी, एसआरए
झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण,
तिसरा मजला, प्रशासकीय इमारत,
अनंत काणेकर मार्ग,
वांद्रे (पूर्व)
मुंबई – ४०००५१.

2. सचिन गिरी साहेब
सक्षम अधिकारी-५
तिसरा मजला, ए विंग,
झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण
प्रशासकीय इमारत, अनंत काणेकर मार्ग
वांद्रे (पूर्व), मुंबई-४०००५१

विषय :- रामकरण राम हरिजन यांच्याविरुद्ध उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५, झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण च्या नावाने बनावट निष्कासन आदेश पाठवल्याबद्दल आणि माझ्या आणि माझ्या कुटुंबाविरुद्ध सतत छळ, फसवणूक आणि जातीय भाषेचा वापर केल्याबद्दल तक्रार.

१. महोदय, सुरेखा मनोहर राजभर, ज्या महाराष्ट्र नवनिर्माण सेनेच्या स्थापनेपासून सदस्य आहेत, त्या मनोहर राजभर यांच्या पत्नी आहेत. त्या रामकरण राम हरिजन नावाच्या व्यक्तीने उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५, एसआरए यांच्या नावाने केलेल्या छळ, फसवणूक, छळ आणि बनावट घर निष्कासन आदेशाकडे तुमचे लक्ष वेधू इच्छितात.

२. महोदय, ७.२.२०२५ रोजी, रामकरण राम हरिजन यांनी मला खोली क्रमांक ३६१, मातृ गायत्री चाळ, भाब्रेकर नगर, कांदिवली (पश्चिम), मुंबई-४०००६७ विकले आणि २०२२ मध्ये झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरणाने मला परिशिष्ट क्रमांक ३६१ मध्ये पात्र ठरवले. महोदय, २१.१२.२०११ रोजी, उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५ द्वारे सर्वेक्षण करण्यात आले आणि त्यानंतर माझे नाव सर्वेक्षण अहवालात समाविष्ट करण्यात आले.

३. २०२३ मध्ये, झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण, सोसायटी आणि डेव्हलपरने माझ्या नावे वाटप केले आणि माझा फ्लॅट क्रमांक १५०८, श्री रामायण एसआरए सीएचएस लिमिटेड, भाब्रेकर नगर, कांदिवली पश्चिम, मुंबई-४०००६७ मला वाटप केला.

४. आता रामकरण राम हरिजन दावा करत आहेत की त्यांनी त्यांची चाळीची खोली मला विकली नाही आणि खंडणी मागत आहेत आणि जेव्हा मी त्यांना पैसे देण्यास नकार दिला तेव्हा त्यांनी माझ्या आणि माझ्या कुटुंबाविरुद्ध झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण आणि पोलिस विभागात तक्रारी दाखल करण्यास सुरुवात केली. सर त्यांनी "तेरा पती मनसे में रह कर क्या उखाड लिया मेरा, तुम मराठी लोग निच होते हो" अशी अनेक जातीवादी भाषा वापरली आणि आजपर्यंत ते मला त्रास देत आहेत.

५. सर, ३०.४.२०२५ रोजी, मला रामकरण राम हरिजन यांचे पत्र पोस्टाद्वारे मिळाले, जेव्हा मी पत्र उघडले तेव्हा मला धक्का बसला की ते पत्र उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५, एसआरए यांचे आहे आणि ते निष्कासन आदेश आहे आणि ते पत्र पाहिल्यानंतर मी जमिनीवर पडलो.

६. सर, १५.५.२०२५ रोजी, सुनावणीच्या वेळी, जेव्हा मी सोसायटीच्या सदस्यांसमोर उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५ यांना सदर पत्र दाखवले तेव्हा ते धक्का बसले आणि विचलित झाले आणि त्यांनी मला स्पष्टपणे सांगितले की ते पत्र बनावट आहे आणि सदर पत्रावरील स्वाक्षरी बनावट आहे.

७. महोदय, मला आणि माझ्या कुटुंबाला भीती आहे की उपजिल्हाधिकारी-५ हे पत्र खोटे असल्याचे सांगत असूनही ते रामकरण राम हरिजन यांच्यावर कोणतीही कारवाई करत नाहीत आणि मला आणि माझ्या कुटुंबाला भीती आहे की आम्हाला आमच्याच घरातून हाकलून लावले जाईल, म्हणून तुम्हाला या कठीण काळात मदत करण्याची विनंती आहे ज्यासाठी मी नेहमीच तुमची आभारी राहीन.

धन्यवाद


सुरेखा राजभर
९७०२९७१३९०

CC to:-

1. देवेंद्र फडणवीस साहेब
माननीय मुख्यमंत्री
मुख्यमंत्री कार्यालय,
महाराष्ट्र शासन
सहावा मजला, मंत्रालय,
मुंबई ४०००३२.

2. राज ठाकरे साहेब
अध्यक्ष, महाराष्ट्र नवनिर्माण सेना
शिवतीर्थ, डॉ मधुकर बी राऊत मार्ग,
दादर पश्चिम, दादर, मुंबई- ४०००२८.

3. पोलिस उपायुक्त - झोन ११
दुसरा मजला, बोरिवली पोलिस स्टेशन
एस.व्ही. रोड, बोरिवली (पश्चिम)
मुंबई-४०००९२

4. वरिष्ठ पोलिस निरीक्षक
चारकोप पोलिस स्टेशन
प्लॉट क्रमांक ५० नेताजी सुभाषचंद्र बोस मार्ग,
आरडीपी रोड क्रमांक १, सेक्टर २ चारकोप,
कांदिवली पश्चिम, मुंबई- ४०००६७.
Competent Authority -5Resolved
आपल्या पात्रतेबाबत या कार्यालयात सुनावणी आयोजित करून आदेश पारित करण्यात आले आहेत. सदर आदेश आपणास अमान्य असल्यास आपण अपर जिल्हाधिकारी (अति/निष्का) तथा अपिलीय प्राधिकारी, पश्चिम उपनगरे यांचेकडे अपील दाखल करावे, ही विंनती.
-
https://media.sra.gov.in/sra-automation/sra-grievances/grievances/attachments/1748429989922_1345_Letter%20to%20CEO%20for%20forged%20letter.pdf
1075
GRI/2025/150
संस्थेची व्यवस्थापक समिति बरखास्त करून महाराष्ट्र सहकारी संस्था अधिनियम १९६० चे कलम ७७ अ नुसार कारवाई करणे बाबत
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Mahesh Bibhishan Thorat
28/05/20254581510
जनकल्याण दहिसर एस आर ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था मर्यादित या संस्थेच्या व्यवस्थापक समितीमध्ये एकूण १९ समिति सदस्य कार्यरत होते त्यापैकी २ समिति सदस्य मयत असून १० समिति सदस्य यांनी संस्थेच्या अध्यक्ष ,सचिव व खजिनदार यांच्या मनमानी करभारला कंटाळून राजीनामा दिलेला आहे तसेच संस्थेच्या व्यवस्थापक समितीचा निवडणूक कालावधी ऑक्टोबर २०२४ मध्ये संपलेला असून अजून संस्थेचे तेच समिति सदस्य अनधिकृतपणे कारभार सांभाळत आहेत त्यामुळे संस्थेच्या व्यवस्थापक समितिवर कायदेशीर कारवाई करण्यात यावी तसेच संस्थेची व्यवस्थापक समिति बरखास्त करून महाराष्ट्र सहकारी संस्था अधिनियम १९६० चे कलम ७७ अ नुसार प्रशासकाची नियुक्ती करणे बाबत
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सद्यस्थितीत संस्थेची निवडणुक प्रक्रिया पुर्ण झालेली आहे.

1077
GRI/2025/148उपोषण
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Pralesh Chaynakhawa27/05/2025458128
प्रमूख मागण्या

१) झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण sra बांद्रा येथील अधिकारी व डिफॉल्टर विकासक मे लकडावाला ह्यांनी संगनमताने कोणतीही चौकशी नकरता sra परिपत्रक १४४ ची पायमल्ली करून बेकायदेशीर पद्धतीने मे लकडावला विकासक ह्यानि सादर केलेल्या दिनांक १०ऑक्टोबर २०२२ रोजी च्या बोगस प्रस्तावाची शासनाने उच्च स्तरीय कमिटी च्या माध्यमातून चौकशी करून त्यातील दोषी अधिकारी, मे लकडावला विकासक व नियोजित सोसायटी चे प्रवर्तक ह्यांच्यावर कायदेशीर कारवाई करावी व त्या केलेल्या कारवाई ची अहवाल प्रत आम्हाला द्यावी .


• कोणतीही AGM घेतलेली नाही
• सन 2022 च्या दाखवलेल्या AGM घेण्यास एस आर ए, सहाय्यक निबंधक व पोलीस परवानगी घेतल्याची कोठेही नोंद नाही
• बोगस नवीन प्रस्ताव सादर केला गेला आणि त्या प्रस्तावात सन २०१४ साली घेतलेल्या सही व मयत लोकांच्या सही चा वापर करून प्रस्ताव दाखल केला गेला आहे



२) एस आर ए, बांद्रा ने बेकायदेशीर रित्या ५ मार्च २०२५ रोजी मे लकडावाला विकासक ह्यास दिलेला LOI तत्काळ रद्द करून sra परिपत्रक २१० मधील मुद्दा नं.७ व ८ नुसार अंमलबजावणी करून डिफॉलडर मे लकडावाला विकासक ह्यास काढून टाकून शासनाने हे प्रकल्प पूर्ण करावे


• सन २०१२ रोजी HPC केस नंबर. ३१७/२०११ मध्ये त्याला गणेश नगर मधून डिफॉल्टर विकासक मे लकडावला ह्यास काढून टाकले
• सन २०/०९/२०२३ रोजी बाबरेकर नगर,कांदिवली पश्चिम, येथून त्यांना ट्रमिंनेट केले गेले
• सन ३/०८/२०२३ रोजी लकडावला ह्याला शांती नगर चाळ, सायन कोळीवाडा ड्रॉप करण्यात आले
• सन ०७/०७/२०२२ रोजी न्यू गोव्तम नगर, देवनार येथून त्याला काढून टाकण्यात आले
• चारकोप पोलीस ठाण्यात मे लकडावाला विकासक ह्यांच्या विरुद्ध फसवणुकीचे अनेक गुन्हे नोंद आहेत




३) गणेश नगर, सॉल्ट पेन रोड, वडाळा,पुर्व, मुंबई ४०००३७.येथील C.S.no.plot 6(pt),147(pt) to 155(pt),161(pt) to 180(pt),184(pt),186(pt) to 188(pt),190(pt)to 192(pt), (210pt) सॉल्ट पेन डीविजन, एफ एन ,वॉर्ड वडाळा पुर्व मुंबई ४०००३७ येथील परिशिष्ट २ मधील बोगस नावे पडताळणी साठी परिशिष्ट २ हे अप्पर जिल्हाधिकारी (अती/निष्का) , मुंबई शहर, ह्यांच्या मार्फत री व्हेरिफिकेशन करावे व सप्लिमेंट परिशिष्ट तपासून शासन निर्णय २००० व २०११ पूर्वी पासून चे पात्र अपात्र नावे पडताळून पहावे

• मे लकडावला विकासक, सोसायटी व अधिकारी यांच्या संगनमताने बोगस नावे दाखल करण्यात आली आहेत

• गणेश नगर मध्ये हिंदू आगरी, कोळी, गाबीत, माळी, मालवणी, बौद्ध, मराठा समाजाचे रहिवाशी राहतात मग परिशिष्ट २ मध्ये दाखविलेले मुसलमान कुटुंब आले कुठून ??

• परिशिष्ट २ मध्ये अनेक निवासी व अनिवासी नावे वगळण्यात आले आहेत

• गणेश नगर मधील दुसरी सोसायटी म्हणजेच वडाळा श्री गणेश को ऑ है सोसायटी ह्यातील सभासदाना मे लकडावाला ह्याला दिलेल्या LOI व त्यांनी सादर केलेल्या परिशिष्ट २ मधून तत्काळ वगळा

४) झोपडपट्टी पुनर्वसन प्राधिकरण आणि महाराष्ट्र सरकार ह्यांच्या कडे अनेक केस व तक्रारी प्रलंबित आहेत पण आज पर्यंत आमच्या कोणत्याही तक्रारीचे निवारण झालेले नाही तरी चौकशी सुरू असताना ती चौकशी पूर्ण होई पर्यंत मे लकडावाला विकासक ह्यास पुढील कोणतेही परवानगी देऊ नयेत असे आदेश शासनाने SRA ह्यांस देण्यात यावे

• HPC केस प्रलंबित नंबर १५४/२०१२,
• AGRC केस नंबर ७६/२०२४
• मा उच्च न्यायालयाने आदेश तिवारी केस मध्ये नवीन प्रस्ताव स्वीकारण्या बद्दल आदेश दिले होते पण त्यांची कोणतीही अंमलबजावणी न करता ह्याला प्रोजेक्ट मंजूर कसे गेले ह्याची चौकशी होणे गरजेची आहे

५)मे लकडावाला विकासक ह्याला बे कायदेशीर दिले गेलेल्या ट्रांजिस्ट कॅम्प १,२ व ३ ह्यांच्या परवानगी तत्काळ रद्द करा

सोबत : मागणी क्रमांक १ ते ५ ह्यांचे पुरावे जोडले




Executive Engineers-1 (EE-1)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

Competent Authority -8Resolved
कार्यालयातील अधिकारी व कर्मचारी यांचे मार्फत प्रत्यक्ष मिळकतीवर जाऊन तक्रार अर्जातील नमुद झोपडयांची स्थळपहाणी करण्यात आलेली असून स्थळपहाणी अहवालानुसार प्रारुप परि-2 मध्ये तसे शेरे नमुद केले आहेत. संबंधित झोपडीधारकांचा खुलासा व कागदपत्रांच्या पडताळणीअंती शासन निर्णया नुसार अंतिम परि-2 मध्ये त्यांच्या झोपडीच्या पात्रता/अपात्रता/रद्दतेबाबत योग्य तो निर्णय घेण्यात येईल.
Rating: 1/5 | Feedback: आपण केलेल्या सदर कार्यवाही बाबत आपल्या विभागाच्या वतीने रितसर पत्र तक्रारदार यांना देण्यात यावे. ही नम्र विनंती.
