1172
GRI/2025/41RTI - Right To Information
Cooperative Department (CO)
Aftab Shaikh25/04/2025457808
I am writing to formally lodge a complaint against the gross negligence and unprofessional handling of my RTI application dated 20th March 2025, submitted to the Cooperative Department regarding information about a society on Plot Nos. 515, 516, and 484A. Despite multiple personal visits to the office, I have been continuously misled and denied the information I am legally entitled to under the Right to Information Act, 2005.

On my first visit, I was told that a person named Mr. Dhanraj held the relevant RTI file, which could not be found. On subsequent visits, the same excuse was repeated — either Mr. Dhanraj was absent, had gone to put up notices, or was unavailable. On my third visit, Mr. Dhanraj tried to locate the RTI for a few minutes and then redirected me to Ms. Shilpa, who also could not trace the file. Interestingly, my RTI reference number was present in their official register, confirming receipt of the application, but the physical RTI file was reportedly “missing.”

Instead of taking responsibility, I was casually told to submit a Xerox copy of the original RTI and return the following week. I complied and visited again on 17th April 2025, but was asked to return on 24th April. On 24th April — 35 days after submission — the file was still not processed, and I was again told to return after two more days.

This continuous delay, misplacement of official documents, and apathetic attitude of the concerned officials is a blatant violation of the RTI Act. As a UPSC aspirant, I seek information in good faith and in accordance with the law. If this is the state of governance and accountability in public departments, it raises serious concerns about transparency and citizen rights.

I request that this matter be taken seriously and necessary disciplinary action be initiated against the officials responsible for the delay and mishandling. I also urge you to ensure that I am provided the requested information without any further delay, i am not able to upload my RTI which i submit on 20 march 2025 but i can share my details so you can locate my RTI

Name - Anas Shaikh
No - 9769842813
Email Id - wisdompath25@gmail.com
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolvedalready given-
1173
GRI/2025/39
पंडित दीनदयाळ उपाध्याय (एसआरए) सहकारी ग्रहनिर्माण संस्थेत मर्यादित नोंदणी क्रमाक बओएम / एसआरए/ एचएसजी (टीसी) 10503/1997-98 [गैरप्रकार] बाबत तक्रार
Competent Authority-02
GANESH NAMDEV SAWANT
25/04/2025457819
आदरणीय उप-नोंदणी अधिकारी, सहकारी संस्था, [तालुका बांद्रा], महाराष्ट्र,
मी, गणेश नामदेव सावंत, पंडित दीनदयाळ उपाध्याय (एसआरए) सहकारी ग्रहनिर्माण संस्थेत मर्यादित सेंट जॉन बापटिस्ट रोड बांद्रा वेस्ट मुंबई ४०००५० , मोबाइल नंबर ९८९२८५०३५४, या सहकारी संस्थेचे सदस्य/सदस्याचे नातेवाईक/साधारण नागरिक म्हणून, संस्थेतील खालील गंभीर अनियमितता/गैरव्यवहार/अव्यवहार यांच्याबद्दल आपली निदर्शनास आणून तक्रार नोंदवितो.
तक्रारीचे तपशील:
• सहकारी संस्थेचे नाव: पंडित दीनदयाळ उपाध्याय (एसआरए) सहकारी ग्रहनिर्माण संस्थेत मर्यादित
• संस्थेचा पत्ता: पंडित दीनदयाळ उपाध्याय (एसआरए) सहकारी ग्रहनिर्माण संस्थेत मर्यादित सेंट जॉन बापटिस्ट रोड बांद्रा वेस्ट मुंबई ४०००५०
• तक्रारीचे स्वरूप: काही लोक वरील संस्थेचा नावाचा गैरप्रकारे वापर करून संस्थेतचा नावाने बँक खाते बँक ऑफ इंडिया या बंकेमध्ये उगडले आहे व गैरप्रकारे लोकांची आर्थिक फसवणूक करत आहे. तसेच वरिल संस्थेमध्ये १९९९ ते २०२५ कळवधी मध्ये या संस्थेची कोणती ही निवडणूक किवा इतर कोणताही ठराव पास झालेला नाही. तरीही काही लोक या संस्थेचा चेअरमन , सेक्रेटरी सागुण संस्थेतचा लोकांची फसवणूक करीत आहे. उदा. गैरव्यवहार, मालमत्तेचा गैरवापर, निवडणुकीतील अनियमितता, इत्यादी.
तक्रारीचे पुरावे: सोसायटी मध्ये पैसे कडण्यासाठी नोंदणीकृत वाटलेल परिपत्रक व त्या मागे लोकन कडून गेत्लेले पैसेचे बॅंकचे तपशील या तक्रारि सोबत जोडत आहे. तसेच या अगोधर याच लोकांनी असेच प्रंकरण आपल्या विभागाकडे २०१८ साली समविस्ट केले होते. ते मी तक्रार करून उगाडीस आणले होते. त्या प्रंकरणमध्ये मोठ्या प्रमणात मृत व्यक्तिचा स्वक्षरी मारून आपल्या विभागा कडे विकसचा प्रस्ताव समवेस्ट करण्यत आले होते. ते आपल्या विभागाने माझा तक्रारीवरून हिरिंग घेवून रद्द करण्यत आले होते. व त्या प्रकरणाची तक्रर आपल्या विभाकाने पोलिसाना ही दिली होती. सदया ते प्रकरण बांद्रा न्यायालयात अजून चालू आहे.व हेच लोक पुन्हा अशा प्रकारे लोकांची मोटय्या प्रमाणात आर्थिक फसवणूक करत आहे.तसेच सन १९९९ ते २०२५ या कळवधीमध्ये नियमा प्रमाणे कोणताही ऑडिट झालेला नाही. तसेच या लोकांचा आपण जाहीर केलेल्या परिशिष्ट II मध्ये ही नाव नाही आहेत. हे सर्व पुरावे मी या तक्रारी सोभात जोडत आहे

तुमची मागणी: आम्ही आपणास अशी विनंती करतो की आपण या सर्व प्रकरणं विषयी योग्य ती करवाई करावी व संस्थेचा नावाने खोल्न्येत आलेले बचत खाते बंद करण्यात किवा त्या खात्याला सतगती देण्यात यावी, आपण या गंभीर तक्रारीची नोंद घ्यावी आणि लवकरात लवकर योग्य ती कार्यवाही करावी, अशी माझी आपणास नम्र विनंती आहे.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
kindly approach agrc for cancellation of scheme

GRI/2025/37
Representation Seeking Immediate Inquiry and Transfer of the Assistant Registrar F/South Mr. Chandrakant Pawar in Relation to Non-Action in the Jijau Prerna CHS Matter
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Adv. Nagnath R Bhumkar
22/04/202545919150
Respected Sir/Madam,

This is to most respectfully submit that, despite repeated written and oral Representations made Before the office of the Hon’ble Assistant Registrar F/South Mr. Chandrakant Pawar in respect of issues concerning Jijau Prerna Co-operative Housing Society, situated at Jijamata Nagar, Rupreyon Mills Compound, G. D. Ambekar Marg, Kalachowki, Mumbai – 400033, no substantive or remedial action has been initiated till date.

It is pertinent to note that the said society has been in long-standing default in payment of transit rent. In light of this, and in accordance with the provisions governing Slum Rehabilitation and Redevelopment, Representations were made requesting the issuance of Stop Work orders against the developer, M/s Siroya Builders and Developers, in relation to the ongoing construction under the sale component of the rehabilitation project.

However, despite consistent and bona fide follow-ups, the concerned Assistant Registrar has failed and neglected to take any effective or statutory action against the developer. This persistent inaction has given rise to grave apprehensions regarding the fairness, transparency, and propriety of the conduct of the said officer, and raises a serious question of administrative bias and dereliction of duty.

In the interest of justice, transparency, and to uphold the confidence of society members in the regulatory framework, we hereby seek the following:

1. That an immediate departmental inquiry be initiated into the conduct, decisions, and omissions of the said Assistant Registrar in the above-stated matter.

2. That, pending the outcome of such inquiry, the concerned officer be transferred forthwith from the said post to prevent any further compromise of due process and public interest.

We trust that your office shall take urgent and appropriate cognizance of the matter and initiate necessary proceedings to ensure fairness, accountability, and compliance with the law.


We remain hopeful of your immediate intervention.

Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
आपल्या तक्रारी संबंधित कार्यवाही चालू आहे.त्याबाबत आपण नियुक्त लेखापरिक्षक यांना माहिती सादर करावी .
-

GRI/2025/36
Biometric survey not done of my house in Vakola, Santacruz (Survey No. 25, 26, 30)
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Sachin Yadav22/04/20254577910
Hi Sir,
I am writing to request the inclusion of my hut in the biometric survey under the SRA scheme. Upon reviewing Annexure-II attached , it is evident that huts with similar or smaller sizes (≤6'x5') were surveyed and approved, specifically huts with Sr. No. 20 (Page 14), 23 (Page 15), 26 (Page 16), 29 (Page 17), 32 (Page 18), and 52 (Page 27). However, my hut was unjustly excluded, despite meeting the same criteria.

We also received a notice from SRA stating that our hut is small (4'x5'). However, our house size is 6'x5'. There is no Government Resolution (GR) that specifies exclusion based on house size. Kindly provide any official documentation regarding this size requirement, as no such GR has been issued to justify the exclusion of our hut.

The Bombay High Court has ruled that the SRA must conduct a survey if a hut exists: indiankanoon.org/doc/122878007/. Furthermore, recent reports have raised concerns about corruption in the survey process, with surveyors caught taking bribes in Santacruz, Mumbai. More details can be found here: theprint.in/india/mumbai-three-pvt-surveyors-of-sra-caught-taking-rs-25000-bribe/2496434/

I request that you review my case and arrange for the biometric survey of my hut. I have attached below documents as proof of residence:

Survey Receipt (2000)
Electricity Bill (2003)
Voter ID (1996)

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to a prompt and favorable resolution.
I am unable to upload pdf,there is some error in system online.
Regards,
Sachin Yadav
9768323953
Competent Authority -3Resolved

GRI/2025/32
सशुल्क फी चा भरणा करून सहा महिने झाले तरी अद्याप सोडत पद्धतीने सदनिकेचे नंबर मिळाला नाही
Assistant RegistarAnil Hariba Bhosale21/04/20254577810
नमस्कार साहेब,

न. भू. क्र. २२३अ/१ मौजे गोरेगाव, ता. बोरीवली येथील जय बजरंग सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था गोरेगाव (पूर्व) सोसायटीतील सदीनिकेसाठी
सशुल्क फी चा भरणा करून सहा महिने झाले तरी अद्याप सोडत पद्धतीने सदनिकेचे नंबर मिळाला नाही फक्त पुढील आठवडा ला या असे उत्तर मिळते तसेच प्रत्येकवेळी अर्जाची प्रत मागून घेतात आणि माझा मोबाइल क्रमांक घेतात.

पण मला अद्याप सदनिका क्रमांक मिळाला नाही. तरी कृपया आपण मार्ग सुचवावा हि नम्र विनंती

सोबत अर्जाची प्रत आणि सशुल्क फी ची पावती जोडत आहे.

आपला विश्वासु
अनिल भोसले (9757482035)
Assistant Registrar (City)
Resolved
आपली अर्जावर कार्यवाही करण्यात आलेली आहे .त्यामध्ये आपणास सदनिका वाटपाची कार्यवाही अंतिम टप्प्यात आहे त्यासाठी सहकार विभागाशी (पश्चिम उपनगरे) संपर्क करावा .

ABSENCE OF THE CONCERN SRA OFFICER MR. MANOHAR JADAV AT THE TIME OF DEMOLITION WHICH ENDANGERS NEIGHBOURS LIFE NO PRPOPER SAFETY.
Engineering DepartmentAdv. Yasin Nabi11/04/2025457668
As on dated 08/04/2025 chawl no 58, room no 903,CTS no 7643(part) 4607, Bharat Nagar Bandra east BKC Mumbai-51, demolition of the said house has started by the developer worker, at around 2.10 pm as an advocate through my client Shahrukh shaikh which is the neighbour i reached at the spot, subsequently there was no specific safety, nor the the concern officer Mr. Manohar Jadhav was present at the time of demolition. Further i complain that at the time of demolition when the main working line of electric wire was cut by the worker, it sparks the line with fire and short circuit subsequently it was very dangerous which can take some ones life away as the line was shot and the other tenants were residing beside the demolition house there were no officer present at the time of breaking the wall and cutting the electricity wire without any ensuring proper safety protocols at the time of due process nor any precaution of net boundries. Officer Mr. Manohar Jadhav was not present which default his presence. Hence Strict action may be taken against the on duty officer Mr. Manohar Jadav as it the life and death question. Here to annexing the photos which clearly shows the non-safety of the people nor following of safety protocols.
Dy.Collector (Western)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

1196
GRI/2025/9
S.R Scheme on plot bearing CTS no 5(pt),village Chakala,Andheri (E),Mumbai 400093
Engineering DepartmentSurendra Gupta08/04/2025457638
Pursuant to order dated 3.9.2024 passed by the Hon'ble High Court, representations dated 28.11.2023 made by the three applicants in the matter i.e Mrs Navalben Karia , Mr Surendra Gupta and Late MR Kantilal Karia were thereby disposed off with the order dated 18.10.2024 of the Hon'ble Secretary, SRA directing handover of the five Rehab commercial shops on the ground floor of the sale building and allotment of one residential premise to the respective applicant. The applicants have received these five rehabs shops as on 4.3.2025.However in the said order, further directions were issued to the Executive Engg (K/E ward)to oversee the procedure in the pending allotment of the disputed four rehab commercial shops of the respective applicants. However the said Executive Engg(K/E ward) till date has not decided upon the rehabilitation of the same four disputed rehab commercial shops of the respective applicants even after calling upon the necessary submissions from the concerned. The applicants have made numerous reminder letters for the same, but the engg dept has least bothered to conclude the matter of the rehabilitation of the applicants. Now all this delay is happening in spite of the clear order dated 19.1.2022 in the Writ Petition (L) NO.522/2022 OF the Hon'ble High Court and the judgement dated 28.3.2022 in the SLP(C)NO.940/2022 by the Hon'ble Supreme Court of India.
Executive Engineers-3 (EE-3)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.

GRI/2025/7
विषय:- विकासक मे.आकृती निर्माण प्रा. लि.(हबटाऊन लिमिटेड).यांनी एस.आर.ए चे परिपत्रक क्रमांक १५३ आणि परिपत्रक १६६ चे उल्लंघन केलेले असल्याबाबत / तक्रार अर्ज,
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Mohammed Amjad Shaikh
04/04/20254576110
हरीनगर-शिवाजीनगर एस.आर.ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था जोगेश्वरी (पु),मुंबई ४०००६०.या योजनेच्या परिशिष्ट-२ मध्ये अ.क्र. ४६८ वर श्री. मोहम्मद हुसैन खान मोहम्मद हे निवासी वापराकरीता पात्र होते. परंतु त्यांच्या मृत्युनंतर तहसिलदार-१ (विशेष कक्ष), झो.पु.प्रा. मुंबई यांच्या वारस आदेशात वारस म्हणून त्यांची मुले १) श्री. मोहम्मद गनी मोहम्मद हुसैन शेख २) श्री. मोहम्मद अमजद शेख ३) श्रीम. तमन्ना मोहम्मद अजीम शेख आमचे नाव मान्य करण्यात आहे तरीही आम्हाला विकासक मे. आकृती निर्माण प्रा. लि., (हबटाऊन लिमिटेड), यांच्याकडून दि. ०९/०४/२०२१ पासुन दि. २४/०३/२०२५ पर्यात रूपये १५,०००/- प्रतिमाह प्रमाणे रूपये. ७,५२,२२०/- इतके भाडे थकीत आहे,तसेच सदनिकेचा अद्याप ताबा देखील देण्यात आलेला नाही तसेच सहाय्यक निबंधक (पुर्व व पश्चिम उपनगरे), झो.पु.प्रा. मुंबई यांनी विकासकाला परिपत्रक १५३ नुसार पुढील १५ दिवसांत भाडे अदा करून या कार्यालयात स्वंयघोषणापत्र सादर करावे असे आदेश देण्यात आले होते परंतु विकासकाने त्यांच्या आदेशांचे पालन केले नाही सहाय्यक निबंधकांचे वारंवार आदेश देऊनही विकासक स्वंयघोषणापत्र सादर का करत नाही याचे कारण काय आहे हे एस.आर.ए चे परिपत्रक १५३ आणि परिपत्रक १६६ चे उल्लंघन करून विकासक मनमानी कारभार करत आहेत आणि एस.आर.ए परिपत्रकांचे पालन करत नाहीत हा सहाय्यक निबंधक विभागाच्या अधिकाऱ्यांची निष्काळजीपणा नाही का त्यामुळेच मी ही तक्रार दाखल करत आहे माझ्या तक्रारीवर परिपत्रक १५३ नुसार योग्य ती कार्यवाही करण्यात यावी आणि माझे थकित भाडे परिपत्रक १६६ नुसार आरटीजीएस द्वारे माझ्या बँक खात्यात हस्तांतरित केले जावे. आणि विकासकाला स्वयंघोषणापत्र सादर करण्यासाठी सांगा ही जबाबदारी सहाय्यक निबंधकांच्या अधिकाऱ्यांवर बंधनकारक आहे.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदरचा तक्रार अर्ज sra.gov.in या संकेतस्थळावर प्रसिध्द करण्यात यावा, आपली तक्रार निकाली काढणे सोईचे होईल.
-
1199

ABHAY KARANI04/04/2025457609

Assistant Registrar (Western)
Mohammed Amjad Shaikh
04/04/20254576110
हरीनगर-शिवाजीनगर एस.आर.ए सहकारी गृहनिर्माण संस्था जोगेश्वरी (पु),मुंबई ४०००६०.या योजनेच्या परिशिष्ट-२ मध्ये अ.क्र. ४६८ वर श्री. मोहम्मद हुसैन खान मोहम्मद हे निवासी वापराकरीता पात्र होते. परंतु त्यांच्या मृत्युनंतर तहसिलदार-१ (विशेष कक्ष), झो.पु.प्रा. मुंबई यांच्या वारस आदेशात वारस म्हणून त्यांची मुले १) श्री. मोहम्मद गनी मोहम्मद हुसैन शेख २) श्री. मोहम्मद अमजद शेख ३) श्रीम. तमन्ना मोहम्मद अजीम शेख आमचे नाव मान्य करण्यात आहे तरीही आम्हाला विकासक मे. आकृती निर्माण प्रा. लि., (हबटाऊन लिमिटेड), यांच्याकडून दि. ०९/०४/२०२१ पासुन दि. २४/०३/२०२५ पर्यात रूपये १५,०००/- प्रतिमाह प्रमाणे रूपये. ७,५२,२२०/- इतके भाडे थकीत आहे,तसेच सदनिकेचा अद्याप ताबा देखील देण्यात आलेला नाही तसेच सहाय्यक निबंधक (पुर्व व पश्चिम उपनगरे), झो.पु.प्रा. मुंबई यांनी विकासकाला परिपत्रक १५३ नुसार पुढील १५ दिवसांत भाडे अदा करून या कार्यालयात स्वंयघोषणापत्र सादर करावे असे आदेश देण्यात आले होते परंतु विकासकाने त्यांच्या आदेशांचे पालन केले नाही सहाय्यक निबंधकांचे वारंवार आदेश देऊनही विकासक स्वंयघोषणापत्र सादर का करत नाही याचे कारण काय आहे हे एस.आर.ए चे परिपत्रक १५३ आणि परिपत्रक १६६ चे उल्लंघन करून विकासक मनमानी कारभार करत आहेत आणि एस.आर.ए परिपत्रकांचे पालन करत नाहीत हा सहाय्यक निबंधक विभागाच्या अधिकाऱ्यांची निष्काळजीपणा नाही का त्यामुळेच मी ही तक्रार दाखल करत आहे माझ्या तक्रारीवर परिपत्रक १५३ नुसार योग्य ती कार्यवाही करण्यात यावी आणि माझे थकित भाडे परिपत्रक १६६ नुसार आरटीजीएस द्वारे माझ्या बँक खात्यात हस्तांतरित केले जावे. आणि विकासकाला स्वयंघोषणापत्र सादर करण्यासाठी सांगा ही जबाबदारी सहाय्यक निबंधकांच्या अधिकाऱ्यांवर बंधनकारक आहे.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
सदरचा तक्रार अर्ज sra.gov.in या संकेतस्थळावर प्रसिध्द करण्यात यावा, आपली तक्रार निकाली काढणे सोईचे होईल.

Assistant Registrar (Eastern)
Resolved
आपल्या थकीत भाडेबाबत Sra.gov.in या संकेतस्थळावर अर्ज सादर करावा जेणे करून आपल्या घरभाडेबाबत कार्यवाही करणे सोईचे होईल.
-
1202
GRI/2025/2
Sub: Complaint against accused Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar a proprietor of M/s Dani Builder and Developers and co-partner of M/s Noble Developers for perjury, fraud, cheating and for non-fulfilment of the basic requirement to commence construction of a Slum Rehabilitation building for a long period of implementation of scheme at Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society S.R.A. (Proposed) situated at C.T.S. No. 921 (P) & 922 (P), Vinoba Bhave Nagar, Kurla (West), Mumbai – 400070. Ref: SRA/ENG/2207/L/MHL/LOI.
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Mohammad Faisal03/04/2025457588
In pursuant to the above captioned subject I, the undersigned Mr. Mohammed Faisal would like to draw kind attention of the higher authorities against the developer M/s Dani Builders and Developers proprietor Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar. The Series of devious stratagem is hereby mentioned below;

1. That a proposal of S R scheme was been commenced by M/s Noble Builders & Developers, a partnership firm of Mr. Shahjahan Kifaytullah, Mr. Nadeem Yusuf Shaikh and Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar for development under DC Rule 33(10) situated at C.T.S. No. 921(P) and 922 Survey No. 172(A), land admeasuring 1337 Sq.mtrs, Khalil Chawl (Achanak Nagar), Behind Mubarak Complex, Vinoba Bhave Nagar, Kurla (W), Mumbai – 400070 consisting of 59 tenements. That the said plot of land is vested in the competent authority MHADA. The copy of Partnership Deed vide register notary no. 222/09, dated 15th May, 2009 is hereby annexed and marked as Exhibit “A”.

2. That a Development Agreement was been executed on dated 4th May, 2009 between Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed), hereinafter referred as “the Society”) One Part and M/s Noble Builders and Developers, a duly partnership firm through their partners (1) Mr. Shahjahan Kifaytullah, (2) Mr. Nadeem Yusuf Shaikh and (3) Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar, hereinafter referred as “the Developers” of the Other Part for the purpose of carrying out the development in respect of the said property under SR Scheme and to rehouse the Slum Dwellers, free of cost houses admeasuring about 269 Sq.ft carpet area. The Copy of Development Agreement dated 4th Mat, 2009 is hereby annexed and marked as Exhibit “B”.

3. That Annexure – II was prepared by the competent authority MHADA, issued notice on dated 17/7/2010 vide outward no. 4664/2010 to Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) for Implementation of SR Scheme under DC Rule 33(10) and prepared Annexure – II. That after the necessary compliance with respect to Annexure – II the copy was submitted to the office of SRA for further process and the scheme was instituted in the year 2009.

4. That to utter shock, surprise and dismay the developer and co-partner of M/s Noble Builders and Developers, Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar holding 15% of shares in the said partnership firm, is also a tenant of the said SR Scheme along with his other family members having their serial no. 15, 16, 18, 19, 20, 24, 25, 27, 31 (Developer Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar), 33, 35, 36, 39, 40, 53 & 57, mentioned in Annexure – II prepared by the competent authority MHADA.

5. At the further outset, the developer and co-partner of M/s Noble Builders and Developers, Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar has also committed offence and unlawfully imposed an outsider named as Mrs. Nazra Bano at serial no. 23 and presently shown at serial no. 24 in the said scheme one of the tenement out of 59 in the Annexure – II list which was prepared by the bureaucrats of MHADA authority.

6. That after the following the due process of law with respect to development, Slum Rehabilitation Authority granted and issued LOI on dated 12-06-2009. Thereafter no further process or necessary steps was been initiated by the developer and the project of SR Scheme was kept in abeyance intentionally by M/s Noble Builders and Developers to harass the innocent Slum Dwellers.

7. That with reference to notification issued on dated 20/04/2022 outward no. 2022/15144 by the Slum Rehabilitation Authority cancellation of proposed development which is prolonged and kept in pendency, the name of the developer M/s Noble Developers and proposed society is at serial no. 178, That in contrary, the above named accused played a foul tactics and usurp the project which was commenced by M/s Noble Developers through its partner and dissolve the committee members of Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) and assigned a new committee members of his choose and choice intentionally to deceive the Slum Dwellers.

8. That during the pendency of stuck proposed SR Scheme, the competent authority MHADA, obtain a letter on dated 02/06/2018 vide outward no. 3448/2018 to Deputy Collector, S.R.A for change of developer and assigned M/s Dani Builders and Developers, a proprietor Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar for development of Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed).

9. That in collusion and connivance of newly elected Chief Promoter, Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) and the developer M/s Dani Builders and Developers, proprietor Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar provides the false and fabricated information of 63 tenements to the competent authority MHADA and prepared another Annexure – II. That the said developer being a tenant and member along with family members in majority of Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) having their serial no. 16, 17, 19, 20, 21, 25, 26 (Developer Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar), 28, 32 (Developer Mr. Abdul Rashid Abdul Khalil Rajapurkar), 34, 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41, 42, 55, 56 & 60 are recorded as Slum Dwellers in the development scheme under DC Rule 33(10).

10. That on dated 15/12/2023 a complaint was addressed before the Chief Executive Officer, S.R.A against the above named accused / developer Mr. Abdul Rashid Rajapurkar proprietor of M/s Dani Builder & Developer of neighbour society developed under SR Scheme, showed his interest to sell me the commercial premises which is reserved for nursing home as per the information provided by him of area admeasuring 66 sq.mtr Rera Carpet with corresponding saleable built up area of 1564 sq.ft at the rate of Rs. 16,100 per sq.mtr which is commenced at CTS No. 921(pt) & 922(pt), Village Kurla situated at Achanak Nagar, Behind Mubarak Complex Tower, Kurla (W), Mumbai – 400070, for total sum of Rs. 2,51,80,400/- (Rupees Two Crores Fifty One Lakhs Eighty Thousand Four Hundred Only). The copy of complaint dated 15/12/2023 is hereby annexed and marked as Exhibit “C”.

11. That as per discussion between us I transferred him the token amount of Rs. 25,00,000/- (Rupees Twenty Five Lakhs Only) through my bank account and ask him to execute Memorandum of Understanding which is still in pendency. Thereafter several approach to him, he played delay tactic only in sole intention to deceive and bamboozle me to defraud my hard earned money.

12. That after utilizing my said token money, instead of executing Memorandum of Understanding he has cancelled the said deal and informed me to collect the advance payment of Rs. 25, 00,000/- in the month of October, 2019 and issued me the cheque which has been dishonoured deliberately signed wrongly for the reason as mentioned in memo Drawers Signature Differs. That Mr. Abdul Rashid Rajapurkar reveals that he is not willing to refund my money and miss-represented to play fraud with me.

13. At the further outset, the accused / developer has committed an offence for illicit possession occupied in the under construction building and without obtaining Occupation Certificate and in lieu to the subject matter the authority of Slum Rehabilitation issued STOP WORK notice on dated 16/10/2024 outward no. SRA / ED / OW / 2024 / 56052 / L for carrying out work of building beyond C.C. (i.e. above 5th Floor) of sale wing A, B & C. The Copy of notice dated 16/10/2024 outward no. SRA / ED / OW / 2024 / 56052 / L is hereby annexed and marked as Exhibit “D”.

14. Subsequently, the Slum Rehabilitation Authority also issue notice dated 16/10/2024, outward no. SRA/ED/OW/2024/56047/L under section 53(1) of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planing Act, 1966, instructed to vacate the composite building partly occupied without obtaining Occupancy Certificate and to handover balance PAP’s Estate Department (SRA) under the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme constructed as per approved plan under no. SRA / ENG / 2749 / L / MHL / IOA, dated 19/12/2016 on plot bearing CTS No. 921(P), 922(P), of village Kurla, Achanak Nagar, Pipe Road, Kurla (W), Mumbai – 400070, for Aman (Kurla) SRA Co-op Hsg Soc. Ltd. That the above said accused disobeyed and miserably failed to comply with the instruction. The Copy of notice issued 16/10/2024, outward no. SRA/ED/OW/2024/56047/L is hereby annexed and marked as Exhibit “E”.

15. Furthermore, the above said accused / developer has grabbed a significant amount from the tenant of Khaliliya Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) and from others to rehouse for additional area will be provided in the new construction. That the said accused / developer who is a tenant of the said proposed society has duped the hard earned money and also committed an offence for violation of DC Rule 33(10) under SR Scheme.

16. That the said accused / developer is at the stage of insolvency resolution on legal obligation towards slum dwellers and the developer is unable to develop the SR Scheme under the salutary Slum Act scheme. That the slum dwellers cannot enfore this demand, but the SRA could use the due work as a ground and evidence of "Non Performance" to terminate the developer’s continuation.


17. That it is crystal clear the developer has been saved and protected from any harm in countenance of bureaucrats of competent authority, MHADA who espouse the developer since beginning of the development. Furthermore, the developer is in continuation of his project without any fear of law and order and doesn’t deem fit to consider or reply / respond the notice issued to submit say till today. That it has been found and seen that both the parties has set their hands in gloves and played a foul tactics to linger and drag the matter intentionally.

18. At the further outset it has been seems a deliberate non-compliance of the procedural aspect that has been contemplated by the concerned authority. It is submitted that the general principle of law of following procedures which is part of principles of natural justice has not been followed and hence the development programs have been vitiated and smacks of deliberate circumvention of the process laid down by the law to make wrongful gain to themselves and cause wrongful loss to humanity.

In view of above, it is humbly request that the Offer Letter issued to the accused / developer M/s Dani Builders and Develoeprs should be quashed and set aside of the offer letter, Stop Work notice should be issued immediately to stop the further approvals and work in the project and all others approvals granted to the accused / developer should be stayed, enquiry should be ordered to investigate the scam by formation of the committee under the chairmanship of retired judge of the Hon'ble High Court and all the culprits should be booked and punished under the relevant acts, all the conçerned S.R.A. and MHADA officials should be suspended immediately till final disposal of the subject matter and all the files pertaining to the approval should be recorded and taken into the custody to preserve the evidence of corruption.
Finance Controller (FC)Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
-
1203
GRI/2025/1
Disolution of New Paradise Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) situated on C S No. 633, 644 to 669 Ref: SRA/Eng./1360/E/STGL/LOI
Hon. Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Arshad Ali Ansari03/04/2025457599
Solicitation for dissolution of New Paradise Co-operative Housing Society Ltd (Proposed) formed as per Co-operative Societies Act, Modi Compound Co-operative Housing Society (Proposed) formed as per Co-operative Societies Act & Modi Compound Residents Welfare Society dult Registered Society with the Asst. Registrar of Societies Bombay under No. BOM – 169/83 and Asst. Charity Commissioner Mumbai Region, Mumbai under No. 8849(M) and dissolution of Developer M/s Paradise Construction Company for development of the above named society situated at C.S. No. 633, 644 to 669.
Assistant Registrar (Western)
Resolved
Please visit SRA office to the concerned department along with proper documents.
